text.10: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhuute bhuutato sa~njaanaati; bhuute bhuutato  sa~n~natvaa bhuute ma~n~nati, bhuutesu ma~n~nati, bhuutato ma~n~nati, bhuute meti  ma~n~nati, bhuute abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m  tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.100: [01] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa  viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti, kittaavataa ca pana satthu  pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii''ti? ``duuratopi  kho maya.m, aavuso, aagacchaama ^a^T1.0024^ea^ aayasmato saariputtassa santike  etassa bhaasitassa atthama~n~naatu.m. saadhu vataayasmanta.myeva saariputta.m  pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho; aayasmato saariputtassa sutvaa  bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena ^a^V1.0019^ea^ haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi  karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu  aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca  --
text.1000: [03] ``ito hi kho aha.m ^a^M1.0233^ea^, bho, aagacchaami sama.nassa gotamassa  santikaa''ti.
text.1001: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati, bhava.m vacchaayano, sama.nassa gotamassa  pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m?
text.1003: [03] ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m  jaanissaami! sopi nuunassa taadisova yo sama.nassa gotamassa  pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaaneyyaa''ti.
text.1004: [03] ``u.laaraaya khalu bhava.m vacchaayano sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msaaya  pasa.msatii''ti.
text.1005: [03] ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msissaami?
text.1007: [03] ``ka.m pana bhava.m vacchaayano atthavasa.m sampassamaano sama.ne  gotame eva.m abhippasanno''ti {abhippasanno hotiiti (syaa0)}?
text.1008: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, kusalo naagavaniko naagavana.m paviseyya.  so passeyya naagavane ^a^T1.0337^ea^ mahanta.m ^a^V1.0237^ea^ ^a^P1.0176^ea^ hatthipada.m, diighato  ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m. so ni.t.tha.m gaccheyya -- `mahaa vata,  bho, naago'ti. evameva kho aha.m, bho, yato addasa.m sama.ne gotame  cattaari padaani athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa,  svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1009: [03] 289^b^.^eb^ ``katamaani cattaari? idhaaha.m, bho, passaami  ekacce khattiyapa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade vaalavedhiruupe, te  bhindantaa {vobhindantaa (sii0 pii0) vi + ava + bhindantaa}   ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. te su.nanti --  `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa  osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharonti -- `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m  sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m  byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaama. eva.m cepi no  pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evampissa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaamaa'ti. te  su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa  nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamanti.  te sama.no gotamo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti  sampaha.mseti. te sama.nena gotamena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa  samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na ceva sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m  pucchanti, kutossa {kutassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaada.m aaropessanti? a~n~nadatthu ^a^M1.0234^ea^ sama.nasseva  gotamassa saavakaa sampajjanti. yadaaha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame ima.m  pa.thama.m ^a^T1.0338^ea^ pada.m addasa.m athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa,  svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.101: [01] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa  viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti? idhaavuso, satthu  pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti, yesa~nca  dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti, baahulikaa {baahullikaa  (syaa0)} ca  honti, saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa.  tatraavuso, theraa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. `satthu  pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa  pa.thamena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m  satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme nappajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena ^a^M1.0018^ea^  .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `baahulikaa ca, saathalikaa,  okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena  .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. theraa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi  tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. tatraavuso, majjhimaa  bhikkhuu...pe0... navaa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti.  `satthu pavivittassa viharato ^a^T1.0025^ea^ saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhantii'ti --  iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca  dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme nappajahantii'ti -- iminaa  dutiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `baahulikaa ca  honti, saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa'ti  -- iminaa tatiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. navaa,  aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. ettaavataa  kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m  naanusikkhanti.
text.1010: [03] ``puna caparaaha.m, bho, passaami idhekacce braahma.napa.n.dite...pe0...  gahapatipa.n.dite...pe0... sama.napa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade  vaalavedhiruupe te bhindantaa ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani.  te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu bho gotamo amuka.m naama ^a^P1.0177^ea^  gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m  abhisa"nkharonti `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa  pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m  vaada.m aaropessaama. eva.m cepi no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati,  eva.mpissa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaamaa'ti. te su.nanti `sama.no khalu  bho gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena  sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamanti. te sama.no gotamo dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te sama.nena gotamena  dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na  ceva sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, kutossa ^a^V1.0238^ea^ vaada.m aaropessanti?  a~n~nadatthu sama.na.myeva gotama.m okaasa.m yaacanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajjaaya. te sama.no gotamo pabbaajeti {pabbaajeti upasampaadeti (sii0)}. te tattha pabbajitaa  samaanaa vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa ^a^T1.0339^ea^ nacirasseva  -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti  tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. te evamaaha.msu -- `mana.m vata,  bho, anassaama, mana.m vata, bho, panassaama; maya~nhi pubbe assama.naava  samaanaa sama.namhaati pa.tijaanimha, abraahma.naava samaanaa braahma.namhaati  pa.tijaanimha, anarahantova samaanaa arahantamhaati pa.tijaanimha.  idaani khomha sama.naa, idaani khomha braahma.naa, idaani khomha  arahanto'ti. yadaaha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame ima.m catuttha.m pada.m addasa.m  athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa  dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'''ti.
text.1011: [01] ``yato ^a^M1.0235^ea^ kho aha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame imaani cattaari  padaani addasa.m athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa,  svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'''ti.
text.1012: [03] 290^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetaa  va.lavaabhirathaa orohitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa  tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``namo tassa  bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa; namo tassa bhagavato arahato  sammaasambuddhassa; namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.  appeva naama mayampi kadaaci karahaci ^a^P1.0178^ea^ tena bhotaa  gotamena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama, appeva naama siyaa kocideva  kathaasallaapo''ti! atha kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0340^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m  katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno  kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yaavatako ahosi pilotikena  paribbaajakena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m  vutte, bhagavaa jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, braahma.na,  ettaavataa hatthipadopamo vitthaarena paripuuro hoti. api ca, braahma.na,  yathaa hatthipadopamo vitthaarena paripuuro hoti ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m  manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho  jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1013: [03] 291^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, naagavaniko naagavana.m  paviseyya. so passeyya naagavane mahanta.m ^a^V1.0239^ea^ hatthipada.m, diighato ca  aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m. yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva  taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu?  santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane vaamanikaa naama hatthiniyo mahaapadaa,  taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.
text.1014: [03] ``so tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane mahanta.m  hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m.  yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa  vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane  uccaa kaa.laarikaa naama hatthiniyo mahaapadaa, taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.
text.1015: [03] ``so ^a^M1.0236^ea^ tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane ^a^T1.0341^ea^ mahanta.m  hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m,  uccaa ca dantehi aara~njitaani. yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva  taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu?  santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane uccaa ka.nerukaa naama hatthiniyo  mahaapadaa, taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.
text.1016: [03] ``so tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane mahanta.m  hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m,  uccaa ca dantehi aara~njitaani, uccaa ca saakhaabha"nga.m. ta~nca naaga.m  passati rukkhamuulagata.m vaa abbhokaasagata.m vaa gacchanta.m vaa ti.t.thanta.m vaa  nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa. so ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `ayameva so  mahaanaago'ti.
text.1017: [03] ``evameva kho ^a^P1.0179^ea^, braahma.na, idha tathaagato  loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m  paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m  deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m  sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m  su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato.  so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena  saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho  gharaavaaso rajopatho ^a^T1.0342^ea^, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ^a^V1.0240^ea^  ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m  caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani  acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so aparena  samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya  appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajati.
text.1018: [03] 292^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m  sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, nihitada.n.do ^a^M1.0237^ea^ nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
text.1019: [03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti  dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii. athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati.
text.102: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa ca, panaavuso, satthu pavivittassa  viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhanti ^a^P1.0015^ea^? idhaavuso,  satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhanti -- yesa~nca  dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahanti; na ca baahulikaa  honti, na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa.  tatraavuso, theraa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti. `satthu  pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa  pa.thamena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m  satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena .thaanena  theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa ^a^V1.0020^ea^ bhavanti. `na ca baahulikaa, na saathalikaa  okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena  .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. theraa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi  tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti ^a^T1.0026^ea^. tatraavuso, majjhimaa  bhikkhuu...pe0... navaa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti.  `satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii'ti --  iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca  dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahantii'ti -- iminaa  dutiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `na ca baahulikaa,  na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa'ti --  iminaa tatiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. navaa,  aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi ^a^M1.0019^ea^ tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti. ettaavataa  kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa  vivekamanusikkhanti.
text.1020: [03] ``abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii virato  methunaa gaamadhammaa.
text.1021: [03] ``musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii  saccasandho theto {.theto (syaa0 ka.m0)} paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.
text.1022: [03] ``pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti,  ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na  imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m  vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti ^a^T1.0343^ea^.
text.1023: [01] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato  hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii  bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa ^a^P1.0180^ea^ tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m  bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1024: [03] ``samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti  kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.
text.1025: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0241^ea^ biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato  hoti, ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato, virato vikaalabhojanaa,  naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti,  maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti,  uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti, aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti,  aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti, daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa ^a^M1.0238^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti,  aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti, hatthigavaassava.lavaapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti,  khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa  pa.tivirato hoti, kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti,  tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti,  ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa pa.tivirato hoti,   chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa {saahasaakaaraa (ka0)} pa.tivirato hoti  {imassa anantara.m ``so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato  ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedetii''ti vacana.m diighanikaaye aagata.m, ta.m  idha santosakathaavasaane aagata.m, saa ca santosakathaa tattha  satisampaja~n~naanantarameva aagataa}.
text.1026: [03] 294^b^.^eb^ ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena  ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva ^a^T1.0344^ea^ pakkamati  samaadaayeva pakkamati. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva  .deti sapattabhaarova .deti, evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti  kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena  yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena  siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.
text.1027: [03] 295^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii  hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m  viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m  tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m  aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...  jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m  vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii.  yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa  paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati,  rakkhati ^a^P1.0181^ea^ manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati.  so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m  abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.
text.1028: [03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite  vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti ^a^V1.0242^ea^, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii  hoti, sa.mghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite ^a^M1.0239^ea^   khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme  sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite  tu.nhiibhaave ^a^T1.0345^ea^ sampajaanakaarii hoti.
text.1029: [03] 296^b^.^eb^ ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena  samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato) {( ) etthantare  paa.tho idha nadissati, catukka"nguttare pana imasmi.m .thaane dissati,  a.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu ca tadattho pakaasito. tasmaa so ettha pa.tiipuurito} iminaa ca  ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena  satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m  rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m  palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m  aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so  abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya  citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadappadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati,  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii byaapaadappadosaa citta.m parisodheti.  thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato  sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya  anuddhato viharati, ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m  parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati  akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.
text.103: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso, lobho ca paapako doso ca  paapako. lobhassa ca pahaanaaya dosassa ca pahaanaaya atthi majjhimaa  pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa  cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya  sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0  syaa0 pii0)} --  sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto  sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho  saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya  abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1030: [03] 297^b^.^eb^ ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso  upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca  akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi,  tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava  ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho ^a^T1.0346^ea^ bhagavaa, svaakkhaato  bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1031: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa  ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m  piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati,  braahma.na...pe0... ^a^P1.0182^ea^ suppa.tipanno bhagavato  saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1032: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0240^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako  ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m  ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti ^a^V1.0243^ea^ tatiya.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na...pe0...  suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1033: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi  vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi,  tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati  -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno  bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1034: [03] 298^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so  anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m,  dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m  itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva  taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa,  svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1035: [03] ``so ^a^P1.0183^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so  dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^T1.0347^ea^ visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage  satte pajaanaati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi,  tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava  ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato  bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1036: [03] 299^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya ^a^M1.0241^ea^ citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m  dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `ime  aasavaa'ti ^a^V1.0244^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idampi  vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi,  tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gato  hoti, api ca kho ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa,  svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.
text.1037: [03] ``tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati ^a^P1.0184^ea^, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati,  avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti.  `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m  itthattaayaa'ti ^a^T1.0348^ea^ pajaanaati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m  itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. ettaavataa  kho, braahma.na, ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gato hoti -- `sammaasambuddho  bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato  saavakasa"ngho'ti. ettaavataa kho, braahma.na, hatthipadopamo vitthaarena  paripuuro hotii''ti.
text.1038: [03] eva.m vutte, jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho  gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa  vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya --  cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena  anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m  gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo  dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
text.104: [01] ``tatraavuso, kodho ca paapako upanaaho ca ^a^T1.0027^ea^  paapako...pe0... makkho ca paapako pa.laaso ca paapako, issaa ca  paapikaa macchera~nca paapaka.m, maayaa ca paapikaa saa.theyya~nca paapaka.m,  thambho ca paapako saarambho ^a^P1.0016^ea^ ca paapako, maano ca  paapako atimaano ca paapako, mado ca paapako pamaado ca paapako.  madassa ca pahaanaaya pamaadassa ca pahaanaaya atthi majjhimaa pa.tipadaa  cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya  sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii  ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati?  ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi  sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo  sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, aavuso,  majjhimaa ^a^V1.0021^ea^ pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii''ti.
text.1041: [03] 300^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0242^ea^ ^a^V1.0245^ea^ ^a^T1.0349^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa  saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti.  ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m.  aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, yaani  kaanici ja"ngalaana.m paa.naana.m padajaataani sabbaani taani hatthipade  samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati yadida.m mahantattena;  evameva kho, aavuso, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa sabbete catuusu  ariyasaccesu sa"ngaha.m gacchanti. katamesu catuusu? dukkhe ariyasacce  ^a^P1.0185^ea^, dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhe  ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasacce''.
text.1042: [03] 301^b^.^eb^ ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m?  jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m,  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, yampiccha.m na labhati  tampi dukkha.m; sa.mkhittena, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. katame  caavuso, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho,  vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho,  vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho.
text.1043: [03] ``katamo caavuso, ruupupaadaanakkhandho? cattaari ca  mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya ruupa.m.
text.1044: [03] ``katamaa caavuso, cattaaro mahaabhuutaa? pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu ^a^T1.0350^ea^,  tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu.
text.1045: [03] 302^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, pathaviidhaatu? pathaviidhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa  pathaviidhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m,  seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi  a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m  udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m ^a^V1.0246^ea^ paccatta.m kakkha.la.m  kharigata.m upaadinna.m. aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu. yaa  ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu, yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu,  pathaviidhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti  -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m  sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati, pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m  viraajeti.
text.1046: [03] ``hoti ^a^M1.0243^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa aapodhaatu  pakuppati {pathaviidhaatu pakuppati (ka0)}. antarahitaa tasmi.m samaye baahiraa pathaviidhaatu hoti.  tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya pathaviidhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya  aniccataa pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa  pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa  matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa  asmii'ti vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti.
text.1047: [01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare akkosanti paribhaasanti  rosenti vihesenti, so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppannaa kho me aya.m  sotasamphassajaa dukkhavedanaa ^a^T1.0351^ea^. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no apa.ticca.  ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m ^a^P1.0186^ea^ pa.ticca'. so {sopikho (syaa0), sopi  (ka0)} phasso  aniccoti passati, vedanaa aniccaati passati, sa~n~naa aniccaati  passati, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaati passati, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati.  tassa dhaataaramma.nameva citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati  adhimuccati.
text.1048: [01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare ani.t.thehi akantehi  amanaapehi samudaacaranti -- paa.nisamphassenapi le.d.dusamphassenapi  da.n.dasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi. so eva.m pajaanaati --  `tathaabhuuto kho aya.m kaayo yathaabhuutasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi  kamanti, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamanti, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamanti,  satthasamphassaapi kamanti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa kakacuupamovaade  -- ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa  a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m, tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya na me so tena  saasanakaro''ti. aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m,  upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m  ekagga.m. kaama.m daani imasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamantu,  le.d.dusamphassaapi kamantu, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamantu, satthasamphassaapi  kamantu, kariiyati hida.m buddhaana.m saasana'nti.
text.1049: [03] ``tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato eva.m  dhamma.m anussarato eva.m sa"ngha.m ^a^V1.0247^ea^ anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na  sa.n.thaati. so tena ^a^T1.0352^ea^ sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `alaabhaa vata me,  na vata ^a^M1.0244^ea^ me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m, yassa me eva.m  buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato,  upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaatii'ti. seyyathaapi, aavuso,  su.nisaa sasura.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati; evameva kho,  aavuso, tassa ce bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m  anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na  sa.n.thaati, so tena sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `alaabhaa vata me  na vata me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m, yassa me eva.m  buddha.m anussarato eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato,  upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaatii'ti. tassa ce, aavuso,  bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m  anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati, so tena attamano  ^a^P1.0187^ea^ hoti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno  bahukata.m hoti.
text.105: [03] idamavocaayasmaa saariputto. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato  saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.1050: [03] 303^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, aapodhaatu? aapodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso ajjhattikaa  aapodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo  si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m  aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu.  yaa ^a^T1.0353^ea^ ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu,  aapodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti  evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m  sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m  viraajeti.
text.1051: [03] ``hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa aapodhaatu  pakuppati. saa gaamampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati,  janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati. hoti kho so, aavuso,  samayo ya.m mahaasamudde yojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti,  dviyojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, tiyojanasatikaanipi  udakaani ogacchanti, catuyojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti,  pa~ncayojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, chayojanasatikaanipi  udakaani ogacchanti, sattayojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti.  hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde ^a^M1.0245^ea^ sattataalampi udaka.m  sa.n.thaati, chattaalampi udaka.m ^a^V1.0248^ea^ sa.n.thaati, pa~ncataalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati,  catuttaalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, titaalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, dvitaalampi  udaka.m sa.n.thaati, taalamattampi {taala.mpi (sii0)} udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti kho so,  aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde sattaporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati,  chapporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, pa~ncaporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati,  catupporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, tiporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati,  dviporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, porisamattampi {porisa.mpi (sii0)} udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti  kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde ^a^T1.0354^ea^ a.d.dhaporisampi udaka.m  sa.n.thaati, ka.timattampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, jaa.nukamattampi udaka.m  sa.n.thaati, gopphakamattampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti kho so, aavuso,  samayo, ya.m mahaasamudde a"ngulipabbatemanamattampi udaka.m na hoti.  tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya aapodhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya  aniccataa ^a^P1.0188^ea^ pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa  pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa  pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa  `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmiiti' vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha  hoti...pe0... tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato,  eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa  kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati. so tena attamano hoti. ettaavataapi  kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.
text.1052: [03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, tejodhaatu? tejodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa  tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- yena ca santappati, yena ca jiiriiyati, yena ca pari.dayhati, yena  ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m  vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa  tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu, tejodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama ^a^T1.0355^ea^,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.  evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa nibbindati,  tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.
text.1053: [03] ``hoti ^a^M1.0246^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa tejodhaatu  pakuppati. saa gaamampi dahati, nigamampi dahati, nagarampi dahati,  janapadampi dahati, janapadapadesampi dahati. saa haritanta.m vaa  panthanta.m vaa selanta.m vaa udakanta.m vaa rama.niiya.m vaa bhuumibhaaga.m aagamma  anaahaaraa nibbaayati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m  kukku.tapattenapi nhaarudaddulenapi aggi.m gavesanti ^a^V1.0249^ea^. tassaa hi naama,  aavuso, baahiraaya tejodhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya aniccataa  pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati,  vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa  kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmii'ti vaa?  atha khvaassa notevettha hoti...pe0... tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno  eva.m buddha.m anussarato eva.m dhamma.m anussarato eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato  upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati, so tena attamano hoti.  ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.
text.1054: [03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa  vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa, adhogamaa vaataa, kucchisayaa vaataa, ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa  (sii0 pii0)}  vaataa, a"ngama"ngaanusaarino ^a^T1.0356^ea^ vaataa, assaaso passaaso iti, ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m  vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa  vaayodhaatu, yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu, vaayodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m  mama nesohamasmi na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya  da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa  nibbindati vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.
text.1055: [01] ``hoti ^a^P1.0189^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo  ya.m baahiraa vaayodhaatu pakuppati. saa gaamampi vahati, nigamampi  vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati.  hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m gimhaana.m pacchime maase  taalava.n.tenapi vidhuupanenapi vaata.m pariyesanti, ossavanepi ^a^M1.0247^ea^ ti.naani na  icchanti. tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya vaayodhaatuyaa taava  mahallikaaya aniccataa pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati,  vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m  panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti  vaa asmii'ti vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti.
text.1056: [01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare akkosanti paribhaasanti  rosenti vihesenti. so eva.m pajaanaati, uppannaa kho me aya.m  sotasamphassajaa dukkhaa vedanaa. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no apa.ticca.  ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m pa.ticca. sopi phasso aniccoti passati,  vedanaa aniccaati ^a^T1.0357^ea^ passati ^a^V1.0250^ea^, sa~n~naa aniccaati passati, sa"nkhaaraa  aniccaati passati, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati. tassa  dhaataaramma.nameva citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati.
text.1057: [01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare ani.t.thehi akantehi  amanaapehi samudaacaranti, paa.nisamphassenapi le.d.dusamphassenapi  da.n.dasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi. so eva.m pajaanaati `tathaabhuuto  kho aya.m kaayo yathaabhuutasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamanti,  le.d.dusamphassaapi kamanti, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamanti, satthasamphassaapi  kamanti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa kakacuupamovaade ``ubhatoda.n.dakena  cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m.  tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya, na me so tena saasanakaro''ti. aaraddha.m  kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa,  passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. kaama.m daani  imasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamantu, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamantu,  da.n.dasamphassaapi kamantu, satthasamphassaapi kamantu. kariiyati hida.m  buddhaana.m saasana'nti.
text.1058: [03] ``tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m  dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na  sa.n.thaati. so tena sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `alaabhaa vata  me, na vata me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m. yassa me  eva.m buddha.m ^a^P1.0190^ea^ anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato,  eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa ^a^T1.0358^ea^ na sa.n.thaatii'ti.  seyyathaapi, aavuso, su.nisaa sasura.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati;  evameva kho, aavuso, tassa ce ^a^M1.0248^ea^ bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato,  eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa  kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaati. so tena sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati  -- `alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me  suladdha.m. yassa me eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m  sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaatii'ti. tassa  ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato,  eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati, so tena  attamano hoti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.
text.1059: [03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.t.tha~nca pa.ticca valli~nca  pa.ticca ti.na~nca pa.ticca mattika~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito agaara.m  tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; evameva kho, aavuso, a.t.thi~nca ^a^V1.0251^ea^ pa.ticca nhaaru~nca  pa.ticca ma.msa~nca pa.ticca camma~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito ruupa.m  tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. ajjhattika~nceva, aavuso, cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m  hoti, baahiraa ca ruupaa na aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca tajjo  samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo  hoti. ajjhattika~nceva {ajjhattika~nce (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ajjhattika~ncepi  (?)}, aavuso, cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m hoti baahiraa  ca ruupaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva ^a^T1.0359^ea^  taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. yato ca kho,  aavuso, ajjhattika~nceva cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m hoti, baahiraa ca ruupaa  aapaatha.m aagacchanti, tajjo ca samannaahaaro hoti. eva.m tajjassa  vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ya.m tathaabhuutassa ruupa.m ta.m  ruupupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa vedanaa saa  vedanupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa sa~n~naa saa  sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, ye tathaabhuutassa sa"nkhaaraa te  sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, ya.m tathaabhuutassa vi~n~naa.na.m ta.m  vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati.
text.1060: [03] ``so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva~nhi kira imesa.m pa~ncanna.m  upaadaanakkhandhaana.m sa"ngaho sannipaato samavaayo hoti. vutta.m kho  paneta.m bhagavataa -- `yo pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passati ^a^P1.0191^ea^  so dhamma.m passati; yo dhamma.m passati so pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passatiiti.  pa.ticcasamuppannaa kho panime yadida.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. yo  imesu pa~ncasu ^a^M1.0249^ea^ upaadaanakkhandhesu chando aalayo anunayo ajjhosaana.m  so dukkhasamudayo. yo imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu  chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, so dukkhanirodho'ti. ettaavataapi  kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.
text.1061: [03] ``ajjhattika~nceva, aavuso, sota.m aparibhinna.m hoti...pe0...  ghaana.m aparibhinna.m hoti... jivhaa aparibhinnaa hoti... kaayo aparibhinno  hoti... mano aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa na aapaatha.m  aagacchanti ^a^T1.0360^ea^ no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa  vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ajjhattiko ceva, aavuso, mano  aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca  tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa  paatubhaavo hoti. yato ca kho, aavuso, ajjhattiko ceva mano  aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, tajjo ca  samannaahaaro hoti, eva.m tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti.  ya.m tathaabhuutassa ruupa.m ta.m ruupupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa  tathaabhuutassa vedanaa saa vedanupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa  tathaabhuutassa sa~n~naa ^a^V1.0252^ea^ saa sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, ye  tathaabhuutassa sa"nkhaaraa te sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, ya.m  tathaabhuutassa vi~n~naa.na.m ta.m vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati. so  eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva~nhi kira imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m  sa"ngaho sannipaato samavaayo hoti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa -- ``yo  pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passati so dhamma.m passati; yo dhamma.m passati so  pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passatii''ti. pa.ticcasamuppannaa kho panime yadida.m  pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. yo imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chando  aalayo anunayo ajjhosaana.m so dukkhasamudayo. yo imesu  pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m so  dukkhanirodho'ti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m  hotii''ti.
text.1062: [01] idamavoca ^a^T1.0361^ea^ aayasmaa saariputto. attamanaa te bhikkhuu  aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.1065: [03] 307^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0362^ea^ ^a^M1.0250^ea^ ^a^V1.0253^ea^ ^a^P1.0192^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.  tatra kho bhagavaa devadatta.m aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi --
text.1066: [03] ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya  mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi,  dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito  samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena  laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena  laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi  laabhasakkaarasilokavaa {laabhii silokavaa (sii0 pii0), laabhii sakkaara silokavaa  (syaa0)}, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti.  so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena majjati pamajjati pamaada.m aapajjati,  pamatto samaano dukkha.m viharati.
text.1067: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii  saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva  saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m  chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa  puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi ^a^T1.0363^ea^  saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na  a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m {tathaapaaya.m (ka0)} bhava.m puriso saaratthiko  saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato  atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m atikkamma papa.tika.m,  saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano.  ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.  evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena  sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no  dukkhapareto ^a^M1.0251^ea^, appeva naama imassa kevalassa   antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito ^a^V1.0254^ea^ samaano  laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena  attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena  attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti ^a^P1.0193^ea^ `ahamasmi  laabhasakkaarasilokavaa, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti.  so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena majjati pamajjati pamaada.m aapajjati,  pamatto samaano dukkha.m viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  saakhaapalaasa.m aggahesi brahmacariyassa; tena ca vosaana.m aapaadi.

text.108: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0020^ea^ ^a^V1.0022^ea^ ^a^T1.0028^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho jaa.nusso.ni  braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``yeme, bho gotama, kulaputtaa bhavanta.m gotama.m uddissa  saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, bhava.m tesa.m gotamo pubba"ngamo,  bhava.m tesa.m gotamo bahukaaro, bhava.m tesa.m gotamo samaadapetaa {samaadaapetaa (?)}; bhoto ca  pana gotamassa saa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjatii''ti. ``evameta.m,  braahma.na, evameta.m, braahma.na! ye te, braahma.na, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa  saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, aha.m tesa.m pubba"ngamo, aha.m tesa.m  bahukaaro, aha.m tesa.m samaadapetaa; mama ca pana saa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m  aapajjatii''ti. ``durabhisambhavaani hi kho, bho gotama,  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani, dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m  ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa  bhikkhuno''ti ^a^P1.0017^ea^. ``evameta.m, braahma.na, evameta.m,  braahma.na! durabhisambhavaani hi kho, braahma.na, ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani ^a^T1.0029^ea^ senaasanaani, dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne  mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno''ti.
text.1080: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.1083: [03] 312^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0374^ea^ ^a^V1.0261^ea^ ^a^P1.0198^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  atha kho pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no yena ^a^M1.0258^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yeme, bho gotama,  sama.nabraahma.naa sa"nghino ga.nino ga.naacariyaa ~naataa yasassino  titthakaraa saadhusammataa, bahujanassa, seyyathida.m -- puura.no kassapo,  makkhali gosaalo, ajito kesakambalo, pakudho kaccaayano, sa~ncayo {sa~njayo  (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)}  bela.t.thaputto, niga.n.tho naa.taputto, sabbete sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya abbha~n~na.msu  sabbeva naabbha~n~na.msu, udaahu ekacce abbha~n~na.msu ekacce naabbha~n~na.msuu''ti?  ``ala.m, braahma.na, ti.t.thateta.m -- sabbete sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya abbha~n~na.msu  sabbeva naabbha~n~na.msu, udaahu ekacce abbha~n~na.msu ekacce naabbha~n~na.msuuti.  dhamma.m te, braahma.na, desessaami, ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no  bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1084: [03] 313^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko  saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato  atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m ^a^T1.0375^ea^ atikkamma papa.tika.m,  saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m  cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso  a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi  papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso  saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa  ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m  atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti  ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m  naanubhavissatii'ti.
text.1085: [03] 314^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi vaa pana, braahma.na, puriso  saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ^a^V1.0262^ea^ mahato rukkhassa  ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m  ^a^P1.0199^ea^, papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya ^a^M1.0259^ea^ pakkameyya `saara'nti  ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na  vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi  taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m  bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato  rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m  atikkamma taca.m papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano.  ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.

text.1089: [03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, braahma.na, idhekacco puggalo  saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi  jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi  upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m  pabbajito samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena  laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena  laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi  laabhasakkaarasilokavaa, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti.  laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa  ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya na chanda.m janeti, na vaayamati,  oliinavuttiko ca hoti saathaliko. seyyathaapi so, braahma.na,  puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato  rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m  atikkamma taca.m atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa ^a^T1.0378^ea^ aadaaya  pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m  ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m  vadaami.
text.109: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``mayhampi kho, braahma.na, pubbeva sambodhaa  anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi --  `durabhisambhavaani hi kho ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani,  dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m  alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno'ti. tassa mayha.m braahma.na, etadahosi --  `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aparisuddhakaayakammantaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  aparisuddhakaayakammantasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m  aparisuddhakaayakammanto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani  pa.tisevaami; parisuddhakaayakammantohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa  parisuddhakaayakammantaa ^a^M1.0021^ea^ ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^V1.0023^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani  pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na,  parisuddhakaayakammata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m  ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1090: [03] 319^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo saddhaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa  jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi,  dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito  samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena  laabhasakkaarasilokena na ^a^M1.0261^ea^ attamano hoti na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so  tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti.  laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca  tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati ^a^V1.0264^ea^,  anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so siilasampada.m aaraadheti.  so taaya siilasampadaaya attamano hoti, paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so  taaya siilasampadaaya attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi siilavaa  kalyaa.nadhammo, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu dussiilaa paapadhammaa'ti.  siilasampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m  dhammaana.m ^a^P1.0201^ea^ sacchikiriyaaya na chanda.m janeti, na  vaayamati, oliinavuttiko ca hoti saathaliko. seyyathaapi so,  braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii ^a^T1.0379^ea^ saarapariyesana.m caramaano  mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m  atikkamma taca.m, papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano.  ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m, ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissati.  tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
