text.1093: [03] 322^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo saddhaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa  jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi ^a^V1.0266^ea^,  dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto ^a^T1.0382^ea^, appeva naama imassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito  samaano ^a^P1.0203^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so  tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo.  so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti.  laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca  tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati,  anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so siilasampada.m aaraadheti.  so taaya siilasampadaaya attamano hoti, no ca kho  paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya siilasampadaaya na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m  vambheti. siilasampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa  ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati,  anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so samaadhisampada.m  aaraadheti. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya attamano hoti, no ca kho  paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya na attaanukka.mseti, na  para.m vambheti. samaadhisampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca  pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati,  anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so ~naa.nadassana.m aaraadheti.  so tena ~naa.nadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho  paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena ~naa.nadassanena na attaanukka.mseti, na ^a^M1.0264^ea^ para.m  vambheti. ~naa.nadassanena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ^a^T1.0383^ea^  ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati,  anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko.
text.1094: [03] 323^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, braahma.na, dhammaa ~naa.nadassanena  uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca? idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu vivicceva  kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m  piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na,  dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.
text.1095: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa  ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m  piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na,  dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.
text.1096: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako  ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano ^a^V1.0267^ea^ sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m  ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho ^a^P1.0204^ea^,  braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.
text.1097: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi  kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.
text.1098: [01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m  samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati.  ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro  ca.
text.1099: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja  viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca  pa.niitataro ca.
text.11: [01] ``deve devato sa~njaanaati; deve devato sa~n~natvaa deve  ma~n~nati, devesu ma~n~nati, devato ma~n~nati, deve meti ma~n~nati, deve  abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.110: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aparisuddhavaciikammantaa...pe0...  aparisuddhamanokammantaa ^a^T1.0030^ea^ ...pe0... aparisuddhaajiivaa ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, aparisuddhaajiivasandosahetu have te  bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m  aparisuddhaajiivo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  parisuddhaajiivohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa parisuddhaajiivaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, parisuddhaajiivata.m attani  sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1100: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.  ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca  pa.niitataro ca.
text.1101: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0265^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi  kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca ^a^T1.0384^ea^ pa.niitataro ca.
text.1102: [03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa  disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo  ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca. ime kho, braahma.na,  dhammaa ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca.
text.1103: [03] 324^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0268^ea^ so, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko  saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato  saara.myeva chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti jaanamaano. ya~ncassa  saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m anubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m,  braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.
text.1104: [03] ``iti kho, braahma.na, nayida.m brahmacariya.m  laabhasakkaarasilokaanisa.msa.m, na siilasampadaanisa.msa.m, na  samaadhisampadaanisa.msa.m, na ~naa.nadassanaanisa.msa.m. yaa ca kho aya.m  ^a^P1.0205^ea^, braahma.na, akuppaa cetovimutti -- etadatthamida.m,  braahma.na, brahmacariya.m, eta.m saara.m eta.m pariyosaana''nti.
text.1105: [03] eva.m vutte, pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0...  upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
text.111: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa abhijjhaaluu kaamesu tibbasaaraagaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  abhijjhaalukaamesutibbasaaraagasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m abhijjhaalu kaamesu  tibbasaaraago ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  anabhijjhaaluuhamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa anabhijjhaaluu  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti ^a^P1.0018^ea^,  tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, anabhijjhaaluta.m attani  sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1113: [03] 325^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0266^ea^ ^a^V1.0269^ea^ ^a^T1.0386^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike  {naadike (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ~naatike (ka0)}  viharati gi~njakaavasathe. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca  anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo {kimbilo (sii0 pii0  ka0)}  gosi"ngasaalavanadaaye viharanti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m  pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena gosi"ngasaalavanadaayo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa  kho daayapaalo bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``maa, sama.na, eta.m daaya.m paavisi. santettha tayo  kulaputtaa attakaamaruupaa viharanti. maa tesa.m aphaasumakaasii''ti.
text.1114: [03] assosi kho aayasmaa anuruddho daayapaalassa bhagavataa saddhi.m  mantayamaanassa. sutvaana daayapaala.m etadavoca -- ``maa, aavuso  daayapaala, bhagavanta.m vaaresi. satthaa no bhagavaa anuppatto''ti. atha  kho aayasmaa anuruddho yenaayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta~nca nandiya.m aayasmanta~nca  kimila.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkamathaayasmanto, abhikkamathaayasmanto,  satthaa no bhagavaa ^a^P1.0206^ea^ anuppatto''ti. atha ^a^T1.0387^ea^ kho  aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo  bhagavanta.m paccuggantvaa -- eko bhagavato pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, eko  aasana.m pa~n~napesi, eko paadodaka.m upa.t.thaapesi. nisiidi bhagavaa  pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa paade pakkhaalesi. tepi kho  aayasmanto bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1115: [03] 326^b^.^eb^ ``kacci vo, anuruddhaa, khamaniiya.m, kacci  yaapaniiya.m, kacci pi.n.dakena na kilamathaa''ti ^a^V1.0270^ea^? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa,  yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa; na ca maya.m, bhante, pi.n.dakena kilamaamaa''ti.  ``kacci pana vo, anuruddhaa, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa  khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharathaa''ti?  ``taggha maya.m ^a^M1.0267^ea^, bhante, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa  khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharaamaa''ti.  ``yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, samaggaa sammodamaanaa  avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa  viharathaa''ti? ``idha mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `laabhaa vata me,  suladdha.m vata me, yoha.m evaruupehi sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharaamii'ti.  tassa mayha.m, bhante, imesu aayasmantesu metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m  aavi ceva raho ca; metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca;  metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca. tassa mayha.m, bhante,  eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa ^a^T1.0388^ea^ imesa.myeva  aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vatteyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhante,  saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena  vattaami. naanaa hi kho no, bhante, kaayaa eka~nca pana ma~n~ne  citta''nti.
text.1116: [03] aayasmaapi kho nandiyo...pe0... aayasmaapi kho kimilo  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mayhampi, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `laabhaa vata  me, suladdha.m vata me, yoha.m evaruupehi sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharaamii'ti.  tassa mayha.m, bhante, imesu aayasmantesu metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m  aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca,  metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca. tassa mayha.m, bhante,  eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m saka.m ^a^P1.0207^ea^ citta.m nikkhipitvaa  imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vatteyya'nti. so kho aha.m,  bhante, saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa  vasena vattaami. naanaa hi kho no, bhante, kaayaa eka~nca pana ma~n~ne  cittanti.
text.1117: [03] ``eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa  khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharaamaa''ti.
text.1118: [03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! kacci pana vo,  anuruddhaa, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharathaa''ti? ``taggha  maya.m, bhante, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharaamaa''ti. ``yathaa ^a^V1.0271^ea^  katha.m pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharathaa''ti?  ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m yo pa.thama.m gaamato pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati so  aasanaani ^a^T1.0389^ea^ pa~n~napeti, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapeti, avakkaarapaati.m  upa.t.thaapeti. yo pacchaa gaamato ^a^M1.0268^ea^ pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati, sace hoti  bhuttaavaseso sace aaka"nkhati bhu~njati, no ce aaka"nkhati appaharite  vaa cha.d.deti, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapeti. so aasanaani  pa.tisaameti, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m pa.tisaameti, avakkaarapaati.m  pa.tisaameti, bhattagga.m sammajjati. yo passati paaniiyagha.ta.m vaa  paribhojaniiyagha.ta.m vaa vaccagha.ta.m vaa ritta.m tuccha.m so upa.t.thaapeti.  sacassa hoti avisayha.m, hatthavikaarena dutiya.m aamantetvaa  hatthavila"nghakena upa.t.thaapema, na tveva maya.m, bhante, tappaccayaa vaaca.m  bhindaama. pa~ncaahika.m kho pana maya.m, bhante, sabbarattika.m dhammiyaa  kathaaya sannisiidaama. eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, appamattaa aataapino  pahitattaa viharaamaa''ti.
text.1119: [03] 328^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! atthi pana vo,  anuruddhaa, eva.m appamattaana.m aataapiina.m pahitattaana.m viharantaana.m   uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti?  ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva  aaka"nkhaama vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m  savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. aya.m  kho no, bhante, amhaaka.m appamattaana.m aataapiina.m pahitattaana.m viharantaana.m  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.112: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa byaapannacittaa padu.t.thamanasa"nkappaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^T1.0031^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  byaapannacittapadu.t.thamanasa"nkappasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m byaapannacitto  padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  mettacittohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa mettacittaa ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m,  braahma.na, mettacittata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m  ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1120: [03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa ^a^T1.0390^ea^ pana vo, anuruddhaa,  vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa ^a^P1.0208^ea^  pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi  no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa  pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.1121: [03] ``saadhu ^a^V1.0272^ea^ saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa,  vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi ^a^M1.0269^ea^ no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante,  yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhakaa ca viharaama,  sataa ca sampajaanaa, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedema, ya.m ta.m ariyaa  aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa  vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.1122: [03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa,  vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti ^a^T1.0391^ea^? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante,  yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa  samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttari  manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.1123: [03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa,  vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante,  yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m  attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^P1.0209^ea^ upasampajja viharaama.  etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa  pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.1124: [03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa,  vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante,  yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama ^a^V1.0273^ea^ sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaama...pe0...  sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0392^ea^ samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaama...pe0... sabbaso  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^M1.0270^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja  viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa  pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.
text.1125: [03] 329^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo,  anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa  attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato  phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante,  yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharaama, pa~n~naaya ca no disvaa  aasavaa parikkhii.naa. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya  etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro. imamhaa ca  maya.m, bhante, phaasuvihaaraa a~n~na.m phaasuvihaara.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m  vaa na samanupassaamaa''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! imamhaa  phaasuvihaaraa uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa phaasuvihaaro natthii''ti.
text.1126: [03] 330^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta~nca anuruddha.m  aayasmanta~nca nandiya.m aayasmanta~nca kimila.m dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa ^a^T1.0393^ea^ samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.  atha kho aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca  kimilo bhagavanta.m anusa.myaayitvaa {anusa.msaavetvaa (sii0), anusaavetvaa (.tiikaa)} tato pa.tinivattitvaa aayasmaa ca  nandiyo ^a^P1.0210^ea^ aayasmaa ca kimilo aayasmanta.m  anuruddha.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m nu kho maya.m aayasmato anuruddhassa  evamaarocimha -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m maya.m  laabhino'ti, ya.m no aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavato sammukhaa yaava  aasavaana.m khayaa pakaasetii''ti? ``na kho me aayasmanto  evamaarocesu.m -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m maya.m  laabhino'ti, api ca me aayasmantaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca vidito  -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m ime aayasmanto  laabhino'ti. devataapi me ^a^M1.0271^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- `imaasa~nca  imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m ime aayasmanto laabhino'ti. tamena.m  bhagavataa pa~nhaabhipu.t.thena byaakata''nti.
text.1127: [03] 331^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0274^ea^ kho diigho parajano yakkho yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho diigho parajano yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``laabhaa vata, bhante, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa vajjipajaaya, yattha  tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtaa --  aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo, aayasmaa ca  kimilo''ti. diighassa parajanassa yakkhassa sadda.m sutvaa bhummaa devaa  saddamanussaavesu.m -- `laabhaa ^a^T1.0394^ea^ vata, bho, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa  vajjipajaaya, yattha tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca  tayo kulaputtaa -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo,  aayasmaa ca kimilo'ti. bhummaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa  caatumahaaraajikaa devaa...pe0... taavati.msaa devaa...pe0... yaamaa  devaa...pe0... tusitaa devaa...pe0... nimmaanaratii devaa...pe0...  paranimmitavasavattii devaa...pe0... brahmakaayikaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m  -- ``laabhaa vata, bho, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa vajjipajaaya, yattha  tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtaa --  aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo, aayasmaa ca  kimilo''ti. itiha te aayasmanto tena kha.nena (tena layena) {( ) sii0  syaa0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} tena  muhuttena yaavabrahmalokaa viditaa {sa.mviditaa (ka0)} ahesu.m.
text.1128: [01] ``evameta.m, diigha, evameta.m, diigha! yasmaapi, diigha,  kulaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, ta~ncepi  kula.m ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta.m anussareyya, tassapaassa kulassa  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, kulapariva.t.taa ete tayo  kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^P1.0211^ea^ pabbajitaa, so  cepi kulapariva.t.to ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya,  tassapaassa kulapariva.t.tassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi,  diigha, gaamaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, so  cepi gaamo ete tayo kulaputte ^a^M1.0272^ea^ pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa  gaamassa ^a^T1.0395^ea^ diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, nigamaa ete tayo  kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, so cepi nigamo ete  tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa nigamassa diigharatta.m  hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, nagaraa ete tayo kulaputtaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, ta~ncepi nagara.m ete tayo kulaputte  pasannacitta.m anussareyya, tassapaassa nagarassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.  yasmaapi, diigha, janapadaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajitaa, so cepi janapado ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto  anussareyya, tassapaassa janapadassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sabbe  cepi, diigha, khattiyaa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa ^a^V1.0275^ea^ anussareyyu.m,  sabbesaana.mpaassa khattiyaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sabbe cepi,  diigha, braahma.naa...pe0... sabbe cepi, diigha, vessaa...pe0... sabbe  cepi, diigha, suddaa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa anussareyyu.m,  sabbesaana.mpaassa suddaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sadevako cepi,  diigha, loko samaarako sabrahmako sassama.nabraahma.nii pajaa sadevamanussaa  ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa anussareyya, sadevakassapaassa lokassa  samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. passa, diigha, yaava ete tayo kulaputtaa  bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya, atthaaya hitaaya  sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti.
text.1129: [03] idamavoca ^a^T1.0396^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano diigho parajano yakkho bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.113: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M1.0022^ea^ ^a^V1.0024^ea^ mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thitaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thaanasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thito  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  vigatathiinamiddhohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa vigatathiinamiddhaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, vigatathiinamiddhata.m attani  sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1132: [03] 332^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0397^ea^ ^a^V1.0276^ea^ ^a^P1.0212^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa gosi"ngasaalavanadaaye viharati sambahulehi abhi~n~naatehi  abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m -- aayasmataa ca saariputtena  aayasmataa ca mahaamoggallaanena aayasmataa ^a^M1.0273^ea^ ca mahaakassapena aayasmataa  ca anuruddhena aayasmataa ca revatena aayasmataa ca aanandena, a~n~nehi  ca abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m. atha kho  aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa  mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m  etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso, kassapa, yenaayasmaa saariputto  tenupasa"nkamissaama dhammassavanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho  aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosi.  atha kho aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano aayasmaa ca mahaakassapo  aayasmaa ca anuruddho yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu  dhammassavanaaya. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta~nca  mahaamoggallaana.m aayasmanta~nca mahaakassapa.m aayasmanta~nca anuruddha.m  yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkamante dhammassavanaaya. disvaana  yenaayasmaa revato tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m revata.m  etadavoca -- ``upasa"nkamantaa kho amuu, aavuso {aayasmantaavuso (ka0)} revata, sappurisaa  yenaayasmaa saariputto ^a^T1.0398^ea^ tena dhammassavanaaya. aayaamaavuso revata,  yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkamissaama dhammassavanaayaa''ti.  ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa revato aayasmato aanandassa  paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa ca revato aayasmaa ca aanando  yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu dhammassavanaaya.
text.1133: [03] 333^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta~nca  revata.m aayasmanta~nca aananda.m duuratova aagacchante. disvaana  aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho aayasmaa aanando!  svaagata.m aayasmato aanandassa bhagavato upa.t.thaakassa bhagavato  santikaavacarassa! rama.niiya.m, aavuso aananda, gosi"ngasaalavana.m,  dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa {sabbapaaliphullaa (sii0)} saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa  sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso aananda, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m  sobheyyaa''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta ^a^P1.0213^ea^, bhikkhu  bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa  majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa ^a^M1.0274^ea^ saatthaa sabya~njanaa;   kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^V1.0277^ea^  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti,  dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, vacasaa paricitaa, manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa.  so catassanna.m parisaana.m dhamma.m deseti parima.n.dalehi padabya~njanehi  anuppabandhehi {appabaddhehi (sii0 pii0)} anusayasamugghaataaya. evaruupena kho, aavuso  saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1134: [03] 334^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m revata.m  etadavoca ^a^T1.0399^ea^ -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso revata, aayasmataa aanandena  yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pucchaama --  `rama.niiya.m, aavuso revata, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti,  sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena,  aavuso revata, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti?  ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu pa.tisallaanaaraamo hoti pa.tisallaanarato,  ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto aniraakatajjhaano, vipassanaaya  samannaagato, bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana.m. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta,  bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1135: [03] 335^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m  anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso anuruddha, aayasmataa  revatena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m  pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso anuruddha, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa  ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti;  katha.mruupena, aavuso anuruddha, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m  sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketi.  seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, cakkhumaa puriso uparipaasaadavaragato  sahassa.m nemima.n.dalaana.m volokeyya; evameva kho, aavuso saariputta,  bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m  lokaana.m voloketi. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1136: [03] 336^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0400^ea^ ^a^M1.0275^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m  mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso kassapa,  aayasmataa anuruddhena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m  aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso kassapa,  gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa,  ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso kassapa, bhikkhunaa  ^a^P1.0214^ea^ gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso  saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa ca aara~n~niko ^a^V1.0278^ea^ hoti aara~n~nikattassa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pi.n.dapaatiko hoti pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko hoti pa.msukuulikattassa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca teciivariko hoti teciivarikattassa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca appiccho hoti appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii,  attanaa ca santu.t.tho hoti santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca  pavivitto hoti pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho hoti  asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo hoti  viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti  siilasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti  samaadhisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti  pa~n~naasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti  vimuttisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno  hoti vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii. evaruupena kho,  aavuso saariputta ^a^T1.0401^ea^, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1137: [03] 337^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m  mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso moggallaana,  aayasmataa mahaakassapena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m  aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso moggallaana,  gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa,  ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, dve bhikkhuu  abhidhammakatha.m kathenti, te a~n~nama~n~na.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, a~n~nama~n~nassa  pa~nha.m pu.t.thaa vissajjenti, no ca sa.msaadenti {sa.msaarenti (ka0)}, dhammii ca nesa.m kathaa  pavattinii hoti. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1138: [03] 338^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0276^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso saariputta, amhehi  sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso saariputta, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa  ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti;  katha.mruupena, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m  sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti,  no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa  aaka"nkhati ^a^P1.0215^ea^ pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa ^a^T1.0402^ea^  aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m {majjhantikasamaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa  majjhanhikasamaya.m ^a^V1.0279^ea^ viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati  saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati.  seyyathaapi, aavuso moggallaana, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa  naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m dussakara.n.dako puuro assa. so ya~n~nadeva  dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m  pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya  majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m majjhanhikasamaya.m  paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya saayanhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m  tadeva dussayuga.m saayanhasamaya.m paarupeyya. evameva kho, aavuso  moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena  vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m  viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa  aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa  saayanhasamaya.m viharati. evaruupena kho, aavuso moggallaana,  bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1139: [03] 339^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto te aayasmante  etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m  pa.tibhaana.m. aayaamaavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama;  upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m ^a^M1.0277^ea^ bhagavato ^a^T1.0403^ea^ aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa  byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te  aayasmanto aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. atha kho te  aayasmanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --   ``addasa.m kho aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta~nca revata.m aayasmanta~nca  aananda.m duuratova aagacchante. disvaana aayasmanta.m ^a^P1.0216^ea^  aananda.m etadavoca.m -- `etu kho aayasmaa aanando!  svaagata.m aayasmato aanandassa bhagavato upa.t.thaakassa bhagavato  santikaavacarassa! rama.niiya.m, aavuso aananda, gosi"ngasaalavana.m,  dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa  sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso aananda, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m  sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa aanando ma.m etadavoca --  `idhaavuso, saariputta, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo...pe0...  anusayasamugghaataaya. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m ^a^V1.0280^ea^ sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yathaa  ta.m aanandova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. aanando hi,  saariputta, bahussuto sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa  aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saatthaa sabya~njanaa;  kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^T1.0404^ea^ brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa  bahussutaa honti, dhaataa, vacasaa paricitaa, manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa  suppa.tividdhaa. so catassanna.m parisaana.m dhamma.m deseti parima.n.dalehi  padabya~njanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghaataayaa''ti.
text.114: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa uddhataa avuupasantacittaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  uddhataavuupasantacittasandosahetu ^a^T1.0032^ea^ have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m uddhato avuupasantacitto  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  vuupasantacittohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa vuupasantacittaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, vuupasantacittata.m attani sampassamaano  bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1140: [03] 340^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m revata.m  etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso revata aayasmataa aanandena  yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pucchaama --  rama.niiya.m, aavuso revata, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti,  sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa ma~n~ne gandhaa sampavanti. katha.mruupena,  aavuso revata, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte,  bhante, aayasmaa revato ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta bhikkhu  pa.tisallaanaaraamo hoti pa.tisallaanarato ^a^M1.0278^ea^, ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto,  aniraakatajjhaano, vipassanaaya samannaagato, bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana.m.  evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m  sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yathaa ta.m revatova sammaa  byaakaramaano byaakareyya. revato hi, saariputta, pa.tisallaanaaraamo  pa.tisallaanarato, ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto aniraakatajjhaano,  vipassanaaya samannaagato bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana''nti.
text.1141: [03] 341^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^P1.0217^ea^ vutte, aha.m, bhante,  aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho aavuso anuruddha  aayasmataa revatena...pe0... katha.mruupena, aavuso ^a^T1.0405^ea^ anuruddha, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho  ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketi.  seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, cakkhumaa puriso...pe0... evaruupena kho  aavuso saariputta bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti.  ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta, yathaa ta.m anuruddhova sammaa byaakaramaano  byaakareyya. anuruddho hi, saariputta, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketii''ti.
text.1142: [03] 342^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m  mahaakassapa.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso ^a^V1.0281^ea^ kassapa aayasmataa  anuruddhena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m  mahaakassapa.m pucchaama...pe0... katha.m ruupena kho, aavuso kassapa,  bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte bhante, aayasmaa  mahaakassapo ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa  ca aara~n~niko hoti aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca  pi.n.dapaatiko hoti...pe0... attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko hoti...pe0...  attanaa ca teciivariko hoti...pe0... attanaa ca appiccho  hoti...pe0... attanaa ca santu.t.tho hoti...pe0... attanaa ca  pavivitto hoti...pe0... attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho hoti...pe0... attanaa  ca aaraddhaviiriyo hoti...pe0... attanaa ca siilasampanno  hoti...pe0... attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti...pe0... attanaa ca  pa~n~naasampanno hoti... attanaa ca  vimuttisampanno ^a^T1.0406^ea^ hoti... ^a^M1.0279^ea^ attanaa ca  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca  va.n.navaadii. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti ^a^P1.0218^ea^. ``saadhu  saadhu, saariputta! yathaa ta.m kassapova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya.  kassapo hi, saariputta, attanaa ca aara~n~niko aara~n~nikattassa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pi.n.dapaatiko pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadii,  attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca  teciivariko teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca appiccho  appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca santu.t.tho santu.t.thiyaa ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pavivitto pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa  ca asa.msa.t.tho asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo  viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca siilasampanno siilasampadaaya  ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca samaadhisampanno samaadhisampadaaya ca  va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno pa~n~naasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii,  attanaa ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca  va.n.navaadii''ti.
text.1143: [03] 343^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m bhante aayasmanta.m  mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso moggallaana,  aayasmataa mahaakassapena ^a^T1.0407^ea^ yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m  aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m pucchaama...pe0... katha.mruupena, aavuso  moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte,  bhante, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso  saariputta, dve bhikkhuu abhidhammakatha.m kathenti. te a~n~nama~n~na.m pa~nha.m  pucchanti, a~n~nama~n~nassa ^a^V1.0282^ea^ pa~nha.m pu.t.thaa vissajjenti, no ca sa.msaadenti,  dhammii ca nesa.m kathaa pavattinii hoti. evaruupena kho, aavuso  saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu  saadhu, saariputta, yathaa ta.m moggallaanova sammaa byaakaramaano  byaakareyya. moggallaano hi, saariputta, dhammakathiko''ti.
text.1144: [03] 344^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``atha khvaaha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca.m  -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso saariputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m  pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani ^a^M1.0280^ea^ maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m pucchaama --  rama.niiya.m, aavuso saariputta, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti,  sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti. katha.mruupena,  aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m  vutte, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso,  moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena  vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m  viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^T1.0408^ea^ viharati; yaaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. seyyathaapi, aavuso  moggallaana, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m  dussakara.n.dako puuro assa. so ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya  pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupitu.m ^a^P1.0219^ea^, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m  pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya  majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m majjhanhikasamaya.m  paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya saayanhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m  tadeva dussayuga.m saayanhasamaya.m paarupeyya. evameva kho, aavuso  moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena  vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m  viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya  vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. evaruupena kho, aavuso  moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu  saadhu, moggallaana! yathaa ta.m saariputtova sammaa byaakaramaano  byaakareyya. saariputto hi, moggallaana, citta.m vasa.m vatteti no ca  saariputto cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa ^a^T1.0409^ea^ ^a^V1.0283^ea^   aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa  pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati  majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m  viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m  viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharatii''ti.
text.1145: [03] 345^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0281^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``kassa nu kho, bhante, subhaasita''nti? ``sabbesa.m  vo, saariputta, subhaasita.m pariyaayena. api ca mamapi su.naatha  yathaaruupena bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyya. idha, saariputta,  bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa  uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m  palla"nka.m bhindissaami yaava me naanupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m  vimuccissatii'ti. evaruupena kho, saariputta, bhikkhunaa  gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.
text.1146: [01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te aayasmanto {te bhikkhuu (ka0)} bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.1149: [03] 346^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0410^ea^ ^a^V1.0284^ea^ ^a^P1.0220^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti.  ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.115: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ka"nkhii vicikicchii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  ka"nkhivicikicchisandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m ka"nkhii vicikicchii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  ti.n.navicikicchohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa ti.n.navicikicchaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, ti.n.navicikicchata.m attani  sampassamaano ^a^P1.0019^ea^ bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne  vihaaraaya.
text.1150: [03] ``ekaadasahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato gopaalako  abhabbo goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m {phaatikattu.m (sii0 pii0), phaatikaatu.m  (syaa0 ka.m0)}. katamehi ekaadasahi? idha,  bhikkhave, gopaalako na ruupa~n~nuu hoti, na lakkha.nakusalo hoti, na  aasaa.tika.m haaretaa {saa.tetaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} hoti, na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti, na dhuuma.m kattaa  hoti, na tittha.m jaanaati, na piita.m jaanaati, na viithi.m jaanaati, na  gocarakusalo hoti anavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te usabhaa  gopitaro gopari.naayakaa te na atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti. imehi  kho, bhikkhave, ekaadasahi a"ngehi samannaagato gopaalako abhabbo  goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ekaadasahi  dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^M1.0282^ea^ vuddhi.m  viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi ekaadasahi? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti, na lakkha.nakusalo hoti, na aasaa.tika.m  haaretaa hoti, na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti, na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti, na  tittha.m jaanaati, na piita.m jaanaati, na viithi.m jaanaati, na  gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te ^a^T1.0411^ea^ bhikkhuu theraa  ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te na  atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti.
text.1151: [03] 347^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m sabba.m ruupa.m `cattaari  mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti.
text.1152: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkha.nakusalo hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `kammalakkha.no ^a^V1.0285^ea^ baalo, kammalakkha.no  pa.n.dito'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na  lakkha.nakusalo hoti.
text.1153: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m adhivaaseti, nappajahati na  vinodeti na byantii karoti na anabhaava.m gameti. uppanna.m  byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0... uppannuppanne  paapake akusale dhamme adhivaaseti, nappajahati ^a^P1.0221^ea^  na vinodeti na byantii karoti na anabhaava.m gameti. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti.
text.1154: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa nimittaggaahii hoti  anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa  sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati ^a^T1.0412^ea^ cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye na  sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m  ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m  phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya nimittaggaahii hoti  anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa  sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na ^a^M1.0283^ea^ rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye na sa.mvara.m  aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti.
text.1155: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m na vitthaarena paresa.m  desetaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti.
text.1156: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na tittha.m jaanaati? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa  vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa na  paripucchati, na paripa~nhati -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m? imassa ko  attho'ti? tassa te aayasmanto aviva.ta~nceva na vivaranti,  anuttaaniikata~nca na uttaanii karonti, anekavihitesu ^a^V1.0286^ea^ ca  ka"nkhaa.thaaniiyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m na pa.tivinodenti. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu na tittha.m jaanaati.
text.1157: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na piita.m jaanaati? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamaane na labhati  atthaveda.m, na labhati dhammaveda.m, na labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na piita.m jaanaati.
text.1158: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ^a^T1.0413^ea^ viithi.m jaanaati? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na viithi.m jaanaati.
text.1159: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaaro satipa.t.thaane yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m  kho, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0222^ea^, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti.
text.116: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa attukka.msakaa paravambhii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  attukka.msanaparavambhanasandosahetu have te bhonto ^a^M1.0023^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti ^a^T1.0033^ea^. na kho panaaha.m attukka.msako paravambhii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami ^a^V1.0025^ea^; anattukka.msako  aparavambhiihamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa anattukka.msakaa aparavambhii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, anattukka.msakata.m aparavambhita.m attani  sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1160: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anavasesadohii hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m saddhaa gahapatikaa abhiha.t.thu.m pavaarenti  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarehi, tatra  bhikkhu matta.m na jaanaati pa.tiggaha.naaya. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  anavasesadohii hoti.
text.1161: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu  cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te na atirekapuujaaya  puujetaa hoti ^a^M1.0284^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu  cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa, tesu na metta.m kaayakamma.m  paccupa.t.thaapeti aavi ceva raho ca; na metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thaapeti  aavi ceva raho ca; na metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thaapeti aavi ceva raho  ca. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu  cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te na atirekapuujaaya  puujetaa hoti.
text.1162: [03] ``imehi kho bhikkhave ekaadasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m.
text.1163: [03] 348^b^.^eb^ ``ekaadasahi ^a^V1.0287^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato  gopaalako bhabbo goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi  ekaadasahi? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0414^ea^, gopaalako ruupa~n~nuu hoti,  lakkha.nakusalo hoti, aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti, va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa  hoti, dhuuma.m kattaa hoti, tittha.m jaanaati, piita.m jaanaati, viithi.m  jaanaati, gocarakusalo hoti, saavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te  usabhaa gopitaro gopari.naayakaa te atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti.  imehi kho, bhikkhave, ekaadasahi a"ngehi samannaagato gopaalako  bhabbo goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave,  ekaadasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye  vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi ekaadasahi? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupa~n~nuu hoti, lakkha.nakusalo hoti, aasaa.tika.m  haaretaa hoti, va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti, dhuuma.m kattaa hoti, tittha.m  jaanaati, piita.m jaanaati, viithi.m jaanaati, gocarakusalo hoti,  saavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajitaa  sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti.

text.1179: [03] 350^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0418^ea^ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^a^P1.0225^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati ukkacelaaya.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire.  tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti.  ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.118: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaanaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  laabhasakkaarasilokanikaamana {nikaamayamaana (sii0 syaa0)} sandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m  nikaamayamaano ^a^T1.0034^ea^ ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  appicchohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa appicchaa ara~n~navanapatthaani  pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m,  braahma.na, appicchata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m  ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1180: [03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^M1.0287^ea^, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako duppa~n~najaatiko,  vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye, asamavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa  orima.m tiira.m, asamavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, atittheneva gaavo  pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, gaavo  majjhega"ngaaya nadiyaa sote aama.n.daliya.m karitvaa tattheva anayabyasana.m  aapajji.msu. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, maagadhako  gopaalako duppa~n~najaatiko, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye,  asamavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m tiira.m, asamavekkhitvaa paarima.m  tiira.m, atittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. evameva  kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci {ye keci (syaa0 ka.m0)} sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa akusalaa imassa  lokassa akusalaa parassa lokassa, akusalaa maaradheyyassa akusalaa  amaaradheyyassa, akusalaa maccudheyyassa akusalaa amaccudheyyassa, tesa.m  ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m  ahitaaya dukkhaaya.
text.1181: [03] 351^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako  sappa~n~najaatiko, vassaana.m ^a^T1.0419^ea^ pacchime maase saradasamaye, samavekkhitvaa  ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m tiira.m, samavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, tittheneva  gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. so pa.thama.m pataaresi ye te  usabhaa gopitaro gopari.naayakaa. te tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa  sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare pataaresi balavagaavo dammagaavo.  tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare  pataaresi vacchatare vacchatariyo. tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa  sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare pataaresi vacchake kisaabalake {kisabalake  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.  tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. bhuutapubba.m,  bhikkhave, vacchako taru.nako taavadeva jaatako maatugoravakena  vuyhamaano, sopi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m  agamaasi. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa ^a^V1.0291^ea^ hi so, bhikkhave, maagadhako  gopaalako sappa~n~najaatiko ^a^P1.0226^ea^, vassaana.m pacchime  maase saradasamaye, samavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m ^a^M1.0288^ea^ tiira.m,  samavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, tittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m  suvidehaana.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa  braahma.naa vaa kusalaa imassa lokassa kusalaa parassa lokassa,  kusalaa maaradheyyassa kusalaa amaaradheyyassa, kusalaa maccudheyyassa  kusalaa amaccudheyyassa, tesa.m ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti,  tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.
text.1182: [03] 352^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0420^ea^, bhikkhave, ye te usabhaa  gopitaro gopari.naayakaa te tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa  paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu arahanto  khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, te tiriya.m maarassa sota.m  chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gataa.
text.1183: [03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, balavagaavo dammagaavo tiriya.m  ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave,  ye te bhikkhuu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa  opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa, tepi  tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.
text.1184: [03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, vacchataraa vacchatariyo tiriya.m  ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave,  ye te bhikkhuu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa  sakadaagaamino saki.mdeva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti,  tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.
text.1185: [03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, vacchakaa kisaabalakaa tiriya.m  ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave,  ye te bhikkhuu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa  avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaayanaa, tepi tiriya.m maarassa  sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.
text.1186: [01] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, vacchako taru.nako taavadeva  jaatako maatugoravakena ^a^T1.0421^ea^ vuyhamaano tiriya.m ^a^V1.0292^ea^ ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa  sotthinaa ^a^M1.0289^ea^ paara.m agamaasi, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu  dhammaanusaarino saddhaanusaarino, tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa  sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.
text.1187: [03] ``aha.m kho pana, bhikkhave, kusalo ^a^P1.0227^ea^  imassa lokassa kusalo parassa lokassa, kusalo maaradheyyassa  kusalo amaaradheyyassa, kusalo maccudheyyassa kusalo amaccudheyyassa.  tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti, tesa.m  ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
text.1188: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaa sugato athaapara.m etadavoca  satthaa --
text.119: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti ^a^M1.0024^ea^,  kusiitahiinaviiriyasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m kusiito hiinaviiriyo  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  aaraddhaviiriyohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa aaraddhaviiriyaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, aaraddhaviiriyata.m attani sampassamaano  bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1190: [22] ya~nca maarena sampatta.m, appatta.m ya~nca maccunaa..
text.1194: [22] paamojjabahulaa hotha, khema.m pattattha {patthetha (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0 a.t.thakathaaya.m  sa.mva.n.netabbapaa.tho)} bhikkhavo''ti..
text.1197: [03] 353^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0422^ea^ ^a^V1.0293^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m  viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena saccako  niga.n.thaputto vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati bhassappavaadako pa.n.ditavaado  saadhusammato bahujanassa. so vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati  -- ``naaha.m ta.m passaami sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, sa"nghi.m ga.ni.m  ga.naacariya.m, api arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pa.tijaanamaana.m, yo mayaa  vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho na sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya,  yassa na kacchehi sedaa mucceyyu.m. thuu.na.m cepaaha.m acetana.m vaadena vaada.m  samaarabheyya.m, saapi mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddhaa ^a^M1.0290^ea^ sa"nkampeyya  sampakampeyya sampavedheyya. ko pana vaado manussabhuutassaa''ti?
text.1198: [03] atha  kho aayasmaa assaji pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya  vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.  addasaa kho saccako niga.n.thaputto vesaaliya.m ja"nghaavihaara.m  anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano ^a^P1.0228^ea^ aayasmanta.m  assaji.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yenaayasmaa assaji  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa assajinaa saddhi.m sammodi.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thito kho saccako niga.n.thaputto aayasmanta.m assaji.m  etadavoca -- ``katha.m pana, bho assaji, sama.no gotamo saavake  vineti, katha.mbhaagaa ^a^T1.0423^ea^ ca pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakesu anusaasanii  bahulaa pavattatii''ti? ``eva.m kho, aggivessana, bhagavaa saavake  vineti, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana bhagavato saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa  pavattati -- `ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa  aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. ruupa.m, bhikkhave,  anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m  anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'ti. eva.m  kho, aggivessana, bhagavaa saavake vineti, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana bhagavato  saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti. ``dussuta.m vata, bho  assaji, assumha ye maya.m eva.mvaadi.m sama.na.m gotama.m assumha. appeva  naama maya.m kadaaci karahaci tena bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m  samaagaccheyyaama ^a^V1.0294^ea^, appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo, appeva  naama tasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa viveceyyaamaa''ti.
text.1199: [03] 354^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani  licchavisataani santhaagaare {sandhaagaare (ka0)} sannipatitaani honti kenacideva  kara.niiyena. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto yena te licchavii  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``abhikkamantu  bhonto licchavii, abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, ajja me sama.nena  gotamena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo bhavissati. sace me sama.no gotamo  tathaa pati.t.thissati yathaa ca me {yathaassa me (sii0 pii0)} ~naata~n~natarena saavakena assajinaa naama  bhikkhunaa pati.t.thita.m, seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0424^ea^ naama balavaa puriso diighalomika.m  e.laka.m lomesu gahetvaa aaka.d.dheyya parika.d.dheyya samparika.d.dheyya ^a^M1.0291^ea^,  evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m aaka.d.dhissaami parika.d.dhissaami  samparika.d.dhissaami. seyyathaapi naama balavaa so.n.dikaakammakaaro  mahanta.m so.n.dikaaki.la~nja.m gambhiire udakarahade pakkhipitvaa ka.n.ne gahetvaa  aaka.d.dheyya parika.d.dheyya samparika.d.dheyya, evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m  vaadena vaada.m aaka.d.dhissaami parika.d.dhissaami samparika.d.dhissaami.  seyyathaapi naama balavaa so.n.dikaadhutto vaala.m ^a^P1.0229^ea^ {thaala.m (ka0)}  ka.n.ne gahetvaa odhuneyya niddhuneyya nippho.teyya {nicchaadeyya (sii0 pii0 ka0),  niccho.teyya (ka0), nippo.theyya (syaa0 ka.m0)} evamevaaha.m sama.na.m  gotama.m vaadena vaada.m odhunissaami niddhunissaami nippho.tessaami.  seyyathaapi naama ku~njaro sa.t.thihaayano gambhiira.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa  saa.nadhovika.m naama kii.litajaata.m kii.lati, evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m  saa.nadhovika.m ma~n~ne kii.litajaata.m kii.lissaami. abhikkamantu bhonto  licchavii, abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, ajja me sama.nena gotamena  saddhi.m kathaasallaapo bhavissatii''ti. tatrekacce licchavii evamaaha.msu --  ``ki.m sama.no gotamo saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa vaada.m aaropessati,  atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m  aaropessatii''ti? ekacce licchavii evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m so  bhavamaano saccako niga.n.thaputto yo bhagavato vaada.m aaropessati, atha  kho bhagavaa saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa vaada.m aaropessatii''ti? atha  kho saccako ^a^T1.0425^ea^ niga.n.thaputto pa~ncamattehi licchavisatehi parivuto yena  mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami.
text.12: [03] ``pajaapati.m pajaapatito sa~njaanaati; pajaapati.m pajaapatito  sa~n~natvaa pajaapati.m ma~n~nati, pajaapatismi.m ma~n~nati, pajaapatito  ma~n~nati, pajaapati.m meti ma~n~nati, pajaapati.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa  hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.120: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^V1.0026^ea^ mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  ^a^P1.0020^ea^ kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mu.t.thassatii  asampajaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  mu.t.thassatiasampajaanasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m mu.t.thassati asampajaano  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  upa.t.thitassatihamasmi. ye ^a^T1.0035^ea^ hi vo ariyaa upa.t.thitassatii  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, upa.t.thitassatita.m attani sampassamaano  bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1200: [03] 355^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu  abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto yena te  bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m  nu kho, bho, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati? dassanakaamaa hi  maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti ^a^V1.0295^ea^. ``esa, aggivessana, bhagavaa mahaavana.m  ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisinno''ti.  atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto mahatiyaa licchaviparisaaya saddhi.m  mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. tepi kho licchavii appekacce bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa ^a^M1.0292^ea^ saddhi.m  sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.
text.1201: [03] 356^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho saccako niga.n.thaputto  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``puccheyyaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m ki~ncideva desa.m,  sace me bhava.m gotamo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti.  ``puccha, aggivessana ^a^T1.0426^ea^, yadaaka"nkhasii''ti ^a^P1.0230^ea^.  ``katha.m pana bhava.m gotamo saavake vineti, katha.mbhaagaa ca pana bhoto  gotamassa saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti? ``eva.m kho  aha.m, aggivessana, saavake vinemi, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana me saavakesu  anusaasanii bahulaa pavattati -- `ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, vedanaa  aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m.  ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa  anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa  anattaa'ti. eva.m kho aha.m, aggivessana, saavake vinemi, eva.mbhaagaa  ca pana me saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti.
text.1202: [03] ``upamaa ma.m, bho gotama, pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m,  aggivessanaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.
text.1203: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, ye kecime biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vuddhi.m  viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m  pati.t.thaaya. evamete biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m  aapajjanti. seyyathaapi vaa pana, bho gotama, ye kecime  balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m  pati.t.thaaya. evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti. evameva kho,  bho gotama, ruupattaaya.m purisapuggalo ruupe pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m  vaa pasavati, vedanattaaya.m purisapuggalo vedanaaya.m pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa ^a^V1.0296^ea^   apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, sa~n~nattaaya.m purisapuggalo sa~n~naaya.m pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m  vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, sa"nkhaarattaaya.m purisapuggalo sa"nkhaaresu ^a^T1.0427^ea^  pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, vi~n~naa.nattaaya.m purisapuggalo  vi~n~naa.ne pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavatii''ti.
text.1204: [03] ``nanu tva.m, aggivessana, eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa,  vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa, vi~n~naa.na.m me  attaa'''ti? ``aha~nhi, bho gotama ^a^M1.0293^ea^, eva.m vadaami -- `ruupa.m me  attaa, vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa,  vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'ti, aya~nca mahatii janataa''ti.
text.1205: [03] ``ki~nhi te, aggivessana, mahatii janataa karissati?  i"ngha tva.m, aggivessana, saka~n~neva vaada.m nibbe.thehii''ti. ``aha~nhi,  bho gotama, eva.m vadaami -- `ruupa.m me attaa, vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa  me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa, vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'''ti.
text.1206: [03] 357^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, aggivessana, ta~n~nevettha  pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m {tathaa ta.m (ka0)} byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m  ma~n~nasi ^a^P1.0231^ea^, aggivessana, vatteyya ra~n~no  khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa sakasmi.m vijite vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa  ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m, seyyathaapi  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa  ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassaa''ti? ``vatteyya, bho gotama, ra~n~no  khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa sakasmi.m vijite vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa  ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m, seyyathaapi  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa  ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa. imesampi hi, bho gotama, sa"nghaana.m  ga.naana.m -- seyyathida.m, vajjiina.m mallaana.m -- vattati sakasmi.m vijite  vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa  pabbaajetu.m. ki.m pana ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, seyyathaapi  ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa ^a^T1.0428^ea^, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa  ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa? vatteyya, bho gotama, vattitu~nca  marahatii''ti.
text.1207: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi --  `ruupa.m me attaa'ti, vattati te ^a^V1.0297^ea^ tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m me ruupa.m  hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto  tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m etadavoca  -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m  me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m  me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? dutiyampi ^a^M1.0294^ea^ kho saccako niga.n.thaputto  tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m etadavoca --  ``byaakarohi daani, aggivessana, na daani te tu.nhiibhaavassa kaalo.  yo koci, aggivessana tathaagatena yaavatatiya.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m  pu.t.tho na byaakaroti, etthevassa sattadhaa muddhaa phalatii''ti.
text.1208: [03] tena kho pana samayena vajirapaa.ni yakkho aayasa.m vajira.m  aadaaya aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa  uparivehaasa.m .thito hoti -- `sacaaya.m ^a^T1.0429^ea^ saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavataa  yaavatatiya.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakarissati etthevassa sattadhaa  muddha.m phaalessaamii'ti. ta.m kho pana vajirapaa.ni.m yakkha.m bhagavaa ceva  passati saccako ca niga.n.thaputto. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto  bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato bhagavanta.myeva ^a^P1.0232^ea^ taa.na.m  gavesii bhagavanta.myeva le.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.myeva sara.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``pucchatu ma.m bhava.m gotamo, byaakarissaamii''ti.
text.1209: [03] 358^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m  vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m  me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho  gotama''.
text.121: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  asamaahitavibbhantacittasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m asamaahito  vibbhantacitto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  samaadhisampannohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa samaadhisampannaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, samaadhisampada.m attani sampassamaano  bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
text.1210: [03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho,  aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa  pacchima.m pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m  tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `vedanaa me attaa'ti, vattati te tissa.m vedanaaya.m {taaya.m  vedanaaya.m (sii0 syaa0)}  vaso -- eva.m me vedanaa hotu, eva.m me vedanaa maa ahosii''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1211: [03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho,  aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa  pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana ^a^V1.0298^ea^, ya.m  tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `sa~n~naa me attaa'ti, vattati te tissa.m sa~n~naaya.m  vaso -- eva.m me sa~n~naa hotu, eva.m me sa~n~naa maa ahosii''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1212: [03] ``manasi ^a^M1.0295^ea^ karohi, aggivessana ^a^T1.0430^ea^; manasi karitvaa kho,  aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa  pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m  tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `sa"nkhaaraa me attaa'ti, vattati te tesu  sa"nkhaaresu vaso -- eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa hontu, eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa maa  ahesu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1213: [03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho,  aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa  pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m  tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m  vi~n~naa.ne vaso -- eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m hotu, eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m maa  ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1214: [03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho,  aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa  pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ruupa.m  nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bho gotama''. ``ya.m  panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bho gotama''.  ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m --  `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^P1.0233^ea^ me attaa'''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1215: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, vedanaa...pe0...  sa~n~naa...pe0... sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana,  vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bho gotama''.  ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bho  gotama''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m  samanupassitu.m ^a^T1.0431^ea^ -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
text.1216: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, yo nu kho dukkha.m alliino  dukkha.m upagato dukkha.m ajjhosito ^a^V1.0299^ea^, dukkha.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi,  eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, api nu kho so saama.m vaa dukkha.m  parijaaneyya, dukkha.m vaa parikkhepetvaa vihareyyaa''ti? ``ki~nhi  siyaa, bho gotama? no hida.m, bho gotamaa''ti.
text.1217: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, nanu tva.m eva.m sante dukkha.m  alliino dukkha.m upagato dukkha.m ajjhosito, dukkha.m -- `eta.m mama,  esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti? ``ki~nhi no  siyaa, bho gotama? evameta.m bho gotamaa''ti.
text.1218: [03] 359^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0296^ea^, aggivessana, puriso  saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (syaa0  ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya  vana.m paviseyya. so tattha passeyya mahanta.m kadalikkhandha.m uju.m nava.m  akukkukajaata.m {akukku.tajaata.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m muule chindeyya, muule chetvaa agge chindeyya,  agge chetvaa pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujeyya {vinibbhujjeyya (ka0)}. so tattha pattava.t.ti.m  vinibbhujanto pheggumpi naadhigaccheyya, kuto saara.m? evameva kho  tva.m, aggivessana, mayaa sakasmi.m vaade samanuyu~njiyamaano  samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano ritto tuccho aparaddho.  bhaasitaa kho pana te esaa, aggivessana, vesaaliya.m parisati vaacaa  -- `naaha.m ta.m passaami sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, sa"nghi.m ga.ni.m  ga.naacariya.m, api arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pa.tijaanamaana.m, yo mayaa  vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho na sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na ^a^T1.0432^ea^ sampavedheyya,  yassa na kacchehi sedaa mucceyyu.m. thuu.na.m cepaaha.m acetana.m vaadena vaada.m  samaarabheyya.m saapi mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddhaa sa"nkampeyya sampakampeyya  sampavedheyya. ko pana vaado manussabhuutassaa'ti? tuyha.m kho pana,  aggivessana, appekaccaani sedaphusitaani nalaa.taa muttaani, uttaraasa"nga.m  vinibhinditvaa bhuumiya.m pati.t.thitaani. mayha.m kho pana, aggivessana,  natthi etarahi kaayasmi.m sedo''ti. iti bhagavaa tasmi.m {tassa.m (?)} parisati  suva.n.nava.n.na.m kaaya.m vivari. eva.m ^a^P1.0234^ea^ vutte, saccako  niga.n.thaputto tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto  appa.tibhaano nisiidi.
text.1219: [03] 360^b^.^eb^ atha kho dummukho licchaviputto saccaka.m  niga.n.thaputta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m  appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``upamaa ma.m, bhagavaa,  pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, dummukhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.  ``seyyathaapi, bhante, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure pokkhara.nii.  tatraassa kakka.tako. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa ^a^V1.0300^ea^ kumaarakaa vaa  kumaarikaa vaa tamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa nikkhamitvaa yena saa  pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkameyyu.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa ta.m  kakka.taka.m udakaa uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thaapeyyu.m. ya~n~nadeva hi so,  bhante, kakka.tako a.la.m abhininnaameyya ta.m tadeva te kumaarakaa vaa  kumaarikaa vaa ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sa~nchindeyyu.m sambha~njeyyu.m ^a^M1.0297^ea^   sampalibha~njeyyu.m. eva~nhi ^a^T1.0433^ea^ so, bhante, kakka.tako sabbehi a.lehi  sa~nchinnehi sambhaggehi sampalibhaggehi abhabbo ta.m pokkhara.ni.m puna  otaritu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe. evameva kho, bhante, yaani saccakassa  niga.n.thaputtassa visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani taanipi  sabbaani {vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici taani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}   bhagavataa sa~nchinnaani sambhaggaani sampalibhaggaani; abhabbo  ca daani, bhante, saccako niga.n.thaputto puna bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitu.m  yadida.m vaadaadhippaayo''ti. eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto dummukha.m  licchaviputta.m etadavoca -- ``aagamehi tva.m, dummukha, aagamehi tva.m,  dummukha ( ) {(mukharosi tva.m dummukha) (syaa0 ka.m0)} na maya.m tayaa   saddhi.m mantema, idha maya.m bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m mantema.
text.122: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti,  duppa~n~nae.lamuugasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m  bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m duppa~n~no e.lamuugo ^a^M1.0025^ea^  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami;  pa~n~naasampannohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa pa~n~naasampannaa  ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m ^a^T1.0036^ea^  a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, pa~n~naasampada.m attani sampassamaano  bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
