text.1339: [01] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa,  sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa  sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa,  vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo,  bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.'''
text.134: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0029^ea^ ^a^V1.0031^ea^ ^a^T1.0042^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa  saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhave''ti.  ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m.  aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --
text.1340: [03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.nanti iti kho paneta.m  vutta.m; jaatipaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, jaraamara.na.m, no vaa, katha.m vaa  ettha {katha.m vaa vo ettha (?)} hotii''ti? ``jaatipaccayaa, bhante, jaraamara.na.m; eva.m no ettha  hoti {eva.m no ettha hotiiti (ka0)} -- jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na''nti. ``bhavapaccayaa jaatiiti iti  kho paneta.m vutta.m; bhavapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, jaati, no vaa, katha.m  vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``bhavapaccayaa, bhante ^a^P1.0262^ea^,  jaati; eva.m no ettha hoti -- bhavapaccayaa jaatii''ti ^a^T1.0481^ea^.  ``upaadaanapaccayaa ^a^V1.0333^ea^ bhavoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; upaadaanapaccayaa nu  kho, bhikkhave, bhavo, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``upaadaanapaccayaa, bhante, bhavo; eva.m no ettha hoti --  upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo''ti. ``ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaananti iti kho  paneta.m vutta.m, ta.nhaapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, upaadaana.m, no vaa, katha.m  vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``ta.nhaapaccayaa, bhante, upaadaana.m; eva.m no ettha  hoti -- ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana''nti. ``vedanaapaccayaa ^a^M1.0329^ea^ ta.nhaati iti  kho paneta.m vutta.m; vedanaapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa, no vaa,  katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``vedanaapaccayaa, bhante, ta.nhaa; eva.m no  ettha hoti -- vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa''ti. ``phassapaccayaa vedanaati  iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; phassapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanaa, no  vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``phassapaccayaa, bhante, vedanaa; eva.m  no ettha hoti -- phassapaccayaa vedanaa''ti. ``sa.laayatanapaccayaa  phassoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; sa.laayatanapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave,  phasso, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``sa.laayatanapaccayaa,  bhante, phasso; eva.m no ettha hoti -- sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso''ti.  ``naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatananti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m;  naamaruupapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, sa.laayatana.m, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha  hotii''ti? ``naamaruupapaccayaa, bhante, sa.laayatana.m; eva.m no ettha  hoti -- naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana''nti. ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupanti ^a^T1.0482^ea^ iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave,  naamaruupa.m, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa,  bhante, naamaruupa.m; eva.m no ettha hoti -- vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupa''nti. ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nanti iti kho paneta.m  vutta.m; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m, no vaa, katha.m vaa  ettha hotii''ti? ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa, bhante, vi~n~naa.na.m; eva.m no ettha  hoti -- sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na''nti. ``avijjaapaccayaa  sa"nkhaaraati iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; avijjaapaccayaa nu kho, bhikkhave,  sa"nkhaaraa, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``avijjaapaccayaa,  bhante, sa"nkhaaraa; eva.m no ettha hoti -- avijjaapaccayaa  sa"nkhaaraa''ti.
text.1341: [03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu, bhikkhave. iti kho, bhikkhave,  tumhepi eva.m vadetha, ahampi eva.m vadaami -- imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti,  imassuppaadaa ^a^P1.0263^ea^ ida.m uppajjati, yadida.m --  avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso,  phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m,  upaadaanapaccayaa ^a^V1.0334^ea^ bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.1342: [03] ``avijjaayatveva ^a^M1.0330^ea^ asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho,  sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho,  naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho ^a^T1.0483^ea^, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho,  phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho,  ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho,  bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.
text.1343: [03] 405^b^.^eb^ ``jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodhoti iti kho  paneta.m vutta.m; jaatinirodhaa nu kho, bhikkhave, jaraamara.nanirodho, no  vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``jaatinirodhaa, bhante,  jaraamara.nanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti -- jaatinirodhaa  jaraamara.nanirodho''ti. ``bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodhoti iti kho  paneta.m vutta.m; bhavanirodhaa nu kho, bhikkhave, jaatinirodho, no vaa,  katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti? ``bhavanirodhaa, bhante, jaatinirodho; eva.m  no ettha hoti -- bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho''ti.  ``upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m;  upaadaananirodhaa nu kho, bhikkhave, bhavanirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa  ettha hotii''ti? ``upaadaananirodhaa, bhante, bhavanirodho; eva.m no  ettha hoti -- upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho''ti. ``ta.nhaanirodhaa  upaadaananirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; ta.nhaanirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, upaadaananirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``ta.nhaanirodhaa, bhante, upaadaananirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho''ti. ``vedanaanirodhaa ^a^T1.0484^ea^  ta.nhaanirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; vedanaanirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, ta.nhaanirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``vedanaanirodhaa, bhante, ta.nhaanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho''ti. ``phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodhoti  iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; phassanirodhaa ^a^P1.0264^ea^ nu kho,  bhikkhave, vedanaanirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``phassanirodhaa, bhante, vedanaanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho''ti. ``sa.laayatananirodhaa  phassanirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; sa.laayatananirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, phassanirodho, no vaa ^a^M1.0331^ea^, katha.m vaa ettha hotiiti?  sa.laayatananirodhaa, bhante, phassanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  sa.laayatananirodhaa ^a^V1.0335^ea^ phassanirodho''ti. ``naamaruupanirodhaa  sa.laayatananirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; naamaruupanirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, sa.laayatananirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``naamaruupanirodhaa, bhante, sa.laayatananirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti  -- naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho''ti. ``vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa  naamaruupanirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, naamaruupanirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa, bhante, naamaruupanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho''ti. ``sa"nkhaaranirodhaa  vi~n~naa.nanirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; sa"nkhaaranirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nanirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``sa"nkhaaranirodhaa, bhante ^a^T1.0485^ea^, vi~n~naa.nanirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho''ti. ``avijjaanirodhaa  sa"nkhaaranirodhoti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m; avijjaanirodhaa nu kho,  bhikkhave, sa"nkhaaranirodho, no vaa, katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?  ``avijjaanirodhaa, bhante, sa"nkhaaranirodho; eva.m no ettha hoti --  avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho''ti.
text.1344: [03] 406^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu, bhikkhave. iti kho, bhikkhave,  tumhepi eva.m vadetha, ahampi eva.m vadaami -- imasmi.m asati ida.m na  hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati, yadida.m -- avijjaanirodhaa  sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa  naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho,  sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho,  vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho,  upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa  jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti.
text.1345: [03] 407^b^.^eb^ ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m  passantaa pubbanta.m ^a^T1.0486^ea^ ^a^P1.0265^ea^ vaa pa.tidhaaveyyaatha --  `ahesumha nu kho maya.m atiitamaddhaana.m, nanu kho ahesumha  atiitamaddhaana.m, ki.m nu kho ahesumha atiitamaddhaana.m, katha.m nu kho  ahesumha atiitamaddhaana.m, ki.m hutvaa ki.m ahesumha nu kho maya.m  atiitamaddhaana'''nti?
text.1347: [03] ``api ^a^V1.0336^ea^ nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa  aparanta.m ^a^M1.0332^ea^ vaa pa.tidhaaveyyaatha -- bhavissaama nu kho maya.m anaagatamaddhaana.m,  nanu kho bhavissaama anaagatamaddhaana.m, ki.m nu kho bhavissaama  anaagatamaddhaana.m, katha.m nu kho bhavissaama anaagatamaddhaana.m, ki.m hutvaa  ki.m bhavissaama nu kho maya.m anaagatamaddhaana''nti?
text.1349: [03] ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa  etarahi vaa paccuppannamaddhaana.m ajjhatta.m katha.mkathii assatha -- aha.m nu  khosmi, no nu khosmi, ki.m nu khosmi, katha.m nu khosmi, aya.m nu  kho satto kuto aagato, so kuhi.mgaamii bhavissatii''ti?
text.135: [03] ``cattaarome, aavuso, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.  katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano  `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. idha  panaavuso, ekacco puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m  a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo  ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano  `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tatraavuso,  yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m  hiinapuriso akkhaayati. tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova  samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m  imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati ^a^T1.0043^ea^.  tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova ^a^P1.0025^ea^ samaano  `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m  dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m hiinapuriso akkhaayati.  tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m  a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m  ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti.
text.1351: [03] ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa eva.m  vadeyyaatha -- satthaa no garu, satthugaaravena ca maya.m eva.m vademaa''ti?
text.1353: [03] ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa eva.m  vadeyyaatha -- sama.no evamaaha, sama.naa ca naama maya.m eva.m vademaa''ti?
text.1355: [03] ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa a~n~na.m  satthaara.m ^a^T1.0487^ea^ uddiseyyaathaa''ti?
text.1357: [03] ``api nu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa yaani  taani puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m vata kotuuhalama"ngalaani taani saarato  paccaagaccheyyaathaa''ti?
text.1359: [03] ``nanu, bhikkhave, yadeva tumhaaka.m saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m  vidita.m, tadeva tumhe vadethaa''ti.
text.136: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca --
text.1361: [03] ``saadhu, bhikkhave, upaniitaa kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, iminaa  sandi.t.thikena dhammena akaalikena ehipassikena opaneyyikena paccatta.m  veditabbena vi~n~nuuhi. sandi.t.thiko aya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo akaaliko  ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhi -- iti yanta.m  vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti.
text.1362: [03] 408^b^.^eb^ ``ti.n.na.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sannipaataa  gabbhassaavakkanti hoti. idha maataapitaro ca sannipatitaa honti,  maataa ca na utunii hoti, gandhabbo ca na paccupa.t.thito hoti, neva  taava gabbhassaavakkanti ^a^P1.0266^ea^ hoti. idha maataapitaro  ca sannipatitaa honti, maataa ca utunii hoti, gandhabbo ca na  paccupa.t.thito hoti, neva taava gabbhassaavakkanti hoti. yato ca kho,  bhikkhave, maataapitaro ca sannipatitaa honti, maataa ca utunii hoti,  gandhabbo ca paccupa.t.thito hoti -- eva.m ti.n.na.m sannipaataa  gabbhassaavakkanti hoti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, maataa nava vaa dasa vaa  maase gabbha.m kucchinaa pariharati mahataa sa.msayena garubhaara.m {garumbhaara.m (sii0 pii0)}. tamena.m,  bhikkhave, maataa ^a^M1.0333^ea^ navanna.m vaa ^a^T1.0488^ea^ dasanna.m vaa maasaana.m accayena vijaayati  mahataa sa.msayena garubhaara.m. tamena.m jaata.m samaana.m sakena lohitena  poseti. lohita~nheta.m, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadida.m maatutha~n~na.m.  sa kho so, bhikkhave, kumaaro vuddhimanvaaya indriyaana.m  paripaakamanvaaya yaani taani kumaarakaana.m kii.laapanakaani tehi kii.lati,  seyyathida.m -- va"nkaka.m gha.tika.m mokkhacika.m ci"ngulaka.m pattaa.lhaka.m rathaka.m  dhanuka.m. sa kho so, bhikkhave, kumaaro vuddhimanvaaya indriyaana.m  paripaakamanvaaya pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti  -- cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi  kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi  gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi  i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi.
text.1363: [03] 409^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0338^ea^ cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe  saarajjati, appiyaruupe ruupe byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayasati ca  viharati parittacetaso. ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati -- yatthassa te paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti. so eva.m anurodhavirodha.m samaapanno ya.m ki~nci vedana.m  vedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, so ta.m vedana.m  abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m vedana.m  abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii ^a^T1.0489^ea^. yaa  vedanaasu nandii tadupaadaana.m, tassupaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati,  jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. sotena  sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m  saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m  vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme ^a^P1.0267^ea^ saarajjati, appiyaruupe  dhamme byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayasati ca viharati parittacetaso.  ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- yatthassa te  paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. so eva.m  anurodhavirodha.m samaapanno ya.m ki~nci vedana.m vedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa  adukkhamasukha.m vaa, so ta.m vedana.m abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya  ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m vedana.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato  uppajjati nandii. yaa vedanaasu nandii tadupaadaana.m, tassupaadaanapaccayaa ^a^M1.0334^ea^  bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.1364: [03] 410^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke uppajjati  araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m  sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa ^a^T1.0490^ea^ sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m  majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa  gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m  sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena  samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho,  abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa  ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m.  ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ^a^V1.0339^ea^ ohaaretvaa, kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa,  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'''nti. so aparena samayena appa.m  vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, appa.m vaa  ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya, mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya, kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa, kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajati.
text.1365: [03] 411^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m  sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
text.1366: [03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^P1.0268^ea^  hoti, dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii athenena sucibhuutena  attanaa viharati.
text.1367: [03] ``abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti, aaraacaarii virato  methunaa gaamadhammaa.
text.1368: [03] ``musaavaada.m ^a^M1.0335^ea^ pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, saccavaadii  saccasandho ^a^T1.0491^ea^ theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.
text.1369: [03] ``pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti --  ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na  imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa,  sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii,  samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.137: [03] ``ko nu kho, aavuso saariputta, hetu ko paccayo yenimesa.m  dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati,  eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati? ko panaavuso ^a^V1.0032^ea^ saariputta,  hetu ko ^a^M1.0030^ea^  paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso  akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti?
text.1370: [03] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti --  yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii  bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1371: [03] ``samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti,  kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena, saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.
text.1372: [03] ``so ^a^V1.0340^ea^ biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti,  ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato, virato vikaalabhojanaa.  naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti,   maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, uccaasayanamahaasayanaa  pa.tivirato hoti, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti,  aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti, itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti,  daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato  hoti, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti,  hatthigavaassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato ^a^T1.0492^ea^ hoti, khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti, duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti,  kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti, tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato  hoti, ukko.tanava~ncana-nikati-saaciyogaa pa.tivirato hoti,  chedana-vadhabandhanaviparaamosa-aalopa-sahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti {passa  ma0 ni0 1.293 cuu.lahatthipadopame}.
text.1373: [03] ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena  kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva  pakkamati ^a^M1.0336^ea^. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti  sapattabhaarova .deti, evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena  ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati  samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena ^a^P1.0269^ea^  siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.
text.1374: [01] ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti  naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m  aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m  ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m  phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti  naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati.  so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m  abyaasekasukha.m ^a^T1.0493^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedeti.
text.1375: [03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite  vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti ^a^V1.0341^ea^, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii  hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite  khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme  sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite  tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.
text.1376: [03] 412^b^.^eb^ ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena  samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato) {passa ma0 ni0 1.296  cuu.lahatthipadopame}, iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena  satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato, vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati -- ara~n~na.m  rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m  palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m  aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so  abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya  citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya ^a^M1.0337^ea^ abyaapannacitto viharati,  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thiinamiddha.m  pahaaya vigatathiinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii, sato sampajaano,  thiinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati  ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m  pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu,  vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.
text.1377: [03] 413^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^T1.0494^ea^ ^a^P1.0270^ea^ ime pa~nca niivara.ne  pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi  vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m  jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.
text.1378: [03] 414^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe na  saarajjati, appiyaruupe ruupe na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayasati ca  viharati appamaa.nacetaso. ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati -- yatthassa te paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti. so eva.m anurodhavirodhavippahiino ^a^V1.0342^ea^ ya.m ki~nci vedana.m  vedeti, sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, so ta.m vedana.m  naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m vedana.m  anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato yaa vedanaasu nandii  saa nirujjhati. tassa nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho,  upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa  jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. sotena sadda.m  sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m  saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m  vi~n~naaya piyaruupe ^a^T1.0495^ea^ dhamme na saarajjati, appiyaruupe dhamme na  byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayasati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- yatthassa te paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. so eva.m  anurodhavirodhavippahiino ya.m ki~nci vedana.m vedeti, sukha.m vaa dukkha.m  vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, so ta.m vedana.m naabhinandati naabhivadati ^a^M1.0338^ea^   naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m vedana.m anabhinandato anabhivadato  anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato yaa vedanaasu nandii saa nirujjhati. tassa  nandiinirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho,  bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. ima.m kho me tumhe,  bhikkhave, sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m dhaaretha, saati.m pana bhikkhu.m  ^a^P1.0271^ea^ keva.t.taputta.m  mahaata.nhaajaalata.nhaasa"nghaa.tappa.timukka''nti.
text.1379: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.138: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano  `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m  paa.tika"nkha.m -- na chanda.m janessati na vaayamissati na viiriya.m  aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so saraago sadoso samoho  saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso,  ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa rajena ca malena ca  pariyonaddhaa. tamena.m saamikaa na ceva paribhu~njeyyu.m na ca  pariyodapeyyu.m {pariyodaapeyyu.m (?)}, rajaapathe ca na.m nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso,  ka.msapaati aparena samayena sa.mkili.t.thataraa ^a^T1.0044^ea^ assa malaggahitaa''ti?  ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo  saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- na chanda.m janessati na  vaayamissati na viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so  saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati.
text.1382: [03] 415^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0496^ea^ ^a^V1.0343^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"ngesu  viharati assapura.m naama a"ngaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1383: [03] ``sama.naa sama.naati vo, bhikkhave, jano sa~njaanaati. tumhe  ca pana `ke tumhe'ti pu.t.thaa samaanaa `sama.naamhaa'ti pa.tijaanaatha; tesa.m  vo, bhikkhave, eva.msama~n~naana.m sata.m eva.mpa.ti~n~naana.m sata.m `ye dhammaa  sama.nakara.naa ca braahma.nakara.naa ca te dhamme samaadaaya vattissaama, eva.m  no aya.m amhaaka.m sama~n~naa ca saccaa bhavissati pa.ti~n~naa ca bhuutaa.  yesa~nca maya.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m  paribhu~njaama, tesa.m te kaaraa amhesu mahapphalaa bhavissanti mahaanisa.msaa,  amhaaka~ncevaaya.m pabbajjaa ava~njhaa bhavissati saphalaa saudrayaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.1384: [03] 416^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa sama.nakara.naa ca  braahma.nakara.naa ca? `hirottappena samannaagataa bhavissaamaa'ti eva~nhi  vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m  evamassa -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa ^a^M1.0339^ea^, alamettaavataa katamettaavataa,  anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti  taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha. aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0497^ea^,  pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa vo saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m  saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.1385: [03] 417^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro ^a^P1.0272^ea^ bhavissati uttaano  viva.to na ca chiddavaa sa.mvuto ca. taaya ca pana  parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataaya nevattaanukka.msessaama na para.m vambhessaamaa'ti  {nevattaanukka.msissaama na para.m vambhissaamaati (sabbattha)}  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave,  tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa, parisuddho no  kaayasamaacaaro; alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho,  natthi no ^a^V1.0344^ea^ ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha.  aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa  vo saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m  kara.niiye'.
text.1386: [03] 418^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `parisuddho no vaciisamaacaaro bhavissati uttaano viva.to na ca  chiddavaa sa.mvuto ca. taaya ca pana parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataaya  nevattaanukka.msessaama na para.m vambhessaamaa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave,  sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa --  `hirottappenamha samannaagataa, parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho  vaciisamaacaaro; alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho,  natthi no ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha.  aarocayaami vo ^a^T1.0498^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa  vo saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m  kara.niiye'.
text.1387: [03] 419^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `parisuddho no manosamaacaaro bhavissati uttaano viva.to na ca  chiddavaa sa.mvuto ca. taaya ca pana ^a^M1.0340^ea^ parisuddhamanosamaacaarataaya  nevattaanukka.msessaama na para.m vambhessaamaa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave,  sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa --  `hirottappenamha samannaagataa, parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho  vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho manosamaacaaro; alamettaavataa katamettaavataa,  anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti  taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha. aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave,  pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa vo saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m  saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.1388: [03] 420^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `parisuddho no aajiivo bhavissati uttaano viva.to na ca chiddavaa  sa.mvuto ca. taaya ca pana parisuddhaajiivataaya nevattaanukka.msessaama na para.m  vambhessaamaa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho  pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa,  parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho  manosamaacaaro, parisuddho aajiivo; alamettaavataa ^a^P1.0273^ea^  katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho ^a^T1.0499^ea^, natthi no ki~nci uttari.m  kara.niiya'nti ^a^V1.0345^ea^ taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha. aarocayaami vo,  bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa vo saama~n~natthikaana.m  sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.1389: [03] 421^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhavissaama; cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na  nimittaggaahii naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m  viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m,  tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjissaama, rakkhissaama cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye  sa.mvara.m aapajjissaama. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m  ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m  phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii  naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjissaama, rakkhissaama manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m  aapajjissaamaa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho  pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `hirottappenamha ^a^M1.0341^ea^ samannaagataa,  parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho  manosamaacaaro, parisuddho aajiivo, indriyesumha guttadvaaraa;  alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no  ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m ^a^T1.0500^ea^ aapajjeyyaatha.  aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa vo  saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi, sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.139: [03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me  ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- chanda.m  janessati vaayamissati viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya;  so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m  karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa  kammaarakulaa vaa rajena ca malena ca pariyonaddhaa. tamena.m saamikaa  paribhu~njeyyu~nceva pariyodapeyyu~nca, na ca na.m rajaapathe nikkhipeyyu.m.  eva~nhi ^a^P1.0026^ea^ saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena  parisuddhataraa assa pariyodaataa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti.  ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi  me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  chanda.m janessati vaayamissati viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa  pahaanaaya; so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto  kaala.m karissati.
text.1390: [03] 422^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `bhojane matta~n~nuno bhavissaama, pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m  aaharissaama, neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya  yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa,  brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaama nava~nca vedana.m  na uppaadessaama, yaatraa ca no bhavissati, anavajjataa ca, phaasu  vihaaro caa'ti eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho  pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa,  parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho  manosamaacaaro, parisuddho aajiivo, indriyesumha guttadvaaraa, bhojane  matta~n~nuno; alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho,  natthi no ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha.  aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa  vo, saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi sati uttari.m  kara.niiye'.
text.1391: [03] 423^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca ^a^V1.0346^ea^, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `jaagariya.m anuyuttaa bhavissaama, divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya  aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodhessaama. rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m  ca"nkamena ^a^P1.0274^ea^ nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi ^a^T1.0501^ea^ citta.m  parisodhessaama. rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena  siihaseyya.m kappessaama paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano  u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya  ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodhessaamaa'ti,  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave,  tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa, parisuddho no  kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho ^a^M1.0342^ea^ manosamaacaaro,  parisuddho aajiivo, indriyesumha guttadvaaraa, bhojane matta~n~nuno,  jaagariya.m anuyuttaa; alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no  saama~n~nattho, natthi no ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti, taavatakeneva  tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha. aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo,  bhikkhave -- `maa vo, saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi  sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.1392: [03] 424^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m?  `satisampaja~n~nena samannaagataa bhavissaama, abhikkante pa.tikkante  sampajaanakaarii, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii, sami~njite  pasaarite sampajaanakaarii, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii,  asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii, uccaarapassaavakamme  sampajaanakaarii, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave  sampajaanakaarii'ti, eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m. siyaa kho  pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa ^a^T1.0502^ea^ -- `hirottappenamha samannaagataa,  parisuddho no kaayasamaacaaro, parisuddho vaciisamaacaaro, parisuddho  manosamaacaaro, parisuddho aajiivo, indriyesumha guttadvaaraa, bhojane  matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, satisampaja~n~nena samannaagataa;  alamettaavataa katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no  ki~nci uttari.m kara.niiya'nti taavatakeneva tu.t.thi.m aapajjeyyaatha.  aarocayaami vo, bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo, bhikkhave -- `maa vo,  saama~n~natthikaana.m sata.m saama~n~nattho parihaayi sati uttari.m kara.niiye'.
text.1393: [03] 425^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, uttari.m kara.niiya.m? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati -- ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m  pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanappattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m.  so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m  kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya ^a^V1.0347^ea^ parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya  vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti;  byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii  ^a^P1.0275^ea^, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thiinamiddha.m  pahaaya vigatathiinamiddho viharati, aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano,  thiinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati  ^a^M1.0343^ea^,  ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m  pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati, akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu,  vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.
text.1394: [03] 426^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0503^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso i.na.m aadaaya  kammante payojeyya. tassa te kammantaa samijjheyyu.m {sampajjeyyu.m (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)}. so yaani ca  poraa.naani i.namuulaani taani ca byantii {byanti.m (ka0), byanti (pii0)} kareyya, siyaa cassa uttari.m  avasi.t.tha.m daarabhara.naaya. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe i.na.m  aadaaya kammante payojesi.m, tassa me te kammantaa samijjhi.msu.  soha.m yaani ca poraa.naani i.namuulaani taani ca byantii akaasi.m,  atthi ca me uttari.m avasi.t.tha.m daarabhara.naayaa'ti. so tatonidaana.m  labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.
text.1395: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aabaadhiko assa dukkhito  baa.lhagilaano, bhatta~ncassa nacchaadeyya, na cassa kaaye balamattaa.  so aparena samayena tamhaa aabaadhaa mucceyya, bhatta~ncassa chaadeyya,  siyaa cassa kaaye balamattaa. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe  aabaadhiko ahosi.m dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, bhatta~nca me nacchaadesi,  na ca me aasi kaaye balamattaa, somhi etarahi tamhaa aabaadhaa mutto,  bhatta~nca me chaadeti, atthi ca me kaaye balamattaa'ti. so  tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.
text.1396: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso bandhanaagaare baddho assa.  so aparena samayena tamhaa bandhanaa mucceyya sotthinaa abbhayena {abyayena (sii0  pii0)}, na  cassa ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe  bandhanaagaare baddho ahosi.m, somhi etarahi ^a^T1.0504^ea^ tamhaa bandhanaa mutto,  sotthinaa abbhayena, natthi ca me ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo'ti. so  tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.
text.1397: [03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0348^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso daaso assa anattaadhiino  paraadhiino na yenakaama.mgamo. so aparena samayena tamhaa daasabyaa  mucceyya attaadhiino aparaadhiino bhujisso yenakaama.mgamo. tassa  evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe daaso ahosi.m ^a^M1.0344^ea^ anattaadhiino paraadhiino  na yenakaama.mgamo, somhi etarahi tamhaa daasabyaa mutto attaadhiino  aparaadhiino ^a^P1.0276^ea^ bhujisso yenakaama.mgamo'ti. so  tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.
text.1398: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso sadhano sabhogo  kantaaraddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya {siilakkhandhavaggapaa.liyaa ki~nci visadisa.m}. so aparena samayena tamhaa kantaaraa  nitthareyya sotthinaa abbhayena, na cassa ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo.  tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe sadhano sabhogo kantaaraddhaanamagga.m  pa.tipajji.m. somhi etarahi tamhaa kantaaraa nitthi.n.no sotthinaa  abbhayena, natthi ca me ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo'ti. so tatonidaana.m  labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.
text.1399: [03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaa i.na.m yathaa roga.m yathaa  bandhanaagaara.m yathaa daasabya.m yathaa kantaaraddhaanamagga.m, ime pa~nca niivara.ne  appahiine attani samanupassati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aa.na.nya.m yathaa  aarogya.m yathaa bandhanaamokkha.m yathaa bhujissa.m yathaa khemantabhuumi.m;  evameva bhikkhu ime pa~nca niivara.ne ^a^T1.0505^ea^ pahiine attani samanupassati.
text.14: [03] ``aabhassare aabhassarato sa~njaanaati; aabhassare aabhassarato  sa~n~natvaa aabhassare ma~n~nati, aabhassaresu ma~n~nati, aabhassarato  ma~n~nati, aabhassare meti ma~n~nati, aabhassare abhinandati. ta.m  kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.140: [03] ``tatraavuso ^a^M1.0031^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me  ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ^a^T1.0045^ea^ --  subhanimitta.m manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa manasikaaraa  raago citta.m anuddha.msessati; so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no  sa.mkili.t.thacitto ^a^V1.0033^ea^ kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati  aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa. tamena.m  saamikaa na ceva paribhu~njeyyu.m na ca pariyodapeyyu.m, rajaapathe ca na.m  nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena  sa.mkili.t.thataraa assa malaggahitaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti.  ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi  me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  subhanimitta.m manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa manasikaaraa  raago citta.m anuddha.msessati;so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no  sa.mkili.t.thacittokaala.mkarissati.
text.1400: [03] 427^b^.^eb^ ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso  upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca  akusalehi dhammehi, savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena  abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci  sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho nhaapako {nahaapako (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa nhaapakantevaasii vaa  ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani {nahaaniiyacu.n.naani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m  paripphosaka.m sanneyya. saaya.m nhaaniiyapi.n.di snehaanugataa snehaparetaa  santarabaahiraa, phu.taa snehena na ca pagghari.nii. evameva kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti  parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa  vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.
text.1401: [03] 428^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M1.0345^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m ^a^V1.0349^ea^ cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. so imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti  parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa  samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave,  udakarahado ubbhidodako ^a^P1.0277^ea^ {ubbhitodako (ka0)}. tassa  ^a^T1.0506^ea^ nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na pacchimaaya disaaya  udakassa aayamukha.m, na uttaraaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na  dakkhi.naaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, devo ca na kaalena kaala.m  sammaadhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa  vaaridhaaraa ubbhijjitvaa tameva udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya  parisandeyya paripuureyya paripphareyya, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato  udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti  parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa  samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.
text.1402: [03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca  viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena  pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa  sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m  nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati,  naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa  pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa  pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani  antonimuggaposiini, taani yaava caggaa yaava ca muulaa ^a^T1.0507^ea^ siitena  vaarinaa abhisannaani parisannaani paripuuraani paripphu.taani, naassa {na nesa.m  (sii0)}  ki~nci sabbaavata.m uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa siitena  vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva  kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti  parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena  apphu.ta.m hoti.
text.1403: [03] 430^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M1.0346^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca  pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa,  adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa  nisinno hoti ^a^V1.0350^ea^, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa  pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso odaatena  vatthena sasiisa.m paarupetvaa nisinno assa, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato  ^a^P1.0278^ea^ kaayassa odaatena vatthena apphu.ta.m assa.  evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa  pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato  kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti.
text.1404: [03] 431^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so  anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m ^a^T1.0508^ea^ anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m,  dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso sakamhaa  gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m gaccheyya, tamhaapi gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m gaccheyya, so  tamhaa gaamaa saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagaccheyya. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m  kho sakamhaa gaamaa amu.m gaama.m agacchi.m {agacchi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, tatrapi eva.m a.t.thaasi.m eva.m  nisiidi.m eva.m abhaasi.m eva.m tu.nhii ahosi.m; tamhaapi gaamaa amu.m gaama.m  agacchi.m, tatrapi eva.m a.t.thaasi.m eva.m nisiidi.m eva.m abhaasi.m eva.m tu.nhii  ahosi.m; somhi tamhaa gaamaa saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagato'ti. evameva  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati,  seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m  sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.
text.1405: [03] 432^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane  upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite ^a^M1.0347^ea^ suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate,  yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati...pe0... ^a^P1.0279^ea^  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dve agaaraa sadvaaraa {sannadvaaraa (ka0)}. tattha cakkhumaa puriso  majjhe .thito passeyya manusse geha.m pavisantepi nikkhamantepi,  anuca"nkamantepi anuvicarantepi ^a^T1.0509^ea^. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane  upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage  satte pajaanaati...pe0....
text.1406: [03] 433^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye ^a^V1.0351^ea^ .thite  aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m  dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `ime  aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m  jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti  ~naa.na.m hoti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m,  naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.
text.1407: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pabbatasa"nkhepe udakarahado accho  vippasanno anaavilo. tattha cakkhumaa puriso tiire .thito passeyya  sippisambukampi {sippikasambukampi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi, carantampi  ti.t.thantampi. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho udakarahado accho  vippasanno anaavilo. tatrime sippisambukaapi ^a^P1.0280^ea^  sakkharakathalaapi macchagumbaapi carantipi ti.t.thantipiiti ^a^T1.0510^ea^. evameva  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati.
text.1408: [03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `sama.no'  itipi `braahma.no'itipi `nhaatako'itipi `vedaguu'itipi  `sottiyo'itipi `ariyo'itipi `araha.m'itipi. katha~nca,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu sama.no hoti? samitaassa honti paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa, dukkhavipaakaa  ^a^M1.0348^ea^, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  sama.no hoti.
text.1409: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu braahma.no hoti? baahitaassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa ^a^V1.0352^ea^, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu braahma.no hoti.
text.141: [03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me  ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  subhanimitta.m na manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa  amanasikaaraa raago citta.m naanuddha.msessati; so araago adoso  amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi,  aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa  pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa paribhu~njeyyu~nceva pariyodapeyyu~nca, na ca  na.m rajaapathe nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena  samayena parisuddhataraa assa pariyodaataa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti.  ``evameva ^a^T1.0046^ea^ kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi  me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  subhanimitta.m na manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa  amanasikaaraa raago citta.m naanuddha.msessati; so araago adoso  amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati.
text.1410: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nhaatako {nahaatako (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} hoti? nhaataassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu nhaatako hoti.
text.1411: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedaguu hoti? viditaassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu vedaguu hoti.
text.1412: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sottiyo hoti? nissutaassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu sottiyo hoti.
text.1413: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo hoti ^a^T1.0511^ea^? aarakaassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu ariyo hoti.
text.1414: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m hoti? aarakaassa  honti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa, sa.mkilesikaa, ponobbhavikaa, sadaraa,  dukkhavipaakaa, aayati.m, jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu araha.m hotii''ti.
text.1415: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.1418: [03] 435^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0349^ea^ ^a^V1.0353^ea^ ^a^P1.0281^ea^ ^a^T1.0512^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa a"ngesu viharati assapura.m naama a"ngaana.m nigamo. tatra kho  bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te  bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sama.naa  sama.naati vo, bhikkhave, jano sa~njaanaati. tumhe ca pana `ke  tumhe'ti pu.t.thaa samaanaa `sama.naamhaa'ti pa.tijaanaatha. tesa.m vo,  bhikkhave, eva.msama~n~naana.m sata.m eva.mpa.ti~n~naana.m sata.m -- `yaa  sama.nasaamiicippa.tipadaa ta.m pa.tipajjissaama; eva.m no aya.m amhaaka.m  sama~n~naa ca saccaa bhavissati pa.ti~n~naa ca bhuutaa; yesa~nca maya.m  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njaama,  tesa.m te kaaraa amhesu mahapphalaa bhavissanti mahaanisa.msaa,  amhaaka~ncevaaya.m pabbajjaa ava~njhaa bhavissati saphalaa saudrayaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.1419: [03] 436^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na  sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hoti? yassa kassaci, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuno abhijjhaalussa abhijjhaa appahiinaa hoti, byaapannacittassa  byaapaado appahiino hoti, kodhanassa kodho appahiino hoti,  upanaahissa upanaaho appahiino hoti, makkhissa makkho appahiino  hoti, pa.laasissa pa.laaso appahiino hoti, issukissa issaa  appahiinaa hoti, maccharissa macchariya.m appahiina.m hoti ^a^T1.0513^ea^, sa.thassa  saa.theyya.m appahiina.m hoti, maayaavissa maayaa appahiinaa hoti,  paapicchassa paapikaa icchaa appahiinaa hoti, micchaadi.t.thikassa  micchaadi.t.thi appahiinaa hoti -- imesa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  sama.namalaana.m sama.nadosaana.m sama.nakasa.taana.m aapaayikaana.m .thaanaana.m  duggativedaniyaana.m appahaanaa `na sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m pa.tipanno'ti  vadaami. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mataja.m naama aavudhajaata.m ubhatodhaara.m  piitanisita.m. tadassa sa"nghaa.tiyaa sampaaruta.m sampalive.thita.m.  tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno pabbajja.m vadaami.
text.142: [03] ``aya.m kho, aavuso moggallaana ^a^P1.0027^ea^, hetu aya.m  paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso  akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati. aya.m panaavuso  moggallaana, hetu aya.m ^a^M1.0032^ea^ paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva  sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti.
text.1420: [03] 437^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa.tikassa  sa"nghaa.tidhaara.namattena saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave, acelakassa  acelakamattena saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave, rajojallikassa  rajojallikamattena saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0350^ea^ ^a^V1.0354^ea^,  udakorohakassa  udakoroha.namattena {udakorohakamattena (sii0 pii0)} saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave,  rukkhamuulikassa rukkhamuulikamattena ^a^P1.0282^ea^ saama~n~na.m  vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave, abbhokaasikassa abbhokaasikamattena  saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave, ubbha.t.thakassa ubbha.t.thakamattena  saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave, pariyaayabhattikassa  pariyaayabhattikamattena saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m, bhikkhave,  mantajjhaayakassa mantajjhaayakamattena saama~n~na.m vadaami. naaha.m,  bhikkhave, ja.tilakassa ja.taadhaara.namattena saama~n~na.m vadaami.
text.1421: [03] ``sa"nghaa.tikassa ce, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa.tidhaara.namattena  abhijjhaalussa ^a^T1.0514^ea^ abhijjhaa pahiiyetha, byaapannacittassa byaapaado pahiiyetha,  kodhanassa kodho pahiiyetha, upanaahissa upanaaho pahiiyetha, makkhissa  makkho pahiiyetha, pa.laasissa pa.laaso pahiiyetha, issukissa issaa  pahiiyetha, maccharissa macchariya.m pahiiyetha, sa.thassa saa.theyya.m pahiiyetha,  maayaavissa maayaa pahiiyetha, paapicchassa paapikaa icchaa pahiiyetha,  micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaadi.t.thi pahiiyetha, tamena.m mittaamaccaa  ~naatisaalohitaa jaatameva na.m sa"nghaa.tika.m kareyyu.m, sa"nghaa.tikattameva {sa.mghaa.tiikatte  ceva (ka0)}   samaadapeyyu.m -- `ehi tva.m, bhadramukha, sa"nghaa.tiko hohi,  sa"nghaa.tikassa te sato sa"nghaa.tidhaara.namattena abhijjhaalussa abhijjhaa  pahiiyissati, byaapannacittassa byaapaado pahiiyissati, kodhanassa kodho  pahiiyissati, upanaahissa upanaaho pahiiyissati, makkhissa makkho  pahiiyissati, pa.laasissa pa.laaso pahiiyissati, issukissa issaa  pahiiyissati, maccharissa macchariya.m pahiiyissati, sa.thassa saa.theyya.m  pahiiyissati, maayaavissa maayaa pahiiyissati, paapicchassa paapikaa  icchaa pahiiyissati, micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaadi.t.thi pahiiyissatii'ti.  yasmaa ca kho aha.m, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa.tikampi idhekacca.m passaami  abhijjhaalu.m byaapannacitta.m kodhana.m upanaahi.m makkhi.m pa.laasi.m issuki.m  macchari.m sa.tha.m maayaavi.m paapiccha.m micchaadi.t.thika.m, tasmaa na  sa"nghaa.tikassa sa"nghaa.tidhaara.namattena saama~n~na.m vadaami.
text.1422: [03] ``acelakassa ce, bhikkhave...pe0... rajojallikassa ce,  bhikkhave...pe0... udakorohakassa ce, bhikkhave...pe0...  rukkhamuulikassa ^a^T1.0515^ea^ ce, bhikkhave...pe0... abbhokaasikassa ce,  bhikkhave...pe0... ubbha.t.thakassa ce, bhikkhave...pe0...  pariyaayabhattikassa ce, bhikkhave...pe0... mantajjhaayakassa ce,  bhikkhave...pe0... ja.tilakassa ^a^M1.0351^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, ja.taadhaara.namattena  abhijjhaalussa abhijjhaa pahiiyetha, byaapannacittassa byaapaado pahiiyetha ^a^V1.0355^ea^,  kodhanassa kodho pahiiyetha, upanaahissa upanaaho pahiiyetha, makkhissa  makkho pahiiyetha, pa.laasissa pa.laaso pahiiyetha, issukissa issaa  pahiiyetha, maccharissa macchariya.m pahiiyetha, sa.thassa saa.theyya.m pahiiyetha,  maayaavissa maayaa pahiiyetha, paapicchassa paapikaa icchaa pahiiyetha,  micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaadi.t.thi pahiiyetha, tamena.m mittaamaccaa  ~naatisaalohitaa jaatameva na.m ja.tilaka.m kareyyu.m, ja.tilakattameva {ja.tilakatte ceva  (ka0)}  samaadapeyyu.m -- `ehi tva.m, bhadramukha, ja.tilako hohi, ja.tilakassa te  sato ja.taadhaara.namattena abhijjhaalussa abhijjhaa pahiiyissati  byaapannacittassa ^a^P1.0283^ea^ byaapaado pahiiyissati,  kodhanassa kodho pahiiyissati...pe0... paapicchassa paapikaa icchaa  pahiiyissati micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaadi.t.thi pahiiyissatii'ti. yasmaa  ca kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ja.tilakampi idhekacca.m passaami abhijjhaalu.m  byaapannacitta.m kodhana.m upanaahi.m makkhi.m palaasi.m issuki.m macchari.m sa.tha.m  maayaavi.m paapiccha.m micchaadi.t.thi.m, tasmaa ^a^T1.0516^ea^ na ja.tilakassa ja.taadhaara.namattena  saama~n~na.m vadaami.
text.1423: [03] 438^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hoti? yassa kassaci, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuno abhijjhaalussa abhijjhaa pahiinaa hoti, byaapannacittassa  byaapaado pahiino hoti, kodhanassa kodho pahiino hoti, upanaahissa  upanaaho pahiino hoti, makkhissa makkho pahiino hoti, pa.laasissa  pa.laaso pahiino hoti, issukissa issaa pahiinaa hoti, maccharissa  macchariya.m pahiina.m hoti, sa.thassa saa.theyya.m pahiina.m hoti, maayaavissa  maayaa pahiinaa hoti, paapicchassa paapikaa icchaa pahiinaa hoti,  micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaadi.t.thi pahiinaa hoti -- imesa.m kho aha.m,  bhikkhave, sama.namalaana.m sama.nadosaana.m sama.nakasa.taana.m aapaayikaana.m  .thaanaana.m duggativedaniyaana.m pahaanaa `sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m pa.tipanno'ti  vadaami. so sabbehi imehi paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi  visuddhamattaana.m samanupassati ( ) {(vimuttamattaana.m samanupassati) (sii0 syaa0  ka.m0 pii0)}. tassa sabbehi imehi paapakehi  akusalehi dhammehi visuddhamattaana.m samanupassato ^a^M1.0352^ea^ ( )  {(vimuttamattaana.m samanupassato) (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paamojja.m jaayati,  pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati,  passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati.
text.1424: [03] ``so mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati,  tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m  sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena  mahaggatena appamaa.nena ^a^T1.0517^ea^ averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati.  karu.naasahagatena ^a^V1.0356^ea^ cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0...  upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m,  tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi  sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena  mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati.  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa saatodakaa siitodakaa  setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. puratthimaaya ^a^P1.0284^ea^ cepi  disaaya puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto  tasito pipaasito. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m aagamma vineyya  udakapipaasa.m vineyya ghammapari.laaha.m...pe0... pacchimaaya cepi disaaya  puriso aagaccheyya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi disaaya puriso aagaccheyya...pe0...  dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya puriso aagaccheyya. yato kuto cepi na.m  puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto, kilanto tasito  pipaasito. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m aagamma vineyya udakapipaasa.m,  vineyya ghammapari.laaha.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, khattiyakulaa cepi  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m  dhammavinaya.m aagamma, eva.m metta.m karu.na.m mudita.m upekkha.m bhaavetvaa labhati  ajjhatta.m {tamaha.m (ka0)} vuupasama.m {tamaha.m (ka0)}. ajjhatta.m vuupasamaa `sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m  pa.tipanno'ti vadaami. braahma.nakulaa cepi...pe0... vessakulaa  cepi...pe0... suddakulaa cepi...pe0... yasmaa kasmaa cepi kulaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti ^a^T1.0518^ea^, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m  dhammavinaya.m aagamma, eva.m metta.m karu.na.m mudita.m upekkha.m bhaavetvaa labhati  ajjhatta.m vuupasama.m. ajjhatta.m vuupasamaa `sama.nasaamiicippa.tipada.m  pa.tipanno'ti vadaami.
text.1425: [03] ``khattiyakulaa ^a^M1.0353^ea^ cepi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti.  so ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva  dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aasavaana.m  khayaa sama.no hoti. braahma.nakulaa cepi...pe0... vessakulaa  cepi... suddakulaa cepi... yasmaa kasmaa cepi kulaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^V1.0357^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharati. aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hotii''ti.
text.1426: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.143: [03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``a"nga.na.m a"nga.nanti, aavuso, vuccati.  kissa nu kho eta.m, aavuso, adhivacana.m yadida.m a"nga.na''nti?  ``paapakaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso, akusalaana.m icchaavacaraana.m adhivacana.m,  yadida.m a"nga.na''nti.
text.1434: [03] 439^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0519^ea^ ^a^M1.0354^ea^ ^a^V1.0358^ea^ ^a^P1.0285^ea^  me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m  yena saalaa naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho  saaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa  bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m saala.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m  eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m  sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m  loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m  majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti'. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m  dassana.m hotii''ti.
text.1435: [03] atha kho saaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu,  sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^T1.0520^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho  saaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``ko nu kho,  bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti ^a^V1.0359^ea^? ko pana, bho  gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti?
text.1436: [03] ``adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m  upapajjanti. dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu ^a^M1.0355^ea^ kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti  ^a^P1.0286^ea^.
text.1437: [03] ``na kho maya.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa,  vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaama. saadhu no  bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu, yathaa maya.m imassa bhoto gotamassa  sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, vitthaarena attha.m  aajaaneyyaamaa''ti. ``tena hi, gahapatayo, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi  karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho saaleyyakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa ^a^T1.0521^ea^ etadavoca --
text.1438: [03] 440^b^.^eb^ ``tividha.m kho, gahapatayo, kaayena  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti, catubbidha.m vaacaaya  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti, tividha.m manasaa  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti.
text.1439: [01] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco  paa.naatipaatii hoti, luddo {luddo daaru.no (ka0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} lohitapaa.ni  hatappahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu {sabbapaa.nabhuutesu (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}.
text.144: [03] ``.thaana.m ^a^V1.0034^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aapatti~nca vata aapanno assa.m,  na ca ma.m bhikkhuu jaaneyyu.m aapatti.m aapanno'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m,  aavuso, vijjati ya.m ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu jaaneyyu.m -- `aapatti.m  aapanno'ti. `jaananti ma.m bhikkhuu aapatti.m aapanno'ti -- iti so  kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca  appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1440: [03] ``adinnaadaayii kho pana hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m,  gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa, ta.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti.
text.1441: [03] ``kaamesumicchaacaarii kho pana hoti. yaa taa maaturakkhitaa  piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa  ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sassaamikaa saparida.n.daa  antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi, tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa  hoti. eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti.
text.1442: [03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0360^ea^, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco  musaavaadii hoti. sabhaagato vaa parisaagato vaa, ~naatimajjhagato vaa  puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa, abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho --  `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti ^a^M1.0356^ea^, so ajaana.m vaa aaha --  `jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha -- `na jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha  -- `passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha -- `na passaamii'ti {so aaha ajaana.m vaa aha.m  jaanaamiiti jaana.m vaa aha.m na jaanaamiiti apassa.m vaa aha.m passaamiiti  passa.m vaa aha.m na passaamiiti (ka0)}. iti  attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa sampajaanamusaa  bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1443: [03] ``pisu.navaaco kho pana hoti. ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa ^a^T1.0522^ea^  imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti  samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa {bhedakaa (ka0), bhedetaa (syaa0 ka.m0), tada.t.thakathaaya.m pana  bhettaati dissati}, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo vaggarato  vagganandii vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1444: [03] ``pharusavaaco kho pana hoti. yaa saa vaacaa a.n.dakaa {ka.n.dakaa (ka0)}  kakkasaa paraka.tukaa paraabhisajjanii kodhasaamantaa asamaadhisa.mvattanikaa  ^a^P1.0287^ea^, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1445: [03] ``samphappalaapii kho pana hoti. akaalavaadii abhuutavaadii  anatthavaadii adhammavaadii avinayavaadii. anidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa  hoti akaalena anapadesa.m apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m. eva.m kho,  gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti.
text.1446: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco  abhijjhaalu hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m abhijjhaataa hoti  -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mamassaa'''ti!
text.1447: [03] ``byaapannacitto kho pana hoti padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- `ime  sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa vajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa vaa  ahesu'''nti {maa vaa ahesu.m iti vaati (sii0 pii0 ka0)}.
text.1448: [03] ``micchaadi.t.thiko kho pana hoti vipariitadassano -- `natthi  dinna.m natthi yi.t.tha.m natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m  vipaako, natthi aya.m loko natthi paro loko, natthi maataa natthi  pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa ^a^M1.0357^ea^, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa  sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ^a^V1.0361^ea^ ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m  manasaa adhammacariyaavisamacariyaa ^a^T1.0523^ea^ hoti.
text.1449: [03] ``eva.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo,  evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m  niraya.m upapajjanti.
text.145: [03] ``.thaana.m ^a^T1.0047^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aapatti~nca vata aapanno assa.m,  anuraho ma.m bhikkhuu codeyyu.m, no sa"nghamajjhe'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m,  aavuso, vijjati ya.m ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe codeyyu.m, no  anuraho. `sa"nghamajjhe ma.m bhikkhuu codenti, no anuraho'ti --  iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo  yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1450: [03] 441^b^.^eb^ ``tividha.m kho, gahapatayo, kaayena  dhammacariyaasamacariyaa hoti, catubbidha.m vaacaaya dhammacariyaasamacariyaa  hoti, tividha.m manasaa dhammacariyaasamacariyaa hoti.
text.1451: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena dhammacariyaasamacariyaa  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
text.1452: [03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. ya.m ta.m  parassa paravittuupakara.na.m, gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa, ta.m naadinna.m  theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti.
text.1453: [01] ``kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa  pa.tivirato hoti. yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa  maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa  gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sassaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso  maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi, tathaaruupaasu na caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti.  eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena dhammacariyaasamacariyaa ^a^P1.0288^ea^  hoti.
text.1454: [01] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya  dhammacariyaasamacariyaa hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musaavaada.m  pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti. sabhaagato vaa parisaagato vaa,  ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa,  abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti,  so ^a^T1.0524^ea^ ajaana.m vaa aaha -- `na jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha --  `jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha -- `na passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha ^a^M1.0358^ea^  -- `passaamii'ti. iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa  aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1455: [03] ``pisu.na.m ^a^V1.0362^ea^ vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti,  ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na  imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa,  sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii  samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1456: [01] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato  hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii  bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa -- tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
text.1457: [03] ``samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti.  kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii nidhaanavati.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. eva.m  kho, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya dhammacariyaasamacariyaa hoti.
text.1458: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa dhammacariyaasamacariyaa  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa  paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m naabhijjhaataa hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m  mamassaa'ti!
text.1459: [03] ``abyaapannacitto kho pana hoti appadu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- `ime  sattaa averaa abyaabajjhaa aniighaa sukhii attaana.m pariharantuu'ti.
text.146: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aapatti~nca vata aapanno assa.m,  sappa.tipuggalo ma.m codeyya, no appa.tipuggalo'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m,  aavuso, vijjati ya.m ta.m bhikkhu.m appa.tipuggalo codeyya, no  sappa.tipuggalo. `appa.tipuggalo ma.m codeti, no sappa.tipuggalo'ti  -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso,  kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1460: [03] ``sammaadi.t.thiko kho pana hoti avipariitadassano -- `atthi  dinna.m atthi yi.t.tha.m ^a^T1.0525^ea^ atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m  vipaako, atthi aya.m loko atthi paro loko, atthi maataa atthi  pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa  sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m  manasaa dhammacariyaasamacariyaa hoti.
text.1461: [03] ``eva.m dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti.
text.1462: [03] 442^b^.^eb^ ``aaka"nkheyya ^a^M1.0359^ea^ ^a^V1.0363^ea^ ^a^P1.0289^ea^ ce,  gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m  vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii  samacaarii.
text.1463: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m...pe0...  gahapatimahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m  vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1464: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjeya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m ^a^T1.0526^ea^ vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa  hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1465: [01] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii --  `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa taavati.msaana.m devaana.m...pe0...  yaamaana.m devaana.m... tusitaana.m devaana.m... nimmaanaratiina.m  devaana.m... paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m... brahmakaayikaana.m  devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya.  ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1466: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa  hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1467: [01] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii --  `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parittaabhaana.m devaana.m...pe0...  appamaa.naabhaana.m devaana.m... aabhassaraana.m devaana.m...  parittasubhaana.m ^a^V1.0364^ea^ devaana.m... appamaa.nasubhaana.m devaana.m...  subhaki.nhaana.m devaana.m... vehapphalaana.m devaana.m... avihaana.m ^a^M1.0360^ea^   devaana.m... atappaana.m devaana.m... sudassaana.m devaana.m...  sudassiina.m devaana.m... akani.t.thaana.m devaana.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m  devaana.m ^a^T1.0527^ea^... aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m  kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa  hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1468: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva  dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti; .thaana.m  kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m  pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  vihareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii''ti.
text.1469: [03] 443^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P1.0290^ea^ vutte, saaleyyakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama,  abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa  ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya,  andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti.  evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m  bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake  no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete {paa.nupeta.m (ka0)} sara.na.m gate''ti.
