text.147: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata mameva satthaa  pa.tipucchitvaa pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya, na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m  satthaa pa.tipucchitvaa pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyyaa'ti. .thaana.m  kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m satthaa pa.tipucchitvaa  ^a^M1.0033^ea^ pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya, na ta.m bhikkhu.m ^a^P1.0028^ea^  satthaa ^a^T1.0048^ea^ pa.tipucchitvaa pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya. `a~n~na.m  bhikkhu.m satthaa pa.tipucchitvaa pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseti, na  ma.m satthaa pa.tipucchitvaa pa.tipucchitvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desetii'ti --  iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo  yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1472: [03] 444^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0528^ea^ ^a^V1.0365^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti kenacideva  kara.niiyena. assosu.m ^a^M1.0361^ea^ kho vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no  khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m  gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa  araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m  loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m  majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti'. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m  dassana.m hotii''ti.
text.1473: [03] atha kho vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu,  sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^P1.0291^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu; appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavato santike ^a^T1.0529^ea^ naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu; appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --  ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti?  ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti?
text.1474: [03] ``adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m  upapajjanti. dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo ^a^V1.0366^ea^, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti.
text.1475: [03] ``na kho maya.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa,  vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaama. saadhu no  bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa maya.m imassa bhoto gotamassa  sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa, vitthaarena attha.m ^a^M1.0362^ea^  aajaaneyyaamaa''ti. ``tena hi, gahapatayo, su.naatha saadhuka.m manasi  karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho vera~njakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1476: [03] 445^b^.^eb^ ``tividha.m kho, gahapatayo, kaayena adhammacaarii  visamacaarii hoti, catubbidha.m vaacaaya adhammacaarii visamacaarii hoti,  tividha.m manasaa adhammacaarii visamacaarii hoti.
text.1477: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo ^a^T1.0530^ea^, tividha.m kaayena adhammacaarii visamacaarii  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti. luddo  lohitapaa.ni hatappahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno paa.nabhuutesu. adinnaadaayii  kho pana hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m... ta.m adinna.m  theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti. kaamesumicchaacaarii kho pana hoti. yaa  taa maaturakkhitaa... tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti.  eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena adhammacaarii visamacaarii hoti.
text.1478: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya adhammacaarii  visamacaarii hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musaavaadii hoti.  sabhaagato vaa... sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti. pisu.navaaco  kho pana hoti. ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa... vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m  bhaasitaa hoti. pharusavaaco kho pana hoti. yaa saa vaacaa a.n.dakaa  kakkasaa... tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. samphappalaapii kho  pana hoti. akaalavaadii... apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m. eva.m  kho, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya adhammacaarii visamacaarii hoti.
text.1479: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa adhammacaarii visamacaarii  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti...pe0... ta.m  mamassaa'ti. byaapannacitto kho pana hoti padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- ime  sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa... maa vaa ahesu'nti. micchaadi.t.thiko kho  pana ^a^V1.0367^ea^ hoti vipariitadassano -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m...  sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m ^a^T1.0531^ea^ kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa  adhammacaarii visamacaarii hoti.
text.148: [03] ``.thaana.m ^a^V1.0035^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata mameva bhikkhuu  purakkhatvaa purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya paviseyyu.m, na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m  bhikkhuu purakkhatvaa purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya paviseyyu'nti. .thaana.m  kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu purakkhatvaa  purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya paviseyyu.m, na ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu purakkhatvaa  purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya paviseyyu.m. `a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu  purakkhatvaa purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya pavisanti, na ma.m bhikkhuu  purakkhatvaa purakkhatvaa gaama.m bhattaaya pavisantii'ti -- iti so  kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca  appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1480: [03] ``eva.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo,  evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m  niraya.m upapajjanti.
text.1481: [03] 446^b^.^eb^ ``tividha.m ^a^M1.0363^ea^ kho, gahapatayo, kaayena dhammacaarii  samacaarii hoti, catubbidha.m vaacaaya dhammacaarii samacaarii hoti, tividha.m  manasaa dhammacaarii samacaarii hoti.
text.1482: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena dhammacaarii samacaarii hoti?  idha, gahapatayo, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa  pa.tivirato hoti, ya.m ta.m parassa... ta.m naadinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m  aadaataa hoti. kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya... tathaaruupaasu na  caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti. eva.m kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m kaayena  dhammacaarii samacaarii hoti.
text.1483: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya dhammacaarii samacaarii  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa  pa.tivirato hoti. sabhaagato vaa...pe0... na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa  hoti. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya... samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa  hoti. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya... tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.  samphappalaapa.m pahaaya... kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m  atthasa.mhita.m ^a^T1.0532^ea^. eva.m kho, gahapatayo, catubbidha.m vaacaaya dhammacaarii  samacaarii hoti.
text.1484: [03] ``katha~nca, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa dhammacaarii samacaarii  hoti? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa  paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m naabhijjhaataa hoti `aho vata ya.m parassa, ta.m  mamassaa'ti. abyaapannacitto kho pana hoti appadu.t.thamanasa"nkappo  -- `ime sattaa averaa abyaabajjhaa aniighaa sukhii attaana.m pariharantuu'ti.  sammaadi.t.thiko kho pana hoti avipariitadassano -- `atthi dinna.m,  atthi yi.t.tha.m... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m  kho, gahapatayo, tividha.m manasaa dhammacaarii samacaarii hoti.
text.1485: [03] ``eva.m ^a^V1.0368^ea^ dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce  sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti.
text.1486: [03] 447^b^.^eb^ ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii  samacaarii -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  khattiyamahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti ^a^M1.0364^ea^; .thaana.m kho paneta.m  vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa khattiyamahaasaalaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii  samacaarii.
text.1487: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa braahma.namahaasaalaana.m gahapatimahaasaalaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa gahapatimahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa  hetu ^a^T1.0533^ea^? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1488: [03] ``aaka"nkeyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa  hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1489: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa taavati.msaana.m devaana.m... yaamaana.m  devaana.m... tusitaana.m devaana.m... nimmaanaratiina.m  devaana.m... paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m... brahmakaayikaana.m  devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya.  ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.149: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva labheyya.m  bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu labheyya  bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da'nti. .thaana.m kho ^a^T1.0049^ea^ paneta.m,  aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no bhikkhu labheyya bhattagge aggaasana.m  aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da.m, na so bhikkhu labheyya bhattagge aggaasana.m  aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da.m. `a~n~no bhikkhu labhati bhattagge aggaasana.m  aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da.m, naaha.m labhaami bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m  aggapi.n.da'nti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho,  aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1490: [03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho  vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu?  tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.
text.1491: [01] ``aaka"nkheyya ^a^V1.0369^ea^ ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii  `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parittaabhaana.m devaana.m...pe0...  appamaa.naabhaana.m devaana.m... aabhassaraana.m devaana.m...  parittasubhaana.m devaana.m... appamaa.nasubhaana.m devaana.m...  subhaki.nhaana.m devaana.m ^a^T1.0534^ea^... vehapphalaana.m devaana.m... avihaana.m  devaana.m... atappaana.m devaana.m... sudassaana.m devaana.m...  sudassiina.m devaana.m... akani.t.thaana.m devaana.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m ^a^M1.0365^ea^   devaana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m  kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa  hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.

text.1493: [03] 448^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m  etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m bho gotama!  seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena  anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m  gacchaama ^a^T1.0535^ea^ dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.
text.1496: [03] 449^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0536^ea^ ^a^V1.0370^ea^ ^a^P1.0292^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito  yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa  saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca ^a^M1.0366^ea^ --
text.1497: [03] ```duppa~n~no duppa~n~no'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu  kho, aavuso, duppa~n~noti vuccatii''ti?
text.1498: [03] ```nappajaanaati nappajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa  duppa~n~noti vuccati.
text.1499: [03] ``ki~nca nappajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti nappajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhasamudayo'ti nappajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti nappajaanaati,  `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti nappajaanaati. `nappajaanaati  nappajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa duppa~n~noti vuccatii''ti.
text.15: [03] ``subhaki.nhe subhaki.nhato sa~njaanaati; subhaki.nhe subhaki.nhato  sa~n~natvaa subhaki.nhe ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhesu ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhato  ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhe meti ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhe abhinandati. ta.m  kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.150: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva bhattagge  bhuttaavii anumodeyya.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu bhattagge bhuttaavii  anumodeyyaa'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no  bhikkhu bhattagge bhuttaavii anumodeyya, na so bhikkhu bhattagge bhuttaavii  anumodeyya. `a~n~no bhikkhu bhattagge bhuttaavii ^a^M1.0034^ea^ anumodati, naaha.m  bhattagge bhuttaavii anumodaamii'ti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito.  yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m  a"nga.na.m.
text.1500: [03] ```saadhaavuso'ti kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmato  saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi --
text.1501: [03] ```pa~n~navaa pa~n~navaa'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu  kho, aavuso, pa~n~navaati vuccatii''ti?
text.1502: [03] ```pajaanaati pajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa pa~n~navaati  vuccati.
text.1503: [03] ``ki~nca pajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhasamudayo'ti pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti ^a^T1.0537^ea^ ^a^V1.0371^ea^ pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti pajaanaati. `pajaanaati  pajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa pa~n~navaati vuccatii''ti.
text.1504: [03] ```vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.na'nti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu  kho, aavuso, vi~n~naa.nanti vuccatii''ti?
text.1505: [03] ```vijaanaati vijaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa  vi~n~naa.nanti vuccati.
text.1506: [03] ``ki~nca vijaanaati?  sukhantipi vijaanaati, dukkhantipi vijaanaati,  adukkhamasukhantipi vijaanaati. `vijaanaati vijaanaatii'ti kho,  aavuso, tasmaa vi~n~naa.nanti vuccatii''ti.
text.1507: [03] ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa  udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa {vinibbhujjitvaa  vinibbhujjitvaa (ka0)}  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti? ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa  ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa  imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m.  ya.m haavuso {ya~ncaavuso (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, pajaanaati ta.m vijaanaati, ya.m vijaanaati ta.m pajaanaati.  tasmaa ^a^P1.0293^ea^ ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa. na  ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m  pa~n~naapetu''nti.
text.1508: [03] ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- imesa.m dhammaana.m  sa.msa.t.thaana.m no visa.msa.t.thaana.m ki.m naanaakara.na''nti? ``yaa caavuso,  pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- imesa.m ^a^M1.0367^ea^ dhammaana.m sa.msa.t.thaana.m no visa.msa.t.thaana.m  pa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, vi~n~naa.na.m pari~n~neyya.m. ida.m nesa.m naanaakara.na''nti.
text.1509: [03] 450^b^.^eb^ ```vedanaa vedanaa'ti, aavuso, vuccati.  kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso ^a^T1.0538^ea^, vedanaati vuccatii''ti?
text.151: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva aaraamagataana.m  bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m  dhamma.m deseyyaa'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no  bhikkhu ^a^V1.0036^ea^ aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya, na so bhikkhu  aaraamagataana.m ^a^P1.0029^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m deseyya. `a~n~no  bhikkhu aaraamagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m ^a^T1.0050^ea^ deseti, naaha.m aaraamagataana.m  bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desemii'ti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito.  yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1510: [03] ```vedeti vedetii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa vedanaati vuccati.
text.1511: [03] ``ki~nca ^a^V1.0372^ea^ vedeti? sukhampi vedeti, dukkhampi vedeti,  adukkhamasukhampi vedeti. `vedeti vedetii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa  vedanaati vuccatii''ti.
text.1512: [03] ```sa~n~naa sa~n~naa'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho,  aavuso, sa~n~naati vuccatii''ti?
text.1513: [03] ```sa~njaanaati sa~njaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa sa~n~naati  vuccati.
text.1514: [03] ``ki~nca sa~njaanaati?  niilakampi sa~njaanaati, piitakampi sa~njaanaati, lohitakampi  sa~njaanaati, odaatampi sa~njaanaati. `sa~njaanaati sa~njaanaatii'ti kho,  aavuso, tasmaa sa~n~naati vuccatii''ti.
text.1515: [03] ``yaa caavuso, vedanaa yaa ca sa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime  dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m  vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti? ``yaa  caavuso, vedanaa yaa ca sa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa,  no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m. ya.m haavuso {ya~ncaavuso (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)}, vedeti ta.m  sa~njaanaati, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m vijaanaati. tasmaa ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa  no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa  vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti.
text.1516: [03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``nissa.t.thena haavuso {nissa.t.thena panaavuso (?)}, pa~ncahi indriyehi  parisuddhena manovi~n~naa.nena ki.m neyya''nti?
text.1517: [03] ``nissa.t.thena aavuso, pa~ncahi indriyehi parisuddhena  manovi~n~naa.nena `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0539^ea^ neyya.m,  `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m neyya.m, `natthi ki~ncii'ti  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m neyya''nti.
text.152: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva aaraamagataana.m  bhikkhuniina.m dhamma.m deseyya.m...pe0... upaasakaana.m dhamma.m deseyya.m...pe0...  upaasikaana.m dhamma.m deseyya.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu aaraamagataana.m upaasikaana.m  dhamma.m deseyyaa'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no  bhikkhu aaraamagataana.m upaasikaana.m dhamma.m deseyya, na so bhikkhu  aaraamagataana.m upaasikaana.m dhamma.m deseyya. `a~n~no bhikkhu  aaraamagataana.m upaasikaana.m dhamma.m deseti, naaha.m aaraamagataana.m upaasikaana.m  dhamma.m desemii'ti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva  kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1523: [03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaaya -- parato  ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve paccayaa  sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaayaa''ti.
text.1524: [03] ``katihi panaavuso, a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi  cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca,  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti?
text.1525: [03] ``pa~ncahi kho, aavuso, a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi  cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca,  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. idhaavuso,  sammaadi.t.thi siilaanuggahitaa ca hoti, sutaanuggahitaa ca hoti,  saakacchaanuggahitaa ca hoti, samathaanuggahitaa ca hoti,  vipassanaanuggahitaa ca hoti. imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncaha"ngehi  anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti  cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti  pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti.
text.1529: [03] ``avijjaaniivara.naana.m ^a^V1.0374^ea^ kho, aavuso, sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m  tatratatraabhinandanaa -- eva.m aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti hotii''ti.
text.153: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata mameva bhikkhuu  sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m {garukareyyu.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu  sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m,  aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m  maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, na ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m  puujeyyu.m. `a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu sakkaronti garu.m ^a^M1.0035^ea^ karonti maanenti  puujenti ^a^T1.0051^ea^, na ma.m bhikkhuu sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujentii'ti  -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso,  kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1531: [03] ``avijjaaviraagaa kho, aavuso, vijjuppaadaa ta.nhaanirodhaa --  eva.m aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti na hotii''ti.
text.1533: [03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati -- ida.m vuccati, aavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana''nti.
text.1535: [03] ``pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m pa~nca"ngika.m. idhaavuso, pa.thama.m  jhaana.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno vitakko ca vattati, vicaaro ca piiti ca  sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca. pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m eva.m  pa~nca"ngika''nti.
text.1537: [03] ``pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m pa~nca"ngavippahiina.m, pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m.  idhaavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno kaamacchando pahiino ^a^M1.0369^ea^   hoti, byaapaado pahiino hoti, thiinamiddha.m pahiina.m hoti, uddhaccakukkucca.m  pahiina.m ^a^P1.0295^ea^ hoti, vicikicchaa pahiinaa hoti;  vitakko ca vattati, vicaaro ca piiti ca sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca.  pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m eva.m pa~nca"ngavippahiina.m  pa~nca"ngasamannaagata''nti.
text.1538: [03] 455^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T1.0541^ea^, aavuso, indriyaani  naanaavisayaani naanaagocaraani, na a~n~nama~n~nassa ^a^V1.0375^ea^ gocaravisaya.m  paccanubhonti, seyyathida.m -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m,  jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m.  imesa.m kho, aavuso, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m  naanaagocaraana.m, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m, ki.m  pa.tisara.na.m, ko ca nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti?
text.1539: [03] ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani naanaavisayaani  naanaagocaraani, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhonti, seyyathida.m  -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m.  imesa.m kho, aavuso, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m naanaagocaraana.m,  na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m, mano pa.tisara.na.m, mano  ca nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti.
text.154: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata mameva  bhikkhuniyo...pe0... upaasakaa...pe0... upaasikaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m  kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, na a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m upaasikaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m  kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m  a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m upaasikaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, na ta.m  bhikkhu.m upaasikaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m ^a^V1.0037^ea^ kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m. `a~n~na.m  bhikkhu.m upaasikaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, na ma.m  upaasikaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujentii'ti -- iti so  kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca  appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1540: [03] 456^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani, seyyathida.m  -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m.  imaani kho, aavuso, pa~ncindriyaani ki.m pa.ticca  ti.t.thantii''ti?
text.1541: [03] ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani, seyyathida.m --  cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m.  imaani kho, aavuso, pa~ncindriyaani aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thantii''ti.
text.1546: [03] ``idaaneva kho maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m  eva.m aajaanaama -- `aayu ^a^V1.0376^ea^ usma.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii'ti. idaaneva pana  maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato ^a^T1.0542^ea^ saariputtassa bhaasita.m eva.m aajaanaama --  `usmaa aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii'ti.
text.1547: [03] ``yathaa katha.m panaavuso, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti?
text.1548: [03] ``tena haavuso, upama.m te karissaami; upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu  purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaananti. seyyathaapi, aavuso,  telappadiipassa jhaayato acci.m pa.ticca aabhaa pa~n~naayati, aabha.m pa.ticca  acci pa~n~naayati; evameva kho, aavuso, aayu usma.m pa.ticca ti.t.thati,  usmaa aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti.
text.1549: [03] 457^b^.^eb^ ``teva ^a^M1.0370^ea^ nu kho, aavuso, aayusa"nkhaaraa, te  vedaniyaa dhammaa udaahu a~n~ne aayusa"nkhaaraa a~n~ne vedaniyaa  dhammaa''ti? ``na kho ^a^P1.0296^ea^, aavuso, teva  aayusa"nkhaaraa te vedaniyaa dhammaa. te ca haavuso, aayusa"nkhaaraa  abhavi.msu te vedaniyaa dhammaa, na yida.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m  samaapannassa bhikkhuno vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayetha. yasmaa ca kho, aavuso,  a~n~ne aayusa"nkhaaraa a~n~ne vedaniyaa dhammaa, tasmaa  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayatii''ti.
text.155: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva laabhii assa.m  pa.niitaana.m ciivaraana.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu laabhii assa pa.niitaana.m  ciivaraana'nti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no  ^a^P1.0030^ea^ bhikkhu laabhii assa pa.niitaana.m ciivaraana.m, na so  bhikkhu laabhii assa pa.niitaana.m ciivaraana.m. `a~n~no bhikkhu laabhii {laabhii assa  (ka0)}   pa.niitaana.m ciivaraana.m, naaha.m laabhii ^a^T1.0052^ea^ {laabhii assa.m (ka0)} pa.niitaana.m ciivaraana'nti -- iti so  kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca  appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1550: [03] ``yadaa nu kho, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m kati dhammaa jahanti; athaaya.m  kaayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yathaa ka.t.tha.m acetana''nti?
text.1551: [03] ``yadaa kho, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m tayo dhammaa jahanti -- aayu usmaa  ca vi~n~naa.na.m; athaaya.m kaayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yathaa ka.t.tha.m  acetana''nti.
text.1552: [03] ``yvaaya.m, aavuso, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu  sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno -- imesa.m ki.m naanaakara.na''nti?
text.1553: [03] ``yvaaya.m, aavuso, mato kaala"nkato tassa kaayasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa  pa.tippassaddhaa ^a^T1.0543^ea^, vaciisa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, cittasa"nkhaaraa  niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, aayu parikkhii.no, usmaa vuupasantaa, indriyaani  paribhinnaani. yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno  tassapi kaayasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, vaciisa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa  pa.tippassaddhaa, cittasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, aayu na  parikkhii.no, usmaa avuupasantaa, indriyaani vippasannaani. yvaaya.m,  aavuso, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m  samaapanno -- ida.m nesa.m naanaakara.na''nti.
text.1555: [03] ``cattaaro kho, aavuso, paccayaa  adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa. idhaavuso, bhikkhu  sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m  attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati. ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro paccayaa  adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti.
text.1557: [03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya  cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa ^a^M1.0371^ea^ -- sabbanimittaana~nca amanasikaaro,  animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa manasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve paccayaa  animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti.
text.1559: [03] ``tayo kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya  cetovimuttiyaa ^a^T1.0544^ea^ .thitiyaa ^a^P1.0297^ea^ -- sabbanimittaana~nca  amanasikaaro, animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa manasikaaro, pubbe ca  abhisa"nkhaaro. ime kho, aavuso, tayo paccayaa animittaaya  cetovimuttiyaa .thitiyaa''ti.
text.156: [03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa  bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ahameva laabhii assa.m  pa.niitaana.m pi.n.dapaataana.m...pe0... pa.niitaana.m senaasanaana.m...pe0...  pa.niitaana.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, na a~n~no bhikkhu laabhii  assa pa.niitaana.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'nti. .thaana.m kho  paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m a~n~no bhikkhu laabhii assa pa.niitaana.m  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, na so bhikkhu laabhii assa  pa.niitaana.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. `a~n~no bhikkhu ^a^M1.0036^ea^ laabhii  {laabhii assa (ka0)} pa.niitaana.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, naaha.m laabhii  {laabhii assa.m (ka0)} pa.niitaana.m  gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'nti -- iti so kupito hoti  appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo --  ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.
text.1561: [03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya  cetovimuttiyaa vu.t.thaanaaya -- sabbanimittaana~nca manasikaaro,  animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa amanasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve  paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa vu.t.thaanaayaa''ti.
text.1562: [03] 459^b^.^eb^ ``yaa caaya.m, aavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimutti,  yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti, yaa ca su~n~nataa cetovimutti, yaa ca  animittaa cetovimutti -- ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca  udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti?
text.1563: [03] ``yaa caaya.m, aavuso,  appamaa.naa cetovimutti, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti, yaa ca  su~n~nataa cetovimutti, yaa ca animittaa cetovimutti -- atthi kho,  aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva  naanaabya~njanaa ca; atthi ca kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m  aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa, bya~njanameva naana.m''.
text.1564: [03] ``katamo ^a^V1.0378^ea^ caavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa  naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca''?
text.1565: [03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu  mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa  tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya  sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena ^a^T1.0545^ea^ cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena  averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena  cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena  cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa  catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho ^a^M1.0372^ea^ tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m  upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena  abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso, appamaa.naa  cetovimutti''.
text.1567: [03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma natthi  ki~nciiti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso,  aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti''.
text.1569: [03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `su~n~namida.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa'ti. aya.m  ^a^P1.0298^ea^ vuccataavuso, su~n~nataa cetovimutti''.
text.157: [03] ``imesa.m kho eta.m, aavuso, paapakaana.m akusalaana.m icchaavacaraana.m  adhivacana.m, yadida.m a"nga.na''nti.
text.1571: [03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m  upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso, animittaa cetovimutti. aya.m  kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanaatthaa  ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca''.
text.1572: [03] ``katamo caavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa  ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana.m''?
text.1573: [03] ``raago kho, aavuso, pamaa.nakara.no,  doso pamaa.nakara.no, moho pamaa.nakara.no. te khii.naasavassa  bhikkhuno pahiinaa ^a^T1.0546^ea^ ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m  anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimuttiyo,  akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa  cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. raago  kho, aavuso, ki~ncano, doso ki~ncano, moho ki~ncano. te  khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa  anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso,  aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti  aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena,  su~n~naa dosena ^a^V1.0379^ea^, su~n~naa mohena. raago kho, aavuso, nimittakara.no,  doso nimittakara.no, moho nimittakara.no. te ^a^M1.0373^ea^ khii.naasavassa  bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m  anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso, animittaa cetovimuttiyo,  akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa  cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. aya.m  kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa  bya~njanameva naana''nti.
text.1574: [03] idamavocaayasmaa saariputto. attamano aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko  aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.1577: [03] 460^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0547^ea^ ^a^V1.0380^ea^ ^a^P1.0299^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho  visaakho upaasako yena dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m  etadavoca -- ```sakkaayo sakkaayo'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamo nu  kho, ayye, sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa''ti? ``pa~nca kho ime, aavuso  visaakha, upaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa, seyyathida.m --  ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho,  sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime kho, aavuso  visaakha, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa''ti.
text.1578: [03] ``saadhayye''ti kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinnaaya  bhikkhuniyaa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m  uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ```sakkaayasamudayo sakkaayasamudayo'ti,  ayye, vuccati. katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkaayasamudayo vutto  bhagavataa''ti? ``yaaya.m, aavuso visaakha, ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa  nandiiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa  bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaa; aya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayasamudayo  vutto bhagavataa''ti.
text.1579: [03] ```sakkaayanirodho ^a^M1.0374^ea^ sakkaayanirodho'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamo  nu kho, ayye, sakkaayanirodho vutto bhagavataa''ti?
text.158: [03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, aavuso, bhikkhuno ime  paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca,  ki~ncaapi so hoti aara~n~niko pantasenaasano pi.n.dapaatiko ^a^V1.0038^ea^   sapadaanacaarii pa.msukuuliko luukhaciivaradharo, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na  ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti na maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa  hetu? te hi tassa ^a^T1.0053^ea^ aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa  appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca. seyyathaapi, aavuso,  ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa.  tamena.m saamikaa ahiku.napa.m vaa kukkuraku.napa.m vaa manussaku.napa.m vaa  racayitvaa a~n~nissaa ka.msapaatiyaa pa.tikujjitvaa antaraapa.na.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m.  tamena.m jano disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, kimevida.m hariiyati  ja~n~naja~n~na.m viyaa'ti? tamena.m u.t.thahitvaa apaapuritvaa {avaapuritvaa (sii0)} olokeyya.  tassa sahadassanena amanaapataa ca sa.n.thaheyya, paa.tikulyataa {pa.tikuulataa (ka0),  paa.tikuulyataa (syaa0)} ca  sa.n.thaheyya, jegucchataa ca {jegucchitaa ca (pii0 ka0)} sa.n.thaheyya; jighacchitaanampi na bhottukamyataa  assa, pageva suhitaana.m. evameva kho, aavuso, yassa kassaci  bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva  suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti aara~n~niko pantasenaasano  pi.n.dapaatiko sapadaanacaarii pa.msukuuliko luukhaciivaradharo, atha kho na.m  sabrahmacaarii na ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti ^a^P1.0031^ea^ na  maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi tassa aayasmato  paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca.
text.1580: [03] ``yo ^a^T1.0548^ea^ kho,  aavuso visaakha, tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago  pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo; aya.m kho, aavuso visaakha,  sakkaayanirodho vutto bhagavataa''ti.
text.1581: [03] ```sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa sakkaayanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, ayye,  sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti?
text.1582: [03] ``ayameva kho,  aavuso visaakha, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sakkaayanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m ^a^V1.0381^ea^ -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo  sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo  sammaasati sammaasamaadhii''ti.
text.1583: [03] ``ta~n~neva nu kho, ayye, upaadaana.m  te {teva (sii0)} pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa udaahu a~n~natra pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi  upaadaana''nti? ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, ta~n~neva upaadaana.m te  pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, naapi ^a^P1.0300^ea^ a~n~natra  pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi upaadaana.m. yo kho, aavuso visaakha, pa~ncasu  upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraago ta.m tattha upaadaana''nti.
text.1584: [03] 461^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m panaayye, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti?  ``idhaavuso visaakha, assutavaa puthujjano, ariyaana.m adassaavii  ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m  adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, ruupa.m  attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m  vaa attaana.m. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare...  vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa  vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho ^a^T1.0549^ea^, aavuso visaakha,  sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti.
text.1586: [03] ``idhaavuso visaakha, sutavaa ariyasaavako, ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa  kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii  sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, na ruupa.m attato  samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa ruupa.m, na  ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. na vedana.m...pe0... na sa~n~na.m... na  sa"nkhaare...pe0... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa  attaana.m ^a^M1.0375^ea^, na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m  kho, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti.
text.1588: [03] ``ayameva kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko  maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa  sammaakammanto ^a^V1.0382^ea^ sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati  sammaasamaadhii''ti. ``ariyo panaayye, a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"nkhato  udaahu asa"nkhato''ti?
text.1589: [03] ``ariyo kho, aavuso visaakha,  a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"nkhato''ti ^a^P1.0301^ea^.
text.159: [03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, aavuso, bhikkhuno ime  paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca,  ki~ncaapi so hoti gaamantavihaarii ^a^M1.0037^ea^ nemantaniko gahapaticiivaradharo,  atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti.  ta.m kissa hetu ^a^T1.0054^ea^? te hi tassa aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa  icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca. seyyathaapi,  aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa  pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa saaliina.m odana.m vicitakaa.laka.m {vicinitakaa.laka.m  (ka0)}  anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana.m racayitvaa a~n~nissaa ka.msapaatiyaa  pa.tikujjitvaa antaraapa.na.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m. tamena.m jano disvaa eva.m  vadeyya -- `ambho, kimevida.m hariiyati ja~n~naja~n~na.m viyaa'ti? tamena.m  u.t.thahitvaa apaapuritvaa olokeyya. tassa saha dassanena manaapataa ca  sa.n.thaheyya, appaa.tikulyataa ca sa.n.thaheyya, ajegucchataa ca sa.n.thaheyya;  suhitaanampi bhottukamyataa assa, pageva jighacchitaana.m. evameva kho,  aavuso, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa  pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti  gaamantavihaarii nemantaniko gahapaticiivaradharo, atha kho na.m  sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti ^a^V1.0039^ea^. ta.m kissa  hetu? te hi tassa aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa  dissanti ceva suuyanti caa''ti.
text.1590: [03] ``ariyena nu kho, ayye, a.t.tha"ngikena maggena tayo khandhaa  sa"ngahitaa udaahu tiihi khandhehi ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo  sa"ngahito''ti?
text.1591: [03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena  maggena tayo khandhaa sa"ngahitaa; tiihi ca kho, aavuso visaakha,  khandhehi ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"ngahito. yaa caavuso visaakha,  sammaavaacaa yo ca sammaakammanto yo ca sammaaaajiivo ime dhammaa ^a^T1.0550^ea^  siilakkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yo ca sammaavaayaamo yaa ca sammaasati yo  ca sammaasamaadhi ime dhammaa samaadhikkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yaa ca  sammaadi.t.thi yo ca sammaasa"nkappo, ime dhammaa pa~n~naakkhandhe  sa"ngahitaa''ti.
text.1592: [03] ``katamo panaayye, samaadhi, katame dhammaa samaadhinimittaa,  katame dhammaa samaadhiparikkhaaraa, katamaa samaadhibhaavanaa''ti?
text.1593: [03] ``yaa kho, aavuso visaakha, cittassa ekaggataa aya.m samaadhi; cattaaro  satipa.t.thaanaa samaadhinimittaa; cattaaro sammappadhaanaa samaadhiparikkhaaraa.  yaa tesa.myeva dhammaana.m aasevanaa bhaavanaa bahuliikamma.m, aya.m ettha  samaadhibhaavanaa''ti.
text.1595: [03] ``tayome, aavuso visaakha, sa"nkhaaraa -- kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro,  cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
text.1596: [03] ``katamo panaayye, kaayasa"nkhaaro, katamo  vaciisa"nkhaaro, katamo cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?
text.1597: [03] ``assaasapassaasaa kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayasa"nkhaaro, vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro,  sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
text.1598: [03] ``kasmaa panaayye,  assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, kasmaa vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro,  kasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?
text.1599: [03] ``assaasapassaasaa  kho, aavuso ^a^M1.0376^ea^ visaakha, kaayikaa ete dhammaa kaayappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa  assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro. pubbe kho, aavuso visaakha,  vitakketvaa vicaaretvaa pacchaa vaaca.m bhindati, tasmaa vitakkavicaaraa  vaciisa"nkhaaro. sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cetasikaa ete dhammaa ^a^T1.0551^ea^  cittappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
text.16: [03] ``vehapphale ^a^M1.0003^ea^ vehapphalato sa~njaanaati; vehapphale vehapphalato  sa~n~natvaa vehapphale ma~n~nati, vehapphalesu ma~n~nati, vehapphalato ma~n~nati,  vehapphale meti ma~n~nati, vehapphale abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu?  `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.160: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``upamaa ma.m, aavuso saariputta, pa.tibhaatii''ti.  ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aavuso moggallaanaa''ti. ``ekamidaaha.m, aavuso,  samaya.m raajagahe viharaami giribbaje. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso,  pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^T1.0055^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m.  tena kho pana samayena samiiti yaanakaaraputto rathassa nemi.m tacchati.  tamena.m pa.n.duputto aajiivako puraa.nayaanakaaraputto paccupa.t.thito hoti.  atha kho, aavuso, pa.n.duputtassa aajiivakassa puraa.nayaanakaaraputtassa  eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `aho vataaya.m samiiti  yaanakaaraputto imissaa nemiyaa ima~nca va"nka.m ima~nca jimha.m ima~nca  dosa.m taccheyya, evaaya.m nemi apagatava"nkaa apagatajimhaa apagatadosaa  suddhaa assa {suddhaassa (sii0 pii0), suddhaa (ka0)} saare pati.t.thitaa'ti ^a^P1.0032^ea^. yathaa yathaa kho,  aavuso, pa.n.duputtassa aajiivakassa puraa.nayaanakaaraputtassa cetaso  parivitakko hoti, tathaa tathaa ^a^M1.0038^ea^ samiiti yaanakaaraputto tassaa nemiyaa  ta~nca va"nka.m ta~nca jimha.m ta~nca dosa.m tacchati. atha kho, aavuso,  pa.n.duputto aajiivako puraa.nayaanakaaraputto attamano attamanavaaca.m  nicchaaresi -- `hadayaa hadaya.m ma~n~ne a~n~naaya tacchatii'ti.
text.1601: [03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m  samaapajjantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m  samaapajjissa'nti vaa, `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa,  `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno'ti vaa. atha khvaassa pubbeva  tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.
text.1602: [03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantass ^a^P1.0302^ea^  panaayye, bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m nirujjhanti -- yadi vaa  kaayasa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?  ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa kho, aavuso visaakha,  bhikkhuno pa.thama.m nirujjhati vaciisa"nkhaaro, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato  cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
text.1604: [03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha,  sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti --  `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahissa'nti vaa, `aha.m  sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahaamii'ti vaa, `aha.m  sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa. atha khvaassa pubbeva  tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.
text.1605: [03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa panaayye,  bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m uppajjanti -- yadi vaa kaayasa"nkhaaro,  yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi ^a^T1.0552^ea^ vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?  ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa kho, aavuso visaakha,  bhikkhuno pa.thama.m uppajjati cittasa"nkhaaro, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato  vaciisa"nkhaaro''ti.
text.1606: [03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thita.m panaayye, bhikkhu.m  kati phassaa phusantii''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa  vu.t.thita.m kho, aavuso ^a^M1.0377^ea^ visaakha, bhikkhu.m tayo phassaa phusanti --  su~n~nato phasso, animitto phasso, appa.nihito phasso''ti.
text.1607: [03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa panaayye,  bhikkhuno ki.mninna.m citta.m hoti ki.mpo.na.m ki.mpabbhaara''nti?  ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa kho, aavuso visaakha,  bhikkhuno vivekaninna.m citta.m hoti, vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara''nti.
text.1609: [03] ``tisso kho imaa, aavuso visaakha, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa,  adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa''ti.
text.161: [03] ``evameva kho, aavuso, ye te puggalaa assaddhaa, jiivikatthaa  na saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino {ke.tubhino  (bahuusu)}   uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu aguttadvaaraa,  bhojane amatta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa, saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto,  sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa, baahulikaa saathalikaa, okkamane  pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatii  asampajaanaa asamaahitaa ^a^T1.0056^ea^ vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, tesa.m  aayasmaa saariputto iminaa dhammapariyaayena hadayaa hadaya.m ma~n~ne  a~n~naaya tacchati.
text.1610: [03] ``katamaa panaayye, sukhaa vedanaa,  katamaa dukkhaa vedanaa, katamaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa''ti?
text.1611: [03] ``ya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m vaa cetasika.m vaa sukha.m saata.m  vedayita.m -- aya.m sukhaa vedanaa. ya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m  vaa cetasika.m vaa dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m -- aya.m dukkhaa vedanaa. ya.m  kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m vaa cetasika.m vaa neva saata.m naasaata.m  vedayita.m -- aya.m adukkhamasukhaa ^a^P1.0303^ea^ vedanaa''ti.
text.1612: [03] ``sukhaa panaayye, vedanaa ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa, dukkhaa vedanaa  ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa''ti?
text.1613: [03] ``sukhaa kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaa .thitisukhaa  vipari.naamadukkhaa; dukkhaa vedanaa .thitidukkhaa vipari.naamasukhaa ^a^T1.0553^ea^;  adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa ~naa.nasukhaa a~n~naa.nadukkhaa''ti.
text.1614: [03] ``sukhaaya panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m anusayo anuseti, dukkhaaya  vedanaaya ki.m anusayo anuseti, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ki.m  anusayo anusetii''ti?
text.1615: [03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya  raagaanusayo anuseti, dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
text.1616: [03] ``sabbaaya nu kho, ayye, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo  anuseti, sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti, sabbaaya  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti?
text.1617: [03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sabbaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo anuseti, na  sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti, na sabbaaya  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
text.1618: [03] ``sukhaaya ^a^M1.0378^ea^ panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m pahaatabba.m, dukkhaaya vedanaaya  ki.m pahaatabba.m, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ki.m pahaatabba''nti?
text.1619: [03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo,  dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo''ti.
text.162: [03] ``ye pana te kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa,  asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa  amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu guttadvaaraa, bhojane matta~n~nuno,  jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, saama~n~ne apekkhavanto, sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa, na  baahulikaa ^a^V1.0040^ea^ na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke  pubba"ngamaa, aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatii sampajaanaa  samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te aayasmato  saariputtassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa pivanti ma~n~ne, ghasanti ma~n~ne  vacasaa ceva manasaa ca -- `saadhu vata, bho, sabrahmacaarii akusalaa  vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetii'ti. seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii vaa  puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko siisa.mnhaato uppalamaala.m vaa  vassikamaala.m vaa atimuttakamaala.m {adhimuttakamaala.m (syaa0)} vaa labhitvaa ubhohi hatthehi  pa.tiggahetvaa uttama"nge sirasmi.m pati.t.thapeyya, evameva kho, aavuso, ye  te kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, asa.thaa  amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa  aviki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu guttadvaaraa, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m  anuyuttaa, saama~n~ne apekkhavanto, sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa, na ^a^T1.0057^ea^  baahulikaa na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke  pubba"ngamaa, aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatii ^a^M1.0039^ea^ sampajaanaa  samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te aayasmato  saariputtassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa pivanti ma~n~ne, ghasanti ma~n~ne  vacasaa ceva manasaa ca -- `saadhu vata, bho, sabrahmacaarii akusalaa  vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetii'ti. itiha te ubho mahaanaagaa  a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m samanumodi.msuu''ti.
text.1620: [03] ``sabbaaya ^a^V1.0385^ea^ nu kho, ayye, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo  pahaatabbo, sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo, sabbaaya  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo''ti?
text.1621: [03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sabbaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo, na  sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo ^a^T1.0554^ea^, na sabbaaya  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo. idhaavuso  visaakha, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi  savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. raaga.m tena pajahati, na tattha raagaanusayo anuseti.  idhaavuso visaakha, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `kudaassu  naamaaha.m tadaayatana.m upasampajja viharissaami yadariyaa etarahi aayatana.m  upasampajja viharantii'ti? iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m  upa.t.thaapayato ^a^P1.0304^ea^ uppajjati pihaappaccayaa domanassa.m.  pa.tigha.m tena pajahati, na tattha pa.tighaanusayo anuseti. idhaavuso  visaakha, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa, dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. avijja.m tena pajahati, na tattha  avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
text.1623: [03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya dukkhaa vedanaa  pa.tibhaago''ti.
text.1625: [03] ``dukkhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya sukhaa vedanaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
text.1627: [03] ``adukkhamasukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya avijjaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
text.1634: [03] ``nibbaanassa panaayye, ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti? ``accayaasi, aavuso  {accasaraavuso (sii0 pii0), accassaraavuso (syaa0 ka.m0)} visaakha,  pa~nha.m, naasakkhi pa~nhaana.m pariyanta.m gahetu.m. nibbaanogadha~nhi, aavuso  visaakha, brahmacariya.m, nibbaanaparaayana.m nibbaanapariyosaana.m.  aaka"nkhamaano ca tva.m, aavuso visaakha, bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa  etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, yathaa ca te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m  dhaareyyaasii''ti.
text.1635: [03] 467^b^.^eb^ atha kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinnaaya  bhikkhuniyaa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa dhammadinna.m  bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho visaakho upaasako yaavatako ahosi dhammadinnaaya  bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m  vutte, bhagavaa visaakha.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``pa.n.ditaa, visaakha,  dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii, mahaapa~n~naa, visaakha, dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii.  ma.m cepi tva.m, visaakha, etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, ahampi ta.m evameva.m  byaakareyya.m, yathaa ^a^P1.0305^ea^ ta.m dhammadinnaaya bhikkhuniyaa  byaakata.m. eso cevetassa {esovetassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} attho. eva~nca na.m  {evameta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} dhaarehii''ti.
text.1636: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano visaakho upaasako bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.1639: [03] 468^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0556^ea^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarimaani,  bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaanaani. katamaani cattaari? atthi, bhikkhave,  dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m; atthi, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0380^ea^,  dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m; atthi,  bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m; atthi,  bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m''.

kaamesu doso'ti.  te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjanti. te kho mo.libaddhaahi {mo.libandhaahi (syaa0  ka.m0 ka0)}  paribbaajikaahi paricaarenti. te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.msu naama te  bhonto samphasso'ti  te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjanti. te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjitvaa  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m ^a^T1.0557^ea^ duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti.  te tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti. te  evamaaha.msu -- `ida.m kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa kaamesu anaagatabhaya.m  sampassamaanaa kaamaana.m pahaanamaaha.msu, kaamaana.m text.1642: [03] 471^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m  paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m? idha ^a^V1.0390^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco  pakatiyaa tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, so abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m  domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa tibbadosajaatiko hoti, so  abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa  tibbamohajaatiko hoti, so abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m  pa.tisa.mvedeti. so sahaapi dukkhena, sahaapi domanassena,  assumukhopi rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati. so  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ida.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m.
text.1643: [03] 472^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m  paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco  pakatiyaa na tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, so na abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m  dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa na tibbadosajaatiko  hoti, so na abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti;  pakatiyaa na tibbamohajaatiko hoti ^a^P1.0309^ea^, so na  abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so vivicceva  kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m ^a^T1.0562^ea^  piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m  samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...   catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.  ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca  sukhavipaaka.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari dhammasamaadaanaanii''ti.
text.1644: [03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0384^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.1647: [03] 473^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0391^ea^ ^a^T1.0563^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave,  sattaa eva.mkaamaa eva.mchandaa eva.madhippaayaa -- `aho vata ani.t.thaa  akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayeyyu.m, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dheyyu'nti. tesa.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.mkaamaana.m eva.mchandaana.m  eva.madhippaayaana.m ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa  kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, ka.m hetu.m  paccethaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^P1.0310^ea^ no, bhante, dhammaa,  bhagava.mnettikaa, bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta~n~neva  pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho; bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu  dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi  karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1648: [03] 474^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano,  ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito,  sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme  aviniito, sevitabbe dhamme na jaanaati asevitabbe dhamme na  jaanaati, bhajitabbe ^a^T1.0564^ea^ dhamme na jaanaati abhajitabbe dhamme na jaanaati.  so sevitabbe dhamme ajaananto asevitabbe dhamme ajaananto,  bhajitabbe dhamme ajaananto abhajitabbe dhamme ajaananto, asevitabbe  dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajati  bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati. tassa asevitabbe dhamme sevato  sevitabbe dhamme asevato, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajato bhajitabbe dhamme  abhajato ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa ^a^M1.0385^ea^ abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa  manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave,  hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
text.1649: [03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako, ariyaana.m dassaavii  ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme ^a^V1.0392^ea^ suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii  sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, sevitabbe dhamme  jaanaati asevitabbe dhamme jaanaati, bhajitabbe dhamme jaanaati  abhajitabbe dhamme jaanaati. so sevitabbe dhamme jaananto  asevitabbe dhamme jaananto, bhajitabbe dhamme jaananto abhajitabbe  dhamme jaananto, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati,  abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati. tassa  asevitabbe dhamme asevato sevitabbe dhamme sevato, abhajitabbe dhamme  abhajato bhajitabbe dhamme bhajato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa  parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m ^a^T1.0565^ea^ kissa  hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.
text.165: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0058^ea^ ^a^V1.0041^ea^ ^a^P1.0033^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra  kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti  te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.1650: [03] 475^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaanaani.  katamaani cattaari? atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m  paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m; atthi, bhikkhave,  dhammasamaadaana.m ^a^P1.0311^ea^ paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m;  atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m;  atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca  sukhavipaaka.m.
text.1651: [03] 476^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m {yadida.m (sii0)} dhammasamaadaana.m  paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva  aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m  appajaananto ta.m sevati, ta.m na parivajjeti. tassa ta.m sevato, ta.m  aparivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa  kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m,  bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
text.1652: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m  dukkhavipaaka.m ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m  kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m ^a^M1.0386^ea^ aayati.m dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m  avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m sevati, ta.m na  parivajjeti. tassa ta.m sevato, ta.m ^a^T1.0566^ea^ aparivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa  amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti.  ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
text.1653: [03] ``tatra ^a^V1.0393^ea^, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m  sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m  kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m  avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m  parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato, ani.t.thaa ^a^P1.0312^ea^  akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa  dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti  yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
text.1654: [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva  aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati  -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca  sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m  na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato,  ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa  dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti  yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
text.1655: [03] 477^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m  paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- `ida.m ^a^T1.0567^ea^ kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva  aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m  pajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m  parivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa  kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m,  bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.
