text.285: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0070^ea^ ^a^V1.0071^ea^ ^a^T1.0103^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu  viharati kammaasadhamma.m naama kuruuna.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.287: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``ekaayano aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo sattaana.m  visuddhiyaa, sokaparidevaana.m ^a^P1.0056^ea^ {pariddavaana.m (sii0 pii0)} samatikkamaaya,  dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya, ~naayassa adhigamaaya, nibbaanassa  sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa.
text.288: [01] ``katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye  kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke  abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii  sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte  cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke  abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii  sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.
text.29: [03] ``nibbaana.m nibbaanato sa~njaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato  sa~n~natvaa nibbaana.m ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m ma~n~nati ^a^T1.0006^ea^, nibbaanato  ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa  hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.291: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye  kaayaanupassii viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa  rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati, palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa,  uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova  assasati, satova {sato (sii0 syaa0)} passasati. diigha.m ^a^T1.0104^ea^ vaa assasanto `diigha.m  assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti  pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati,  rassa.m vaa passasanto ^a^V1.0072^ea^ `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati,  `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati,  `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^M1.0071^ea^, `passambhaya.m  kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m  passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.
text.292: [01] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho bhamakaaro vaa  bhamakaarantevaasii vaa diigha.m vaa a~nchanto `diigha.m a~nchaamii'ti  pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa a~nchanto `rassa.m a~nchaamii'ti pajaanaati;  evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m  assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti  pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati,  rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati;  `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati,  `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m  kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati, `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m  passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati, bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa  kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m  viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati,  samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati. `atthi kaayo'ti  vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva ^a^T1.0105^ea^ ~naa.namattaaya  pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke  upaadiyati. evampi kho {evampi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati.
text.295: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vaa  `gacchaamii'ti pajaanaati, .thito vaa `.thitomhii'ti pajaanaati,  nisinno vaa `nisinnomhii'ti ^a^P1.0057^ea^ pajaanaati, sayaano  vaa `sayaanomhii'ti pajaanaati. yathaa yathaa vaa panassa kaayo  pa.nihito hoti tathaa tathaa na.m pajaanaati. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye  kaayaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati,  ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati;  samudayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa  kaayasmi.m viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati.  `atthi ^a^M1.0072^ea^ ^a^V1.0073^ea^ kaayo'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva  ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci  loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye  kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.298: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante  pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii  hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti,  sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite  saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii  hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave  sampajaanakaarii hoti. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati.
text.301: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m  uddha.m paadatalaa, adho kesamatthakaa, tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa  asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa  dantaa taco ma.msa.m ^a^T1.0106^ea^ nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m  pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo  lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa  mutta'nti {mutta.m matthalu"nganti (ka0)}.
text.302: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ubhatomukhaa puto.li {muuto.lii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} puuraa  naanaavihitassa dha~n~nassa, seyyathida.m -- saaliina.m ^a^V1.0074^ea^ viihiina.m muggaana.m  maasaana.m tilaana.m ta.n.dulaana.m. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso mu~ncitvaa  paccavekkheyya -- `ime saalii ime viihii ime ^a^M1.0073^ea^ muggaa ime maasaa ime  tilaa ime ta.n.dulaa'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva  kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa, adho kesamatthakaa, tacapariyanta.m puura.m  naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa  lomaa...pe0... mutta'nti.
text.303: [01] ``iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.306: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m  yathaa.thita.m yathaapa.nihita.m dhaatuso paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m  kaaye pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.
text.307: [01] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0058^ea^, bhikkhave, dakkho  goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa gaavi.m vadhitvaa catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  bilaso vibhajitvaa nisinno assa. evameva kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m yathaa.thita.m yathaapa.nihita.m dhaatuso paccavekkhati --  `atthi imasmi.m kaaye pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.  iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati...pe0... ^a^V1.0075^ea^   evampi kho, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0107^ea^, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.31: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M1.0005^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkho {sekho  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  appattamaanaso anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaano viharati, sopi pathavi.m  pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya {abhi~n~natvaa (ka0)} pathavi.m maa ma~n~ni  {vaa ma~n~nati},  pathaviyaa maa ma~n~ni, pathavito maa ma~n~ni, pathavi.m meti maa ma~n~ni,  pathavi.m maabhinandi {vaa abhinandati (sii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa}. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~neyya.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.310: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi  passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa  tiihamata.m vaa uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata.m. so imameva kaaya.m  upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii  eva.manatiito'ti {eta.m anatiitoti (sii0 pii0)}. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.311: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0074^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m kaakehi vaa khajjamaana.m kulalehi vaa khajjamaana.m  gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m ka"nkehi vaa khajjamaana.m sunakhehi vaa khajjamaana.m  byagghehi vaa khajjamaana.m diipiihi vaa khajjamaana.m si"ngaalehi vaa {gijjhehi vaa  khajjamaana.m, suvaanehi vaa khajjamaana.m, sigaalehi vaa (syaa0 pii0)}  khajjamaana.m vividhehi vaa paa.nakajaatehi khajjamaana.m. so imameva kaaya.m  upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii  eva.manatiito'ti. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.312: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m sama.msalohita.m  nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m nima.msalohitamakkhita.m  nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m apagatama.msalohita.m  nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikaani apagatasambandhaani ^a^V1.0076^ea^  {apagatanhaarusambandhaani (syaa0)} disaa vidisaa  vikkhittaani, a~n~nena hattha.t.thika.m a~n~nena paada.t.thika.m ^a^T1.0108^ea^ a~n~nena gopphaka.t.thika.m {``a~n~nena  gopphaka.t.thika''nti ida.m sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu natthi}  a~n~nena ja"ngha.t.thika.m a~n~nena uuru.t.thika.m a~n~nena ka.ti.t.thika.m {a~n~nena ka.ta.t.thika.m  a~n~nena pi.t.tha.t.thika.m a~n~nena ka.n.taka.t.thika.m a~n~nena phaasuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena  ura.t.thika.m a~n~nena a.msa.t.thika.m a~n~nena baahu.t.thika.m (syaa0)} a~n~nena  phaasuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena pi.t.thi.t.thika.m a~n~nena khandha.t.thika.m {a~n~nena ka.ta.t.thika.m a~n~nena  pi.t.tha.t.thika.m a~n~nena ka.n.taka.t.thika.m a~n~nena phaasuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena ura.t.thika.m  a~n~nena a.msa.t.thika.m a~n~nena baahu.t.thika.m (syaa0)} a~n~nena giiva.t.thika.m  a~n~nena hanuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena danta.t.thika.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m. so  imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii  eva.manatiito'ti. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.
text.313: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m, a.t.thikaani setaani  sa"nkhava.n.napa.tibhaagaani {sa"nkhava.n.nuupanibhaani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ...pe0... a.t.thikaani pu~njakitaani  terovassikaani...pe0... a.t.thikaani puutiini cu.n.nakajaataani ^a^P1.0059^ea^.  so imameva kaaya.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo  eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti. iti ajjhatta.m vaa kaaye  kaayaanupassii ^a^M1.0075^ea^ viharati, bahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati,  ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii  vaa kaayasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati,  samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa kaayasmi.m viharati. `atthi kaayo'ti vaa  panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya  pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke  upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii  viharati.
text.317: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^T1.0109^ea^ ^a^V1.0077^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaasu  vedanaanupassii viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukha.m vaa {sukha.m, dukkha.m,  adukkhamasukha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} vedana.m  vedayamaano `sukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; dukkha.m vaa {sukha.m, dukkha.m  adukkhamasukha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} vedana.m  vedayamaano `dukkha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; adukkhamasukha.m  vaa vedana.m vedayamaano `adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati;  saamisa.m vaa sukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `saamisa.m sukha.m vedana.m  vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; niraamisa.m vaa sukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano  `niraamisa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; saamisa.m vaa dukkha.m  vedana.m vedayamaano `saamisa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati;  niraamisa.m vaa dukkha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `niraamisa.m dukkha.m vedana.m  vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; saamisa.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m  vedayamaano `saamisa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati;  niraamisa.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayamaano `niraamisa.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati; iti ajjhatta.m vaa  vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa vedanaasu vedanaanupassii  viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati;  samudayadhammaanupassii vaa vedanaasu viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa  vedanaasu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa vedanaasu viharati.  `atthi vedanaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva  ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati ^a^M1.0076^ea^, na ca ki~nci  loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaasu  vedanaanupassii viharati.
text.32: [03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m...  brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m...  ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati;  nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya ^a^V1.0006^ea^ nibbaana.m maa ma~n~ni, nibbaanasmi.m maa  ma~n~ni, nibbaanato maa ma~n~ni, nibbaana.m meti maa ma~n~ni, nibbaana.m  maabhinandi. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~neyya.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.320: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^T1.0110^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte  cittaanupassii viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saraaga.m vaa citta.m  `saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m `viitaraaga.m citta'nti  pajaanaati; sadosa.m vaa citta.m `sadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati,  viitadosa.m vaa citta.m `viitadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati; samoha.m vaa  citta.m `samoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m `viitamoha.m  citta'nti pajaanaati; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `sa.mkhitta.m citta'nti  pajaanaati, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `vikkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati;  mahaggata.m vaa citta.m `mahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati, amahaggata.m vaa  citta.m `amahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati; sauttara.m ^a^V1.0078^ea^ vaa citta.m `sauttara.m  citta'nti pajaanaati, anuttara.m vaa citta.m `anuttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati;  samaahita.m vaa citta.m `samaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati, asamaahita.m vaa  citta.m `asamaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati; vimutta.m vaa citta.m `vimutta.m  citta'nti pajaanaati, avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti  pajaanaati. iti ajjhatta.m vaa citte cittaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa  vaa citte cittaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa citte  cittaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii ^a^P1.0060^ea^ vaa  cittasmi.m viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa cittasmi.m viharati,  samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa cittasmi.m viharati. `atthi citta'nti  vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya  pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke  upaadiyati ^a^T1.0111^ea^. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte cittaanupassii  viharati.
text.323: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati pa~ncasu niivara.nesu. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati pa~ncasu niivara.nesu?
text.324: [03] ``idha ^a^M1.0077^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m kaamacchanda.m  `atthi me ajjhatta.m kaamacchando'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  kaamacchanda.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m kaamacchando'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca  anuppannassa kaamacchandassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca  uppannassa kaamacchandassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca  pahiinassa kaamacchandassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.325: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m byaapaada.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m byaapaado'ti  pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m byaapaada.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m  byaapaado'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa byaapaadassa ^a^V1.0079^ea^ uppaado  hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa byaapaadassa pahaana.m hoti  ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa byaapaadassa aayati.m anuppaado  hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.326: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m thiinamiddha.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  thiinamiddha'nti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m thiinamiddha.m `natthi me  ajjhatta.m thiinamiddha'nti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa thiinamiddhassa  uppaado hoti ta~nca ^a^T1.0112^ea^ pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa thiinamiddhassa  pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa thiinamiddhassa  aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.327: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  uddhaccakukkucca'nti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca.m `natthi  me ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca'nti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa  uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  uddhaccakukkuccassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  uddhaccakukkuccassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.328: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m vicikiccha.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  vicikicchaa'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m vicikiccha.m `natthi  me ajjhatta.m vicikicchaa'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannaaya  vicikicchaaya uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannaaya  vicikicchaaya pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinaaya  vicikicchaaya aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.329: [03] ``iti ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa  vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati,  vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati ^a^M1.0078^ea^, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa  dhammesu viharati. `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa  hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya ^a^T1.0113^ea^ anissito ca  viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati pa~ncasu niivara.nesu.
text.332: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V1.0080^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii ^a^P1.0061^ea^ viharati pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu.  katha~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati pa~ncasu  upaadaanakkhandhesu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu -- `iti ruupa.m, iti  ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa, iti  vedanaaya samudayo, iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo; iti sa~n~naa, iti  sa~n~naaya samudayo, iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo; iti sa"nkhaaraa, iti  sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo, iti sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo; iti vi~n~naa.na.m,  iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti; iti  ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa vaa dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii  viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati,  vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa  dhammesu viharati. `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa  hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca  viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu.
text.335: [03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu. katha~nca  pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati chasu ^a^T1.0114^ea^  ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu?
text.336: [03] ``idha ^a^M1.0079^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhu~nca pajaanaati, ruupe ca  pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati,  yathaa ca anuppannassa sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati,  yathaa ca uppannassa sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa  ca pahiinassa sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.337: [03] ``sota~nca ^a^V1.0081^ea^ pajaanaati, sadde ca pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m  pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.338: [03] ``ghaana~nca pajaanaati, gandhe ca pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m  pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.339: [03] ``jivha~nca pajaanaati, rase ca pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m  pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.34: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito  abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito ^a^T1.0007^ea^ abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati,  pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati,  pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti  vadaami.
text.340: [03] ``kaaya~nca pajaanaati, pho.t.thabbe ca pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m  pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.341: [03] ``mana~nca pajaanaati, dhamme ca pajaanaati, ya~nca tadubhaya.m  pa.ticca uppajjati sa.myojana.m ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  sa.myojanassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa  sa.myojanassa pahaana.m hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca pahiinassa  sa.myojanassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.342: [01] ``iti ^a^M1.0080^ea^ ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati,  bahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati,  vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa  dhammesu viharati. `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa  hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya ^a^T1.0115^ea^ pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ^a^V1.0082^ea^ ca  viharati na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu  aayatanesu.
text.345: [03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me  ajjhatta.m satisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  satisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ^a^P1.0062^ea^ ajjhatta.m  satisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa  satisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca  uppannassa satisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca  pajaanaati.
text.346: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me  ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo'ti  pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa uppaado  hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa  bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.347: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  viiriyasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  viiriyasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m viiriyasambojjha"ngo'ti  pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti  ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa viiriyasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya  paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.348: [03] ``santa.m ^a^M1.0081^ea^ vaa ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  piitisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"nga.m  `natthi me ajjhatta.m piitisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati ^a^V1.0083^ea^, yathaa ca  anuppannassa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa  ca uppannassa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya paaripuurii hoti ta~nca  pajaanaati.
text.349: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  passaddhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  passaddhisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo'ti  pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti  ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya  paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.35: [03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m...  brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m...  ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati;  nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na  ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m  naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.350: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  samaadhisambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  samaadhisambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m samaadhisambojjha"ngo'ti  pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti  ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya  paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati.
text.351: [03] ``santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m  upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'ti pajaanaati, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m  upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'ti  pajaanaati, yathaa ca anuppannassa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaado hoti  ta~nca pajaanaati, yathaa ca uppannassa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaaya  paaripuurii hoti ta~nca pajaanaati ^a^T1.0116^ea^.
text.352: [03] ``iti ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, bahiddhaa  vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa vaa dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati,  vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa  dhammesu viharati. `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa  hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca  viharati, na ca ki~nci loke upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati sattasu bojjha"ngesu.
text.355: [03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M1.0082^ea^ ^a^V1.0084^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati catuusu ariyasaccesu. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati catuusu ariyasaccesu? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati.
text.358: [03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^T1.0117^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m?  jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m,  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, appiyehi sampayogopi  dukkho, piyehi vippayogopi dukkho {``appiyehi...pe0... vippayogopi  dukkho''ti paa.tho ceva ta.mniddeso ca sii0 pii0 potthakesu na  dissati, suma"ngalavilaasiniya.mpi ta.msa.mva.n.nanaa natthi}, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi  dukkha.m, sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa {pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaapi (ka0)} dukkhaa.
text.359: [03] 121^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, jaati? yaa tesa.m  tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaati sa~njaati okkanti  abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo aayatanaana.m pa.tilaabho, aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, jaati.
text.360: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, jaraa? yaa tesa.m tesa.m  sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m  valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako, aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, jaraa.
text.361: [03] 123^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, mara.na.m? ya.m {suma"ngalavilaasinii  oloketabbaa} tesa.m tesa.m  sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu  mara.na.m kaala"nkiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo  jiivitindriyassupacchedo, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, mara.na.m.
text.362: [03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^M1.0083^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, soko? yo kho,  bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena ^a^V1.0085^ea^ samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena  ^a^T1.0118^ea^ dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa soko socanaa socitatta.m antosoko  antoparisoko, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, soko.
text.363: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, paridevo? yo kho,  bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena  dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aadevo paridevo aadevanaa paridevanaa aadevitatta.m  paridevitatta.m, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, paridevo.
text.364: [03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkha.m? ya.m kho,  bhikkhave, kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayasamphassaja.m dukkha.m  asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m.
text.365: [03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, domanassa.m? ya.m kho,  bhikkhave, cetasika.m dukkha.m cetasika.m asaata.m manosamphassaja.m dukkha.m  asaata.m vedayita.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, domanassa.m.
text.366: [03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, upaayaaso? yo  kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa  a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aayaaso upaayaaso aayaasitatta.m  upaayaasitatta.m, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, upaayaaso.
text.367: [03] 129^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, appiyehi sampayogo  dukkho? idha yassa te honti ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa ruupaa saddaa  gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa dhammaa, ye vaa panassa te honti anatthakaamaa  ahitakaamaa aphaasukakaamaa ayogakkhemakaamaa, yaa tehi saddhi.m sa"ngati  samaagamo samodhaana.m missiibhaavo, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, appiyehi  sampayogo dukkho.
text.368: [03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo  dukkho? idha yassa te honti i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa ruupaa saddaa gandhaa ^a^T1.0119^ea^  rasaa pho.t.thabbaa dhammaa, ye vaa panassa te honti atthakaamaa hitakaamaa  phaasukakaamaa yogakkhemakaamaa maataa vaa pitaa vaa bhaataa vaa bhaginii  vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatisaalohitaa vaa, yaa tehi saddhi.m  asa"ngati asamaagamo ^a^M1.0084^ea^ asamodhaana.m amissiibhaavo, aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, piyehi vippayogo dukkho.
text.369: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, yampiccha.m na labhati  tampi dukkha.m? jaatidhammaana.m, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0086^ea^, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati  -- `aho vata maya.m na jaatidhammaa assaama, na ca vata no jaati  aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na  labhati tampi dukkha.m. jaraadhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa  uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na jaraadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no  jaraa aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi  yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. byaadhidhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m  eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na byaadhidhammaa assaama,  na ca vata no byaadhi aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho paneta.m icchaaya  pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. mara.nadhammaana.m,  bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na  mara.nadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no mara.na.m aagaccheyyaa'ti. na kho  paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m.  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaana.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m  icchaa uppajjati -- `aho vata maya.m na  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa assaama, na ca vata no  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa aagaccheyyu'nti. na kho  paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m, idampi yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m.
text.37: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M1.0006^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito  ^a^P1.0005^ea^ abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na  ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na  ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa raagassa,  viitaraagattaa.
text.370: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, sa.mkhittena  pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho,  vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho,  vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa.mkhittena  pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m  ariyasacca.m.
text.372: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo  (syaa0)}  ariyasacca.m? yaaya.m ta.nhaa ^a^T1.0120^ea^ ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} nandiiraagasahagataa  {nandiraagasahagataa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  tatratatraabhinandinii. seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaa.
text.373: [03] ``saa ^a^M1.0085^ea^ kho panesaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa kattha uppajjamaanaa  uppajjati, kattha nivisamaanaa nivisati? ya.m loke piyaruupa.m  saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati.

text.398: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo seyyathida.m  -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo  sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi.

text.40: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito  abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati,  pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati,  pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa dosassa, viitadosattaa.
text.400: [01] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo?  nekkhammasa"nkappo abyaapaadasa"nkappo avihi.msaasa"nkappo. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo.
text.401: [01] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa? musaavaadaa  verama.nii {verama.ni (ka0)}, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii,  samphappalaapaa verama.nii ^a^T1.0124^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa.
text.402: [01] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto? paa.naatipaataa  verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto.
text.403: [01] ``katamo ^a^M1.0089^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo? idha,  bhikkhave, ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivita.m  kappeti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo.
text.404: [03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaayaamo? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati;  uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti  vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; anuppannaana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati  citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa  asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaavaayaamo.
text.405: [03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaasati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii ^a^V1.0091^ea^ sampajaano satimaa vineyya  loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii  sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte  cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke  abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano  ^a^T1.0125^ea^ satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  sammaasati.
text.406: [03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaasamaadhi? idha, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m  savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca  sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti  `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa  ariyasacca.m.
text.407: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^M1.0090^ea^ ajjhatta.m vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii  viharati, bahiddhaa vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati, ajjhattabahiddhaa  vaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati; samudayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu  viharati, vayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati,  samudayavayadhammaanupassii vaa dhammesu viharati. `atthi dhammaa'ti vaa  panassa sati paccupa.t.thitaa hoti. yaavadeva ~naa.namattaaya  pa.tissatimattaaya anissito ca viharati, na ca ki~nci loke  upaadiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu ^a^T1.0126^ea^ dhammaanupassii  viharati catuusu ariyasaccesu.

text.410: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V1.0092^ea^ hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro  satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaaveyya satta vassaani, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m  phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa; sati vaa upaadisese  anaagaamitaa.
text.411: [03] ``ti.t.thantu, bhikkhave, satta vassaani. yo hi koci  ^a^P1.0063^ea^, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaaveyya cha  vassaani...pe0... pa~nca vassaani... cattaari vassaani... tii.ni  vassaani... dve vassaani... eka.m vassa.m... ti.t.thatu, bhikkhave, eka.m  vassa.m. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaaveyya  satta maasaani, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m di.t.theva  dhamme a~n~naa; sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa. ti.t.thantu,  bhikkhave, satta maasaani. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro  satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaaveyya cha maasaani...pe0... pa~nca maasaani...  cattaari maasaani... tii.ni maasaani... dve maasaani... eka.m maasa.m...  a.d.dhamaasa.m... ti.t.thatu, bhikkhave, a.d.dhamaaso. yo hi koci,  bhikkhave, ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaane eva.m bhaaveyya sattaaha.m, tassa dvinna.m  phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa sati vaa  upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti.
text.412: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ ```ekaayano ^a^M1.0091^ea^ aya.m, bhikkhave, maggo sattaana.m  visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m  attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya ^a^T1.0127^ea^ nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya yadida.m  cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa'ti. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti.

text.419: [03] madhumandavarasaamadaana.m, khi.d.daarati jananimanusa"nghaata.m.  tathaa sutte veyyaakara.naa .thapitaa, sakyaputtaanamabhidamanatthaaya..
text.420: [03] pa~n~naasa.m ca diya.dh.dasata.m, dve ca veyyaakara.na.m apare ca.  tevanaamagata.m ca anupubba.m, ekamanaa nisaametha mudagga.m..}
text.425: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0128^ea^ ^a^M1.0092^ea^ ^a^V1.0093^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.426: [01] ``idheva, bhikkhave, sama.no, idha dutiyo sama.no, idha  tatiyo sama.no, idha catuttho sama.no; su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nebhi  ^a^P1.0064^ea^ a~n~nehiiti {sama.nehi a~n~neti (sii0 pii0 ka0) ettha a~n~nehiiti  sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya saccaabhi~n~nehiiti attho veditabbo}. evameta.m  {evameva (syaa0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, sammaa siihanaada.m  nadatha.
text.427: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m  a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ko panaayasmantaana.m  assaaso, ki.m bala.m, yena tumhe aayasmanto eva.m vadetha -- idheva  sama.no, idha dutiyo sama.no, idha tatiyo sama.no, idha catuttho  sama.no; su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nebhi a~n~nehii'ti? eva.mvaadino,  bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `atthi  kho no, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena cattaaro dhammaa akkhaataa ye maya.m attani sampassamaanaa  eva.m vadema -- idheva sama.no, idha dutiyo sama.no, idha tatiyo  sama.no, idha ^a^T1.0129^ea^ catuttho sama.no; su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nebhi a~n~nehiiti.  katame cattaaro? atthi kho no, aavuso, satthari pasaado, atthi  dhamme pasaado, atthi siilesu paripuurakaaritaa; sahadhammikaa kho pana  piyaa manaapaa -- gaha.t.thaa ceva pabbajitaa ca. ime kho no, aavuso,  tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro dhammaa  akkhaataa ye maya.m attani sampassamaanaa eva.m vadema -- idheva sama.no,  idha dutiyo sama.no, idha tatiyo sama.no, idha catuttho sama.no;  su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nebhi a~n~nehii'ti.
text.428: [03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^M1.0093^ea^ ^a^V1.0094^ea^ kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m  a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `amhaakampi kho,  aavuso, atthi satthari pasaado yo amhaaka.m satthaa, amhaakampi atthi  dhamme pasaado yo amhaaka.m dhammo, mayampi siilesu paripuurakaarino  yaani amhaaka.m siilaani, amhaakampi sahadhammikaa piyaa manaapaa --  gaha.t.thaa ceva pabbajitaa ca. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso ko  adhippayaaso {adhippaayo (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0), adhippayogo (ka0)}   ki.m naanaakara.na.m yadida.m tumhaaka~nceva amhaaka~ncaa'ti?
text.429: [03] ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu  vacaniiyaa -- `ki.m panaavuso, ekaa ni.t.thaa, udaahu puthu ni.t.thaa'ti?  sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m  byaakareyyu.m -- `ekaavuso, ni.t.thaa, na puthu ni.t.thaa'ti.
text.43: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^T1.0009^ea^ ^a^M1.0007^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito  abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati,  pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati,  pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa mohassa, viitamohattaa.
text.430: [01] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa saraagassa udaahu  viitaraagassaa'ti? sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa  paribbaajakaa ^a^T1.0130^ea^ eva.m byaakareyyu.m -- `viitaraagassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na saa  ni.t.thaa saraagassaa'ti.
text.431: [03] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa sadosassa udaahu viitadosassaa'ti?  sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m  byaakareyyu.m -- `viitadosassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na saa ni.t.thaa  sadosassaa'ti.
text.432: [03] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa samohassa udaahu viitamohassaa'ti?  sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m  byaakareyyu.m -- `viitamohassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na saa ni.t.thaa  samohassaa'ti.
text.433: [03] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa sata.nhassa udaahu viitata.nhassaa'ti?  sammaa ^a^P1.0065^ea^ byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa  paribbaajakaa eva.m byaakareyyu.m -- `viitata.nhassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na  saa ni.t.thaa sata.nhassaa'ti.
text.434: [03] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa saupaadaanassa udaahu  anupaadaanassaa'ti? sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0095^ea^, a~n~natitthiyaa  paribbaajakaa eva.m byaakareyyu.m -- `anupaadaanassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na  saa ni.t.thaa saupaadaanassaa'ti.
text.435: [03] ```saa ^a^M1.0094^ea^ panaavuso, ni.t.thaa viddasuno udaahu aviddasuno'ti?  sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m  byaakareyyu.m -- `viddasuno, aavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na saa ni.t.thaa  aviddasuno'ti.
text.436: [03] ```saa panaavuso, ni.t.thaa anuruddhappa.tiviruddhassa udaahu  ananuruddhaappa.tiviruddhassaa'ti? sammaa byaakaramaanaa, bhikkhave,  a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m byaakareyyu.m --  `ananuruddhaappa.tiviruddhassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa, na saa ni.t.thaa  anuruddhappa.tiviruddhassaa'ti.
text.437: [03] ```saa ^a^T1.0131^ea^ panaavuso, ni.t.thaa papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino udaahu  nippapa~ncaaraamassa nippapa~ncaratino'ti? sammaa byaakaramaanaa,  bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m byaakareyyu.m --  `nippapa~ncaaraamassaavuso, saa ni.t.thaa nippapa~ncaratino, na saa ni.t.thaa  papa~ncaaraamassa papa~ncaratino'ti.
text.438: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``dvemaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thiyo -- bhavadi.t.thi ca  vibhavadi.t.thi ca. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa  bhavadi.t.thi.m alliinaa bhavadi.t.thi.m upagataa bhavadi.t.thi.m ajjhositaa,  vibhavadi.t.thiyaa te pa.tiviruddhaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa  braahma.naa vaa vibhavadi.t.thi.m alliinaa vibhavadi.t.thi.m upagataa vibhavadi.t.thi.m  ajjhositaa, bhavadi.t.thiyaa te pa.tiviruddhaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave,  sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imaasa.m dvinna.m di.t.thiina.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca  assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, `te  saraagaa te sadosaa te samohaa te sata.nhaa te saupaadaanaa te  aviddasuno te anuruddhappa.tiviruddhaa te papa~ncaaraamaa papa~ncaratino; te  na parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi  domanassehi upaayaasehi; na parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami. ye  ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imaasa.m dvinna.m di.t.thiina.m  samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca  yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, `te viitaraagaa te viitadosaa te viitamohaa te  viitata.nhaa te ^a^T1.0132^ea^ anupaadaanaa te viddasuno te ananuruddhaappa.tiviruddhaa te  nippapa~ncaaraamaa nippapa~ncaratino; te parimuccanti jaatiyaa jaraaya ^a^V1.0096^ea^   mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi;  parimuccanti dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami.
text.439: [03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^M1.0095^ea^ ^a^P1.0066^ea^, bhikkhave,  upaadaanaani. katamaani cattaari? kaamupaadaana.m, di.t.thupaadaana.m,  siilabbatupaadaana.m, attavaadupaadaana.m. santi, bhikkhave, eke  sama.nabraahma.naa sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa pa.tijaanamaanaa. te na sammaa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti,  na di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, na siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. ta.m kissa hetu?  imaani hi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa tii.ni .thaanaani yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaananti. tasmaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa pa.tijaanamaanaa; te na sammaa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti,  na di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, na siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti.
text.44: [03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m...  brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  ^a^V1.0008^ea^...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m...  ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati;  nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na  ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m  naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa mohassa, viitamohattaa.
text.440: [01] ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa pa.tijaanamaanaa. te na sammaa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti,  di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, na siilabbatupaadaanassa ^a^T1.0133^ea^ pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. ta.m kissa hetu?  imaani hi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa dve .thaanaani yathaabhuuta.m  nappajaananti. tasmaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa pa.tijaanamaanaa; te na sammaa {pa.tijaanamaanaa na sammaa  (?)}  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti,  di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, na siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti.
text.441: [03] ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa pa.tijaanamaanaa. te na sammaa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti,  di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. ta.m kissa hetu?  ima~nhi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eka.m .thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti.  tasmaa te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaadaa  pa.tijaanamaanaa; te na sammaa {pa.tijaanamaanaa na sammaa (?)} sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti --  kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m ^a^V1.0097^ea^ pa~n~napenti,  siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, na attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napenti.
text.442: [03] ``evaruupe ^a^M1.0096^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo satthari pasaado  so na sammaggato akkhaayati; yo ^a^T1.0134^ea^ dhamme pasaado so na sammaggato  akkhaayati; yaa siilesu paripuurakaaritaa saa na sammaggataa  akkhaayati; yaa sahadhammikesu piyamanaapataa saa na sammaggataa  akkhaayati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m  durakkhaate ^a^P1.0067^ea^ dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike  anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite.
text.443: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagato ca kho, bhikkhave, araha.m  sammaasambuddho sabbupaadaanapari~n~naavaado pa.tijaanamaano sammaa  sabbupaadaanapari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti -- kaamupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti,  di.t.thupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, siilabbatupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napeti, attavaadupaadaanassa pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti. evaruupe kho,  bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo satthari pasaado so sammaggato  akkhaayati; yo dhamme pasaado so sammaggato akkhaayati; yaa  siilesu paripuurakaaritaa saa sammaggataa akkhaayati; yaa sahadhammikesu  piyamanaapataa saa sammaggataa akkhaayati. ta.m kissa hetu?  eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye suppavedite  niyyaanike upasamasa.mvattanike sammaasambuddhappavedite.
text.444: [03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``ime ca, bhikkhave, cattaaro upaadaanaa.  ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? ime cattaaro upaadaanaa  ta.nhaanidaanaa ta.nhaasamudayaa ^a^T1.0135^ea^ ta.nhaajaatikaa ta.nhaapabhavaa. ta.nhaa caaya.m,  bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa? ta.nhaa  vedanaanidaanaa vedanaasamudayaa vedanaajaatikaa vedanaapabhavaa. vedanaa  caaya.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa ki.mpabhavaa?  vedanaa phassanidaanaa phassasamudayaa phassajaatikaa phassapabhavaa.  phasso caaya.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaano ki.msamudayo ki.mjaatiko ki.mpabhavo?  phasso sa.laayatananidaano sa.laayatanasamudayo sa.laayatanajaatiko  sa.laayatanapabhavo. sa.laayatana~ncida.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m  ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m? sa.laayatana.m naamaruupanidaana.m naamaruupasamudaya.m  naamaruupajaatika.m naamaruupapabhava.m. naamaruupa~ncida.m, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaana.m  ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ki.mpabhava.m? naamaruupa.m vi~n~naa.nanidaana.m  vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m vi~n~naa.najaatika.m vi~n~naa.napabhava.m. vi~n~naa.na~ncida.m,  bhikkhave ^a^M1.0097^ea^, ki.mnidaana.m ki.msamudaya.m ki.mjaatika.m ^a^V1.0098^ea^ ki.mpabhava.m? vi~n~naa.na.m  sa"nkhaaranidaana.m sa"nkhaarasamudaya.m sa"nkhaarajaatika.m sa"nkhaarapabhava.m.  sa"nkhaaraa cime, bhikkhave, ki.mnidaanaa ki.msamudayaa ki.mjaatikaa  ki.mpabhavaa? sa"nkhaaraa avijjaanidaanaa avijjaasamudayaa  avijjaajaatikaa avijjaapabhavaa.
text.445: [03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti  vijjaa uppannaa, so avijjaaviraagaa vijjuppaadaa neva kaamupaadaana.m  upaadiyati, na di.t.thupaadaana.m upaadiyati, na siilabbatupaadaana.m  upaadiyati, na attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyati. anupaadiya.m na  paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa  jaati, vusita.m ^a^T1.0136^ea^ brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti  pajaanaatii''ti.
text.446: [03] idamavoca ^a^P1.0068^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu  bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.449: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0137^ea^ ^a^V1.0099^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m  viharati bahinagare aparapure vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena  sunakkhatto licchaviputto acirapakkanto hoti imasmaa dhammavinayaa.  so vesaaliya.m parisati {parisati.m (sii0 pii0)} eva.m {eta.m (pii0 ka0)} vaaca.m   bhaasati -- ``natthi sama.nassa  gotamassa uttari {uttari.m (pii0)} manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso.  takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti viima.msaanucarita.m  saya.mpa.tibhaana.m. yassa ca khvaassa atthaaya dhammo desito so  niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti.
text.450: [03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. assosi kho aayasmaa  saariputto sunakkhattassa licchaviputtassa vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m  bhaasamaanassa -- ``natthi sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso. takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m  deseti ^a^M1.0098^ea^ viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana.m. yassa ca khvaassa atthaaya  dhammo desito so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti.
text.451: [01] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya  caritvaa ^a^T1.0138^ea^ pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``sunakkhatto, bhante, licchaviputto acirapakkanto imasmaa  dhammavinayaa. so vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `natthi  sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso.  takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti viima.msaanucarita.m  saya.mpa.tibhaana.m. yassa ca khvaassa atthaaya dhammo desito so  niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'''ti.
text.452: [03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``kodhano heso, saariputta, sunakkhatto  moghapuriso. kodhaa ca panassa esaa vaacaa bhaasitaa. `ava.n.na.m  bhaasissaamii'ti kho, saariputta, sunakkhatto moghapuriso va.n.na.myeva  tathaagatassa ^a^V1.0100^ea^ bhaasati ^a^P1.0069^ea^. va.n.no heso, saariputta,  tathaagatassa yo eva.m vadeyya -- `yassa ca khvaassa atthaaya dhammo  desito so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti.
text.453: [03] ``ayampi hi naama, saariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa  mayi dhammanvayo na bhavissati -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m  sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi, satthaa devamanussaana.m, buddho bhagavaa'ti.
text.454: [03] ``ayampi hi naama, saariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa  mayi ^a^T1.0139^ea^ dhammanvayo na bhavissati -- `itipi so bhagavaa anekavihita.m  iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa  eko hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m  asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m  karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi  pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no;  imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasati  parimajjati; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattetii'ti.
text.455: [03] ``ayampi ^a^M1.0099^ea^ hi naama, saariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa  mayi dhammanvayo na bhavissati -- `itipi so bhagavaa dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati --  dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike caa'ti.
text.456: [03] ``ayampi hi naama, saariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa  mayi dhammanvayo na bhavissati -- `itipi so bhagavaa parasattaana.m  parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m  saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaati, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti  pajaanaati; sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaanaati, viitadosa.m  vaa citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaanaati; samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m  cittanti pajaanaati, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaanaati;  sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaanaati ^a^T1.0140^ea^, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m  vikkhitta.m cittanti pajaanaati; mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m cittanti  pajaanaati, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaanaati;  sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m cittanti pajaanaati, anuttara.m vaa citta.m  anuttara.m cittanti pajaanaati; samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti ^a^V1.0101^ea^   pajaanaati, asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaanaati;  vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaanaati, avimutta.m vaa citta.m  avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaatii'ti.
text.457: [03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``dasa kho panimaani, saariputta, tathaagatassa  tathaagatabalaani yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.  katamaani dasa?
text.458: [03] ``idha, saariputta, tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca  a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato .thaana~nca  .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta,  tathaagatassa ^a^P1.0070^ea^ tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma  tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati,  brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.459: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m  kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi,  saariputta, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso  hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa  tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m ^a^M1.0100^ea^ .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.46: [03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatopi, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho  pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na  ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na  ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati ^a^P1.0006^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu?  `pari~n~naatanta.m tathaagatassaa'ti vadaami.
text.460: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato sabbatthagaamini.m pa.tipada.m  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi ^a^T1.0141^ea^, saariputta, tathaagato sabbatthagaamini.m  pa.tipada.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa  tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.461: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato anekadhaatunaanaadhaatuloka.m  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato  anekadhaatunaanaadhaatuloka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta,  tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.462: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0102^ea^ capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato sattaana.m naanaadhimuttikata.m  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato sattaana.m  naanaadhimuttikata.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa  tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.463: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m  indriyaparopariyatta.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato  parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m indriyaparopariyatta.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati,  idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma  tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati,  brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.464: [01] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato  jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato  jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m ^a^T1.0142^ea^ sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m  aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m  nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.465: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0101^ea^ capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi  jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo  viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo  pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi  anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe --  `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra  udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto  idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti  saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, idampi,  saariputta, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato  aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m  pavatteti.
text.466: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena ^a^T1.0143^ea^ satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage ^a^V1.0103^ea^ satte pajaanaati -- `ime  vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena  samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa  micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P1.0071^ea^  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime  vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena  samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa  sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine ^a^M1.0102^ea^ pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.  yampi, saariputta, tathaagato dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime  vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena  samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa  micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana  bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa  manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa  sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m  loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.  idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma  tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati,  brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.467: [03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, tathaagato aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharati. yampi, saariputta, tathaagato aasavaana.m khayaa  anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, idampi, saariputta, tathaagatassa  tathaagatabala.m hoti ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.468: [03] ``imaani kho, saariputta, dasa tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani  yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu  siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.469: [03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V1.0104^ea^ kho ma.m, saariputta, eva.m jaananta.m eva.m  passanta.m eva.m vadeyya -- `natthi sama.nassa gotamassa  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso; takkapariyaahata.m ^a^T1.0144^ea^ sama.no  gotamo dhamma.m deseti viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana'nti, ta.m, saariputta,  vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa  yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu  siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme ^a^M1.0103^ea^ a~n~na.m  aaraadheyya, eva.m sampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami. ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya, ta.m  citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m  niraye.
text.47: [03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m...  brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0010^ea^... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m...  ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati;  nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na  ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m  naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naatanta.m tathaagatassaa'ti  vadaami.
text.470: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, saariputta, tathaagatassa  vesaarajjaani yehi vesaarajjehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m  pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.  katamaani cattaari?
text.471: [03] ```sammaasambuddhassa te pa.tijaanato ime dhammaa  anabhisambuddhaa'ti. tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa  maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena ^a^P1.0072^ea^  pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, saariputta, na samanupassaami.  etamaha.m {etampaha.m (sii0 pii0)}, saariputta, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto  vesaarajjappatto viharaami.
text.472: [03] ```khii.naasavassa te pa.tijaanato ime aasavaa aparikkhii.naa'ti.  tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa  koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m,  saariputta, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m, saariputta, nimitta.m  asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto ^a^T1.0145^ea^ vesaarajjappatto viharaami.
text.473: [03] ```ye kho pana te antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa, te pa.tisevato  naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo  vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena  pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, saariputta, na samanupassaami.  etamaha.m, saariputta, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto  vesaarajjappatto viharaami.
text.474: [03] ```yassa kho pana te atthaaya dhammo desito, so na  niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti ^a^V1.0105^ea^. tatra vata ma.m sama.no  vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m  sahadhammena pa.ticodessatii'ti nimittameta.m, saariputta, na samanupassaami.  etamaha.m, saariputta, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto  vesaarajjappatto viharaami.
text.475: [03] ``imaani ^a^M1.0104^ea^ kho, saariputta, cattaari tathaagatassa vesaarajjaani  yehi vesaarajjehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati,  parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.
text.476: [03] ``yo kho ma.m, saariputta, eva.m jaananta.m eva.m passanta.m eva.m  vadeyya -- `natthi sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso, takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m  deseti viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana'nti, ta.m, saariputta, vaaca.m  appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye. seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme ^a^T1.0146^ea^ a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, eva.m  sampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami. ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya  ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.477: [03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha kho imaa, saariputta, parisaa. katamaa  a.t.tha? khattiyaparisaa, braahma.naparisaa, gahapatiparisaa, sama.naparisaa,  caatumahaaraajikaparisaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, taavati.msaparisaa, maaraparisaa, brahmaparisaa --  imaa kho, saariputta, a.t.tha parisaa. imehi kho, saariputta, catuuhi  vesaarajjehi samannaagato tathaagato imaa a.t.tha parisaa upasa"nkamati  ajjhogaahati. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, saariputta, anekasata.m  khattiyaparisa.m upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba~nceva,  sallapitapubba~nca, saakacchaa ca samaapajjitapubbaa. tatra vata ma.m bhaya.m  vaa saarajja.m vaa okkamissatiiti nimittameta.m, saariputta, na  samanupassaami. etamaha.m, saariputta, nimitta.m asamanupassanto  khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.
text.478: [03] ``abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, saariputta, anekasata.m  braahma.naparisa.m...pe0... gahapatiparisa.m... sama.naparisa.m...  caatumahaaraajikaparisa.m... taavati.msaparisa.m... maaraparisa.m... brahmaparisa.m  upasa"nkamitaa. tatrapi mayaa sannisinnapubba~nceva, sallapitapubba~nca,  saakacchaa ca samaapajjitapubbaa. tatra vata ma.m bhaya.m vaa saarajja.m vaa  okkamissatiiti nimittameta.m, saariputta ^a^V1.0106^ea^, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m,  saariputta, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto  vesaarajjappatto ^a^P1.0073^ea^ viharaami.
text.479: [03] ``yo ^a^M1.0105^ea^ kho ma.m, saariputta, eva.m jaananta.m eva.m passanta.m eva.m  vadeyya -- `natthi sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa ^a^T1.0147^ea^  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso, takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m  deseti viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana'nti, ta.m, saariputta, vaaca.m appahaaya  ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto  eva.m niraye. seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, eva.m  sampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami. ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m  di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.480: [03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``catasso kho imaa, saariputta, yoniyo.  katamaa catasso? a.n.dajaa yoni, jalaabujaa yoni, sa.msedajaa yoni,  opapaatikaa yoni. katamaa ca, saariputta, a.n.dajaa yoni? ye  kho te, saariputta, sattaa a.n.dakosa.m abhinibbhijja jaayanti -- aya.m  vuccati, saariputta, a.n.dajaa yoni. katamaa ca, saariputta, jalaabujaa  yoni? ye kho te, saariputta, sattaa vatthikosa.m abhinibbhijja  jaayanti -- aya.m vuccati, saariputta, jalaabujaa yoni. katamaa ca,  saariputta, sa.msedajaa yoni? ye kho te, saariputta, sattaa puutimacche  vaa jaayanti puutiku.nape vaa puutikummaase vaa candanikaaye vaa  o.ligalle vaa jaayanti -- aya.m vuccati, saariputta, sa.msedajaa yoni.  katamaa ca, saariputta, opapaatikaa yoni? devaa, nerayikaa, ekacce  ca manussaa, ekacce ca vinipaatikaa -- aya.m vuccati, saariputta,  opapaatikaa yoni. imaa kho, saariputta, catasso yoniyo.
text.481: [03] ``yo ^a^T1.0148^ea^ kho ma.m, saariputta, eva.m jaananta.m eva.m passanta.m eva.m  vadeyya -- `natthi sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso, takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m  deseti viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana'nti, ta.m, saariputta, vaaca.m  appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m  nikkhitto eva.m niraye. seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, eva.m ^a^V1.0107^ea^   sampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami. ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya  ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.
text.482: [03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^M1.0106^ea^ kho imaa, saariputta, gatiyo.  katamaa pa~nca? nirayo, tiracchaanayoni, pettivisayo, manussaa,  devaa. niraya~ncaaha.m, saariputta, pajaanaami, nirayagaami~nca magga.m,  nirayagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m; yathaa pa.tipanno ca kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami.  tiracchaanayoni~ncaaha.m, saariputta, pajaanaami, tiracchaanayonigaami~nca  magga.m, tiracchaanayonigaamini~nca pa.tipada.m; yathaa pa.tipanno ca kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa tiracchaanayoni.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami.  pettivisaya.m caaha.m, saariputta, pajaanaami, pettivisayagaami~nca magga.m,  pettivisayagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m; yathaa pa.tipanno ca kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa pettivisaya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. manusse caaha.m,  saariputta, pajaanaami, manussalokagaami~nca magga.m ^a^T1.0149^ea^,  manussalokagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m; yathaa pa.tipanno ca kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa manussesu upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. deve caaha.m, saariputta,  pajaanaami, devalokagaami~nca magga.m, devalokagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m; yathaa  pa.tipanno ca kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati  ta~nca pajaanaami. nibbaana~ncaaha.m, saariputta, pajaanaami,  nibbaanagaami~nca magga.m, nibbaanagaamini~nca ^a^P1.0074^ea^  pa.tipada.m; yathaa pa.tipanno ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m  pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharati ta~nca pajaanaami.
text.483: [03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa  ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca  iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami  aparena samayena dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m,  ekantadukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. seyyathaapi,  saariputta, a"ngaarakaasu saadhikaporisaa puuraa a"ngaaraana.m viitaccikaana.m  viitadhuumaana.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto  kilanto tasito pipaasito ekaayanena maggena tameva a"ngaarakaasu.m  pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaaya.m  bhava.m puriso pa.tipanno tathaa ca ^a^T1.0150^ea^ iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa  ima.myeva a"ngaarakaasu.m aagamissatii'ti ^a^V1.0108^ea^. tamena.m passeyya aparena  samayena tassaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa ^a^M1.0107^ea^ patita.m, ekantadukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa  vedanaa vedayamaana.m. evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m puggala.m eva.m  cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca  iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami  aparena samayena dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m,  ekantadukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.
text.484: [03] ``idha panaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto  paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati  ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  tiracchaanayoni.m upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena  samayena dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa tiracchaanayoni.m upapanna.m, dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa  vedanaa vedayamaana.m. seyyathaapi, saariputta, guuthakuupo saadhikaporiso,  puuro guuthassa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto  ^a^P1.0075^ea^ kilanto tasito pipaasito ekaayanena maggena  tameva guuthakuupa.m pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m  vadeyya -- `tathaaya.m bhava.m puriso pa.tipanno tathaa ^a^T1.0151^ea^ ca iriyati ta~nca  magga.m samaaruu.lho yathaa ima.myeva guuthakuupa.m aagamissatii'ti. tamena.m  passeyya aparena samayena tasmi.m guuthakuupe patita.m, dukkhaa tibbaa  ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m  puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo  pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa tiracchaanayoni.m upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami  aparena samayena dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa tiracchaanayoni.m upapanna.m, dukkhaa tibbaa  ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.
text.485: [03] ``idha panaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto  paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati  ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pettivisaya.m  upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m ^a^M1.0108^ea^ passaami aparena samayena dibbena  cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  pettivisaya.m upapanna.m, dukkhabahulaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. seyyathaapi,  saariputta, rukkho visame bhuumibhaage jaato tanupattapalaaso kabaracchaayo ^a^V1.0109^ea^.  atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito  pipaasito ekaayanena maggena tameva rukkha.m pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m  cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaaya.m bhava.m puriso  pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa ima.myeva  rukkha.m aagamissatii'ti. tamena.m passeyya^a^T1.0152^ea^, aparena samayena tassa  rukkhassa chaayaaya nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa dukkhabahulaa vedanaa  vedayamaana.m. evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa  ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca  iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  pettivisaya.m upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa pettivisaya.m upapanna.m, dukkhabahulaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.
