text.486: [03] ``idha panaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto  paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati  ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa manussesu  upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena dibbena  cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  manussesu upapanna.m, sukhabahulaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. seyyathaapi,  saariputta, rukkho same bhuumibhaage jaato bahalapattapalaaso sandacchaayo {sa.n.dacchaayo  (syaa0), santacchaayo (ka0)}.  atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito  pipaasito ekaayanena maggena tameva rukkha.m pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m  cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaaya.m bhava.m puriso  pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa imameva  rukkha.m aagamissatii'ti. tamena.m passeyya aparena samayena tassa  rukkhassa chaayaaya nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa sukhabahulaa vedanaa  vedayamaana.m. evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m ^a^T1.0153^ea^ puggala.m eva.m cetasaa  ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca  iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^M1.0109^ea^  manussesu upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa manussesu upapanna.m, sukhabahulaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.
text.487: [03] ``idha ^a^P1.0076^ea^ panaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m  eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno  tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissatii'ti. tamena.m passaami  aparena samayena dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^V1.0110^ea^ visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanna.m, ekantasukhaa  vedanaa vedayamaana.m. seyyathaapi, saariputta, paasaado, tatraassa kuu.taagaara.m  ullittaavalitta.m nivaata.m phusitagga.la.m pihitavaatapaana.m. tatraassa palla"nko  gonakatthato pa.tikatthato pa.talikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no  sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakuupadhaano. atha puriso aagaccheyya  ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito ekaayanena  maggena tameva paasaada.m pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m  vadeyya -- `tathaaya.m bhava.m puriso pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca  magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa ima.myeva paasaada.m aagamissatii'ti. tamena.m  passeyya aparena samayena tasmi.m paasaade tasmi.m kuu.taagaare tasmi.m  palla"nke nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa ekantasukhaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.  evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca  pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m ^a^T1.0154^ea^ puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m  samaaruu.lho yathaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m  upapajjissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena dibbena  cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa  sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanna.m, ekantasukhaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.
text.488: [01] ``idha panaaha.m, saariputta, ekacca.m puggala.m cetasaa ceto  paricca pajaanaami -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati  ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasa.m cetovimutti.m  pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharissatiiti. tamena.m passaami aparena samayena aasavaana.m khayaa  anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanta.m, ekantasukhaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m.  seyyathaapi, saariputta, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa ^a^M1.0110^ea^ saatodakaa siitodakaa  setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. aviduure cassaa tibbo vanasa.n.do.  atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito  pipaasito ekaayanena maggena tameva pokkhara.ni.m pa.nidhaaya. tamena.m  cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `tathaa bhava.m puriso pa.tipanno  tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m samaaruu.lho, yathaa ima.myeva pokkhara.ni.m  aagamissatii'ti. tamena.m passeyya aparena samayena ta.m pokkhara.ni.m  ogaahetvaa nhaayitvaa ca pivitvaa ca sabbadarathakilamathapari.laaha.m  pa.tippassambhetvaa ^a^T1.0155^ea^ paccuttaritvaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m  ^a^P1.0077^ea^ vaa, ekantasukhaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. evameva kho  aha.m, saariputta, idhekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami  -- tathaaya.m puggalo pa.tipanno tathaa ca iriyati ta~nca magga.m  samaaruu.lho, yathaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m ^a^V1.0111^ea^ abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'ti.  tamena.m passaami aparena samayena aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharanta.m, ekantasukhaa vedanaa vedayamaana.m. imaa kho,  saariputta, pa~nca gatiyo.
text.489: [03] ``yo kho ma.m, saariputta, eva.m jaananta.m eva.m passanta.m eva.m  vadeyya -- `natthi sama.nassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso; takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m  deseti viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana'nti ta.m, saariputta, vaaca.m appahaaya  ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto  eva.m niraye. seyyathaapi, saariputta, bhikkhu siilasampanno  samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, eva.m  sampadamida.m, saariputta, vadaami `ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya  ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye'.
text.49: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatopi ^a^M1.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho  pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na  ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na  ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `nandii {nandi (sii0  syaa0)} dukkhassa  muula'nti -- iti viditvaa `bhavaa jaati bhuutassa jaraamara.na'nti.  tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `tathaagato sabbaso ta.nhaana.m khayaa viraagaa  nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti  vadaami.
text.490: [03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, saariputta,  catura"ngasamannaagata.m brahmacariya.m ^a^T1.0156^ea^ caritaa {caritvaa (ka0)} -- tapassii suda.m homi  paramatapassii, luukho suda.m {luukhassuda.m (sii0 pii0)} homi paramaluukho, jegucchii suda.m homi  paramajegucchii, pavivitto suda.m {pavivittassuda.m (sii0 pii0)} homi paramapavivitto ^a^M1.0111^ea^. tatraassu me  ida.m, saariputta, tapassitaaya hoti -- acelako homi muttaacaaro  hatthaapalekhano {hatthaavalekhano (syaa0)}, na ehibhaddantiko na ti.t.thabhaddantiko; naabhiha.ta.m na  uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyaami. so na kumbhimukhaa  pa.tigga.nhaami, na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaami, na e.lakamantara.m, na  da.n.damantara.m, na musalamantara.m, na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, na gabbhiniyaa, na  paayamaanaaya {paayantiyaa (ka0)}, na purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu, na yattha saa  upa.t.thito hoti, na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii; na maccha.m na  ma.msa.m na sura.m na meraya.m na thusodaka.m pivaami; so ekaagaariko vaa  homi ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko ^a^P1.0078^ea^ vaa homi  dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko vaa homi sattaalopiko;  ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapemi, dviihipi dattiihi yaapemi...pe0...  sattahipi dattiihi yaapemi; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaaremi, dviihikampi  aahaara.m aahaaremi...pe0... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaaremi; iti  evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharaami.
text.491: [03] ``so saakabhakkho vaa homi, saamaakabhakkho vaa homi,  niivaarabhakkho vaa homi, daddulabhakkho vaa homi, ha.tabhakkho vaa  homi, ka.nabhakkho vaa ^a^T1.0157^ea^ homi, aacaamabhakkho vaa homi ^a^V1.0112^ea^,  pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa homi, ti.nabhakkho vaa homi, gomayabhakkho vaa  homi, vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapemi pavattaphalabhojii.
text.492: [03] ``so saa.naanipi dhaaremi, masaa.naanipi dhaaremi,  chavadussaanipi dhaaremi, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaaremi, tirii.taanipi dhaaremi,  ajinampi dhaaremi, ajinakkhipampi dhaaremi, kusaciirampi dhaaremi,  vaakaciirampi dhaaremi, phalakaciirampi dhaaremi, kesakambalampi dhaaremi,  vaa.lakambalampi dhaaremi, uluukapakkhampi dhaaremi; kesamassulocakopi  homi kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto; ubbha.t.thakopi homi  aasanapa.tikkhitto; ukku.tikopi homi ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto;  ka.n.takaapassayikopi homi ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappemi {imassaanantare a~n~nopi  koci paa.thapadeso a~n~nesu aajiivakavatadiipakasuttesu dissati};  saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharaami -- iti  evaruupa.m anekavihita.m kaayassa ^a^M1.0112^ea^ aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto  viharaami. ida.msu me, saariputta, tapassitaaya hoti.
text.493: [03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``tatraassu me ida.m, saariputta, luukhasmi.m hoti  -- nekavassaga.nika.m rajojalla.m kaaye sannicita.m hoti papa.tikajaata.m.  seyyathaapi, saariputta, tindukakhaa.nu nekavassaga.niko sannicito hoti  papa.tikajaato, evamevaassu me, saariputta, nekavassaga.nika.m rajojalla.m  kaaye sannicita.m hoti papa.tikajaata.m. tassa mayha.m, saariputta, na eva.m  hoti -- `aho vataaha.m ima.m rajojalla.m paa.ninaa parimajjeyya.m, a~n~ne vaa  pana me ima.m rajojalla.m paa.ninaa parimajjeyyu'nti. evampi me,  saariputta ^a^T1.0158^ea^, na hoti. ida.msu me, saariputta, luukhasmi.m hoti.
text.494: [01] ``tatraassu me ida.m, saariputta, jegucchismi.m hoti --  so kho aha.m, saariputta, satova abhikkamaami, satova pa.tikkamaami,  yaava udakabindumhipi me dayaa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti -- `maaha.m khuddake  paa.ne visamagate sa"nghaata.m aapaadesi'nti. ida.msu me, saariputta,  jegucchismi.m hoti.
text.495: [03] ``tatraassu me ida.m, saariputta, pavivittasmi.m hoti -- so kho  ^a^P1.0079^ea^ aha.m, saariputta, a~n~natara.m ara~n~naayatana.m  ajjhogaahetvaa viharaami. yadaa passaami gopaalaka.m vaa pasupaalaka.m vaa  ti.nahaaraka.m vaa ka.t.thahaaraka.m vaa vanakammika.m vaa, vanena vana.m gahanena  gahana.m ninnena ninna.m thalena thala.m sa.mpataami {papataami (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. ta.m kissa hetu? maa ma.m  te addasa.msu aha~nca maa te addasanti. seyyathaapi, saariputta,  aara~n~nako mago manusse disvaa vanena vana.m gahanena gahana.m ninnena  ninna.m ^a^V1.0113^ea^ thalena thala.m sa.mpatati, evameva kho aha.m, saariputta, yadaa  passaami gopaalaka.m vaa pasupaalaka.m vaa ti.nahaaraka.m vaa ka.t.thahaaraka.m vaa  vanakammika.m vaa vanena vana.m gahanena gahana.m ninnena ninna.m thalena thala.m  sa.mpataami. ta.m kissa hetu? maa ma.m te addasa.msu aha~nca maa te  addasanti. ida.msu me, saariputta, pavivittasmi.m hoti.
text.496: [03] ``so kho aha.m, saariputta, ye te go.t.thaa pa.t.thitagaavo  apagatagopaalakaa, tattha catukku.n.diko upasa"nkamitvaa yaani taani  vacchakaana.m ^a^T1.0159^ea^ taru.nakaana.m dhenupakaana.m gomayaani taani suda.m aahaaremi.  yaavakiiva~nca me ^a^M1.0113^ea^, saariputta, saka.m muttakariisa.m apariyaadinna.m hoti,  saka.myeva suda.m muttakariisa.m aahaaremi. ida.msu me, saariputta,  mahaavika.tabhojanasmi.m hoti.
text.497: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, saariputta, a~n~natara.m bhi.msanaka.m  vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa viharaami. tatraassuda.m, saariputta,  bhi.msanakassa vanasa.n.dassa bhi.msanakatasmi.m hoti -- yo koci  aviitaraago ta.m vanasa.n.da.m pavisati, yebhuyyena lomaani ha.msanti. so  kho aha.m, saariputta, yaa taa rattiyo siitaa hemantikaa antara.t.thakaa  himapaatasamayaa {antara.t.thake himapaatasamaye (sii0 pii0)} tathaaruupaasu rattiisu ratti.m abbhokaase viharaami, divaa  vanasa.n.de; gimhaana.m pacchime maase divaa abbhokaase viharaami, ratti.m  vanasa.n.de. apissu ma.m, saariputta, aya.m anacchariyagaathaa pa.tibhaasi  pubbe assutapubbaa --
text.498: [21] ``sotatto sosinno {sosiino (sii0 pii0 ka0), sosino (syaa0),  sosindo (saddaniiti)} ceva, eko bhi.msanake vane.
text.5: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^T1.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa ukka.t.thaaya.m viharati subhagavane saalaraajamuule. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sabbadhammamuulapariyaaya.m  vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.50: [03] ``aapa.m ^a^V1.0009^ea^ ...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m...  brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m...  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m...  ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati;  nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na  ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m  naabhinandati. ta.m ^a^T1.0011^ea^ kissa hetu? `nandii dukkhassa muula'nti --  iti viditvaa `bhavaa jaati bhuutassa jaraamara.na'nti. tasmaatiha,  bhikkhave, `tathaagato sabbaso ta.nhaana.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa  pa.tinissaggaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti vadaamii''ti.
text.500: [03] ``so kho aha.m, saariputta, susaane seyya.m kappemi chava.t.thikaani  upadhaaya. apissu ma.m, saariputta, gaama.n.dalaa {goma.n.dalaa (bahuusu)  cariyaapi.takaa.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa} upasa"nkamitvaa  o.t.thubhantipi, omuttentipi, pa.msukenapi okiranti, ka.n.nasotesupi  salaaka.m pavesenti. na kho panaaha.m, saariputta, abhijaanaami tesu  paapaka.m citta.m uppaadetaa. ida.msu me, saariputta, upekkhaavihaarasmi.m  hoti.
text.501: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``santi ^a^T1.0160^ea^ ^a^P1.0080^ea^ kho pana,  saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aahaarena ^a^V1.0114^ea^   suddhii'ti. te evamaaha.msu -- `kolehi yaapemaa'ti. te kolampi  khaadanti, kolacu.n.nampi khaadanti, kolodakampi pivanti --  anekavihitampi kolavikati.m paribhu~njanti. abhijaanaami kho  panaaha.m, saariputta, eka.myeva kola.m aahaara.m aahaaritaa. siyaa kho pana  te, saariputta, evamassa -- `mahaa nuuna tena samayena kolo  ahosii'ti. na kho paneta.m, saariputta, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. tadaapi  etaparamoyeva kolo ahosi seyyathaapi etarahi. tassa mayha.m,  saariputta, eka.myeva ^a^M1.0114^ea^ kola.m aahaara.m aahaarayato adhimattakasimaana.m patto  kaayo hoti. seyyathaapi naama aasiitikapabbaani vaa kaa.lapabbaani  vaa, evamevassu me a"ngapacca"ngaani bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya.  seyyathaapi naama o.t.thapada.m, evamevassu me aanisada.m hoti  taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama va.t.tanaava.lii, evamevassu me  pi.t.thika.n.tako unnataavanato hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama  jarasaalaaya gopaanasiyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti, evamevassu me  phaasu.liyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi  naama gambhiire udapaane udakataarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa  dissanti, evamevassu me akkhikuupesu akkhitaarakaa gambhiiragataa  okkhaayikaa dissanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama  tittakaalaabuaamakacchinno vaataatapena sa.mphu.tito {samphusito (syaa0), sa.mpu.tito  (pii0 ka0) ettha sa.mphu.titoti sa"nkucitoti attho} hoti sammilaato,  evamevassu ^a^T1.0161^ea^ me siisacchavi sa.mphu.titaa hoti sammilaataa  taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, saariputta, `udaracchavi.m  parimasissaamii'ti pi.t.thika.n.taka.myeva parigga.nhaami, `pi.t.thika.n.taka.m  parimasissaamii'ti udaracchavi.myeva parigga.nhaami, yaavassu me,  saariputta, udaracchavi pi.t.thika.n.taka.m alliinaa hoti taayevappaahaarataaya.  so kho aha.m, saariputta, `vacca.m vaa mutta.m vaa karissaamii'ti tattheva  avakujjo papataami taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, saariputta,  tameva kaaya.m assaasento paa.ninaa gattaani anomajjaami. tassa  mayha.m, saariputta, paa.ninaa gattaani anomajjato puutimuulaani lomaani  kaayasmaa patanti taayevappaahaarataaya.
text.502: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke  sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aahaarena suddhii'ti. te  evamaaha.msu -- `muggehi yaapema...pe0... tilehi yaapema...pe0...  ta.n.dulehi yaapemaa'ti. te ta.n.dulampi khaadanti, ta.n.dulacu.n.nampi  khaadanti, ta.n.dulodakampi ^a^P1.0081^ea^ pivanti --  anekavihitampi ta.n.dulavikati.m paribhu~njanti. abhijaanaami kho  panaaha.m, saariputta, eka.myeva ta.n.dula.m aahaara.m aahaaritaa. siyaa kho  pana te, saariputta, evamassa -- `mahaa nuuna tena samayena ta.n.dulo  ahosii'ti. na kho paneta.m, saariputta, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. tadaapi  etaparamoyeva ta.n.dulo ahosi ^a^V1.0115^ea^, seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0115^ea^ etarahi. tassa mayha.m,  saariputta, eka.myeva ta.n.dula.m aahaara.m aahaarayato adhimattakasimaana.m ^a^T1.0162^ea^ patto  kaayo hoti. seyyathaapi naama aasiitikapabbaani vaa kaa.lapabbaani  vaa, evamevassu me a"ngapacca"ngaani bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya.  seyyathaapi naama o.t.thapada.m, evamevassu me aanisada.m hoti  taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama va.t.tanaava.lii, evamevassu me  pi.t.thika.n.tako unnataavanato hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama  jarasaalaaya gopaanasiyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti, evamevassu me  phaasu.liyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi  naama gambhiire udapaane udakataarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa  dissanti, evamevassu me akkhikuupesu akkhitaarakaa gambhiiragataa  okkhaayikaa dissanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama  tittakaalaabu aamakacchinno vaataatapena sa.mphu.tito hoti sammilaato,  evamevassu me siisacchavi sa.mphu.titaa hoti sammilaataa  taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, saariputta, `udaracchavi.m  parimasissaamii'ti pi.t.thika.n.taka.myeva parigga.nhaami, `pi.t.thika.n.taka.m  parimasissaamii'ti udaracchavi.myeva parigga.nhaami. yaavassu me,  saariputta, udaracchavi pi.t.thika.n.taka.m alliinaa hoti taayevappaahaarataaya.  so kho aha.m, saariputta, `vacca.m vaa mutta.m vaa karissaamii'ti tattheva  avakujjo papataami taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, saariputta,  tameva kaaya.m assaasento paa.ninaa gattaani anomajjaami. tassa  mayha.m, saariputta, paa.ninaa gattaani anomajjato puutimuulaani lomaani  kaayasmaa patanti taayevappaahaarataaya.
text.503: [03] ``taayapi kho aha.m, saariputta, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya  dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagama.m uttari.m manussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? imissaayeva  ariyaaya pa~n~naaya anadhigamaa, yaaya.m ariyaa pa~n~naa adhigataa ariyaa  niyyaanikaa, niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.
text.504: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke  sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sa.msaarena suddhii'ti. na  kho pana so {na kho paneso (sii0 syaa0)}, saariputta, sa.msaaro   sulabharuupo ^a^M1.0116^ea^ yo mayaa asa.msaritapubbo  ^a^P1.0082^ea^ iminaa diighena addhunaa, a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi  devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve sa.msareyya.m, nayima.m loka.m  punaraagaccheyya.m.
text.505: [03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino  eva.mdi.t.thino -- `upapattiyaa ^a^V1.0116^ea^ suddhii'ti. na kho pana saa, saariputta  ^a^T1.0163^ea^, upapatti sulabharuupaa yaa mayaa anupapannapubbaa iminaa diighena addhunaa,  a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve  upapajjeyya.m, nayima.m loka.m punaraagaccheyya.m.
text.506: [03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino  eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aavaasena suddhii'ti. na kho pana so, saariputta,  aavaaso sulabharuupo yo mayaa anaavu.t.thapubbo {anaavutthapubbo (sii0 pii0)} iminaa diighena addhunaa,  a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve  aavaseyya.m, nayima.m loka.m punaraagaccheyya.m.
text.507: [01] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya~n~nena suddhii'ti. na kho pana so,  saariputta, ya~n~no sulabharuupo yo mayaa ayi.t.thapubbo iminaa diighena  addhunaa, ta~nca kho ra~n~naa vaa sataa khattiyena muddhaavasittena braahma.nena  vaa mahaasaalena.
text.508: [03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino  eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aggiparicariyaaya suddhii'ti. na kho pana so,  saariputta, aggi sulabharuupo yo mayaa aparici.n.napubbo iminaa  diighena addhunaa, ta~nca kho ra~n~naa vaa sataa khattiyena muddhaavasittena  braahma.nena vaa mahaasaalena.
text.509: [03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke  sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yaavadevaaya.m bhava.m puriso  daharo hoti yuvaa ^a^T1.0164^ea^ susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena  vayasaa taavadeva paramena pa~n~naaveyyattiyena samannaagato hoti. yato ca  kho aya.m bhava.m puriso ji.n.no hoti vuddho mahallako addhagato  vayoanuppatto, aasiitiko vaa naavutiko vaa vassasatiko vaa  jaatiyaa, atha tamhaa pa~n~naaveyyattiyaa, parihaayatii'ti. na kho  paneta.m, saariputta ^a^M1.0117^ea^, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. aha.m kho pana, saariputta, etarahi  ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, aasiitiko me vayo  vattati. idha me assu, saariputta, cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa  vassasatajiivino, paramaaya satiyaa ca gatiyaa ca dhitiyaa ca  samannaagataa paramena ca pa~n~naaveyyattiyena. seyyathaapi, saariputta,  da.lhadhammaa {da.lhadhammo (bahuusu) .tiikaa ca moggallaanabyaakara.na.m ca oloketabba.m}  dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katuupaasano lahukena  asanena appakasireneva tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m atipaateyya, eva.m  adhimattasatimanto ^a^V1.0117^ea^ eva.m adhimattagatimanto eva.m ^a^P1.0083^ea^  adhimattadhitimanto eva.m paramena pa~n~naaveyyattiyena samannaagataa. te ma.m  catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m upaadaayupaadaaya pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m, pu.t.tho pu.t.tho caaha.m  tesa.m byaakareyya.m, byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaareyyu.m, na ca ma.m dutiyaka.m  uttari pa.tipuccheyyu.m. a~n~natra asitapiitakhaayitasaayitaa a~n~natra  uccaarapassaavakammaa, a~n~natra niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa  apariyaadinnaayevassa, saariputta, tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa,  apariyaadinna.myevassa tathaagatassa dhammapadabya~njana.m, apariyaadinna.myevassa  tathaagatassa pa~nhapa.tibhaana.m ^a^T1.0165^ea^. atha me te cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa  vassasatajiivino vassasatassa accayena kaala.m kareyyu.m. ma~ncakena  cepi ma.m, saariputta, pariharissatha, nevatthi tathaagatassa  pa~n~naaveyyattiyassa a~n~nathatta.m. ya.m kho ta.m {ya.m kho paneta.m (sii0)}, saariputta, sammaa vadamaano  vadeyya -- `asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya  bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya  devamanussaana'nti, mameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya `asammohadhammo  satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya  atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'''nti.
text.510: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagasamaalo  bhagavato pi.t.thito .thito hoti bhagavanta.m biijayamaano. atha kho  aayasmaa naagasamaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante,  abbhuta.m, bhante! api hi me, bhante, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa  lomaani ha.t.thaani. konaamo aya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti?  ``tasmaatiha tva.m, naagasamaala, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m lomaha.msanapariyaayo  tveva na.m dhaarehii''ti.
text.511: [03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0118^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa naagasamaalo bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.514: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0166^ea^ ^a^V1.0118^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaa  bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^P1.0084^ea^  saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.msu. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi  -- ``atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m, ya.m nuuna maya.m  yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti.  atha kho te bhikkhuu yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi  saddhi.m sammodi.msu; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu te a~n~natitthiyaa  paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m -- ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo kaamaana.m  pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema; sama.no,  aavuso, gotamo ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m  pa~n~napema; sama.no, aavuso, gotamo vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti,  mayampi vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema; idha no, aavuso, ko viseso,  ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m  vaa -- yadida.m dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa  anusaasani''nti? atha kho te bhikkhuu tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m  paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva ^a^T1.0167^ea^ abhinandi.msu, nappa.tikkosi.msu;  anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu -- ``bhagavato  santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa''ti.
text.515: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya  caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante,  pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m ^a^M1.0119^ea^ pi.n.daaya  paavisimha. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `atippago  kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m, ya.m nuuna maya.m yena  a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa'ti. atha  kho maya.m, bhante, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo  tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi ^a^V1.0119^ea^ paribbaajakehi  saddhi.m sammodimha; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidimha. ekamanta.m nisinne kho amhe, bhante, te  a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m -- `sama.no, aavuso, gotamo  kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema ^a^P1.0085^ea^.  sama.no, aavuso, gotamo ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti,  mayampi ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema. sama.no, aavuso, gotamo vedanaana.m  pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema. idha no,  aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m ^a^T1.0168^ea^ sama.nassa vaa  gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m  anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani'nti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, tesa.m  a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandimha,  nappa.tikkosimha; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamimha  -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa'''ti.
text.516: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa  paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `ko panaavuso, kaamaana.m  assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko ruupaana.m assaado, ko  aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vedanaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo,  ki.m nissara.na'nti? eva.m pu.t.thaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa  na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m  kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m. naaha.m ta.m,  bhikkhave, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake  sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m  veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena  vaa, ito vaa pana sutvaa.
text.517: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m assaado?  pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa  i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa  saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa ^a^M1.0120^ea^... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...  kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa  rajaniiyaa -- ime ^a^T1.0169^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho,  bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m --  aya.m kaamaana.m assaado.
text.518: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo?  idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippa.t.thaanena ^a^V1.0120^ea^ jiivika.m kappeti -- yadi  muddaaya yadi ga.nanaaya yadi sa"nkhaanena {sa"nkhaaya (ka0)} yadi kasiyaa yadi va.nijjaaya  yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi raajaporisena yadi  sippa~n~natarena -- siitassa purakkhato u.nhassa purakkhato  .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassehi rissamaano {iirayamaano (ka0),  samphassamaano (cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasutta 136)} khuppipaasaaya  miiyamaano; ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko,  dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m ^a^P1.0086^ea^  kaamaanameva hetu.
text.519: [03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato  vaayamato te bhogaa naabhinipphajjanti. so socati kilamati  paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati -- `mogha.m vata me  u.t.thaana.m, aphalo vata me vaayaamo'ti. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m  aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.52: [01] idamavoca bhagavaa. na te bhikkhuu {na attamanaa tebhikkhuu (syaa0), te  bhikkhuu (pii0 ka0)} bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.520: [03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato  vaayamato te bhogaa abhinipphajjanti. so tesa.m bhogaana.m  aarakkhaadhikara.na.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti -- `kinti me bhoge  neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi daheyya, na udaka.m  vaheyya {vaaheyya (ka0)}, na appiyaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. tassa ^a^T1.0170^ea^ eva.m aarakkhato  gopayato te bhoge raajaano vaa haranti, coraa vaa haranti, aggi vaa  dahati, udaka.m vaa vahati, appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. so socati  kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati -- `yampi  me ahosi tampi no natthii'ti. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m  aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.521: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti,  khattiyaapi khattiyehi vivadanti ^a^M1.0121^ea^, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti,  gahapatiipi gahapatiihi vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi  maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati,  bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi  bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati. te tattha  kalahaviggahavivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m paa.niihipi upakkamanti, le.d.duuhipi  upakkamanti, da.n.dehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti. te tattha  mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m ^a^V1.0121^ea^. ayampi, bhikkhave,  kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.522: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, ubhatobyuu.lha.m  sa"ngaama.m pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu ^a^T1.0171^ea^, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu,  asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi  vijjhanti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi  nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m  aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.523: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m  sannayhitvaa, addaavalepanaa {a.t.taavalepanaa (syaa0 ka0)} upakaariyo pakkhandanti usuusupi  khippamaanesu, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu ^a^P1.0087^ea^, asiisupi  vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti,  chaka.nakaayapi {paka.t.thiyaapi (sii0)} osi~ncanti, abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asinaapi  siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi  dukkha.m. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko,  dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.524: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti, nillopampi  haranti, ekaagaarikampi karonti, paripanthepi ti.t.thanti, paradaarampi  gacchanti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarenti --  kasaahipi taa.lenti, vettehipi taa.lenti, a.d.dhada.n.dakehipi taa.lenti;  hatthampi chindanti, paadampi chindanti, hatthapaadampi ^a^T1.0172^ea^ chindanti,  ka.n.nampi chindanti, naasampi chindanti, ka.n.nanaasampi chindanti;  bila"ngathaalikampi karonti ^a^M1.0122^ea^, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi karonti, raahumukhampi  karonti, jotimaalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti,  erakavattikampi karonti, ciirakavaasikampi karonti, e.neyyakampi  karonti, ba.lisama.msikampi karonti, kahaapa.nikampi karonti,  khaaraapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti,  palaalapii.thakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osi~ncanti, sunakhehipi  khaadaapenti, jiivantampi suule uttaasenti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti ^a^V1.0122^ea^.  te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi,  bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu  kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.525: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti,  manasaa duccarita.m caranti. te kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya  duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. ayampi,  bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo samparaayiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu  kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.526: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m nissara.na.m? yo  kho, bhikkhave, kaamesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m  kaamaana.m nissara.na.m.
text.527: [03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ^a^T1.0173^ea^  kaamaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca  nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti te vata saama.m vaa kaame  parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno  kaame parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho keci,  bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ^a^P1.0088^ea^ eva.m kaamaana.m  assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca  nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te vata saama.m vaa kaame  parijaanissanti para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessantntti yathaa pa.tipanno  kaame parijaanissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.
text.528: [03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m assaado?  seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, khattiyaka~n~naa vaa braahma.naka~n~naa vaa  gahapatika~n~naa vaa pannarasavassuddesikaa vaa so.lasavassuddesikaa vaa,  naatidiighaa naatirassaa naatikisaa naatithuulaa naatikaa.lii  naaccodaataa paramaa saa, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye subhaa ^a^M1.0123^ea^ va.n.nanibhaati?  `eva.m, bhante'. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, subha.m va.n.nanibha.m pa.ticca  uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m -- aya.m ruupaana.m assaado.
text.529: [03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo? idha, bhikkhave,  tameva bhagini.m passeyya aparena samayena aasiitika.m vaa naavutika.m vaa  vassasatika.m vaa jaatiyaa, ji.n.na.m gopaanasiva"nka.m ^a^V1.0123^ea^ bhogga.m da.n.daparaayana.m  pavedhamaana.m gacchanti.m aatura.m gatayobbana.m kha.n.dadanta.m {kha.n.dadanti.m (sii0 pii0)} palitakesa.m  {palitakesi.m}, viluuna.m  khalitasira.m valina.m tilakaahatagatta.m {tilakaahatagatti.m (bahuusu) a.t.thakathaa .tiikaa  oloketabbaa}. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa  purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti?  `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.530: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya aabaadhika.m  dukkhita.m baa.lhagilaana.m, sake muttakariise palipanna.m semaana.m {seyyamaana.m (ka0)}, a~n~nehi  vu.t.thaapiyamaana.m, a~n~nehi sa.mvesiyamaana.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa  purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti?  `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.531: [03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m  passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa  tiihamata.m vaa, uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha,  bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo  paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.532: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- kaakehi vaa khajjamaana.m, kulalehi vaa  khajjamaana.m, gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m, ka"nkehi vaa khajjamaana.m, sunakhehi  vaa khajjamaana.m, byagghehi vaa khajjamaana.m, diipiihi vaa khajjamaana.m,  si"ngaalehi vaa khajjamaana.m, vividhehi vaa paa.nakajaatehi khajjamaana.m.  ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0089^ea^, yaa purimaa subhaa  va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'.  ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.533: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m sama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m,  a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m ^a^T1.0175^ea^ nima.msalohitamakkhita.m ^a^M1.0124^ea^ nhaarusambandha.m,  a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m apagatama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m, a.t.thikaani  apagatasambandhaani disaavidisaavikkhittaani -- a~n~nena hattha.t.thika.m,  a~n~nena paada.t.thika.m, a~n~nena gopphaka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ja"ngha.t.thika.m, a~n~nena  uuru.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ka.ti.t.thika.m, a~n~nena phaasuka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena pi.t.thi.t.thika.m,  a~n~nena khandha.t.thika.m, a~n~nena giiva.t.thika.m, a~n~nena hanuka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena  danta.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ^a^V1.0124^ea^ siisaka.taaha.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa  purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti?  `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.534: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m  sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- a.t.thikaani setaani sa"nkhava.n.napa.tibhaagaani,  a.t.thikaani pu~njakitaani terovassikaani, a.t.thikaani puutiini  cu.n.nakajaataani. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa  va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'.  ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
text.535: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m nissara.na.m? yo, bhikkhave,  ruupesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m.
text.536: [03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ruupaana.m  assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca  nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti te vata saama.m vaa ruupe  parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno ruupe  parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho keci,  bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ruupaana.m assaada~nca assaadato  aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m  pajaananti te vata saama.m vaa ruupe parijaanissanti para.m vaa tathattaaya  samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno ruupe parijaanissatiiti ^a^T1.0176^ea^ -- .thaanameta.m  vijjati.
text.537: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m assaado?  idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi  savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi  vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, neva tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaayapi  ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^P1.0090^ea^  ceteti ^a^M1.0125^ea^; abyaabajjha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti.  abyaabajjhaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m assaada.m vadaami.
text.538: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m ^a^V1.0125^ea^ avitakka.m avicaara.m  samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... yasmi.m  samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa, upekkhako ca  viharati, sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m  ariyaa ^a^T1.0177^ea^ aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m  attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati, neva tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na  parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti; abyaabajjha.myeva  tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. abyaabajjhaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m  assaada.m vadaami.
text.539: [03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m aadiinavo?  ya.m, bhikkhave, vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa -- aya.m  vedanaana.m aadiinavo.
text.540: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m nissara.na.m? yo, bhikkhave,  vedanaasu chandaraagavinayo, chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m vedanaana.m nissara.na.m.
text.541: [03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m  vedanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca  nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te vata saama.m vaa vedana.m  parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno  vedana.m parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho ^a^T1.0178^ea^ keci,  bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m vedanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato  aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m  pajaananti te vata saama.m vaa vedana.m parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya  samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno vedana.m parijaanissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m  vijjatii''ti.
text.542: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.545: [03] 175^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0126^ea^ ^a^P1.0091^ea^ ^a^V1.0126^ea^ ^a^T1.0179^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho  mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo  sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``diigharattaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa eva.m dhamma.m  desita.m aajaanaami -- `lobho cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa  upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso'ti. eva~ncaaha.m {eva.mpaaha.m (ka0)}, bhante,  bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `lobho cittassa upakkileso,  doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso'ti. atha ca  pana me ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, dosadhammaapi  citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti.  tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `kosu naama me dhammo ajjhatta.m  appahiino yena me ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti,  dosadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thantii'''ti.
text.546: [03] 176^b^.^eb^ ``so eva kho te, mahaanaama, dhammo ajjhatta.m  appahiino yena te ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti,  dosadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. so ca hi te, mahaanaama, dhammo ajjhatta.m  pahiino abhavissa, na tva.m agaara.m ajjhaavaseyyaasi, na kaame  paribhu~njeyyaasi. yasmaa ca kho te, mahaanaama, so eva dhammo  ajjhatta.m appahiino tasmaa tva.m agaara.m ajjhaavasasi, kaame paribhu~njasi.
text.547: [03] 177^b^.^eb^ ```appassaadaa ^a^T1.0180^ea^ kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,  aadiinavo {bahuupaayaasaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ettha bhiyyo'ti -- iti cepi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavakassa  yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m hoti, so ca {sova (ka0)} a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra  akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m;  atha kho so neva taava anaava.t.tii kaamesu hoti. yato ca kho,  mahaanaama, ariyasaavakassa `appassaadaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,  aadiinavo ^a^M1.0127^ea^ ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya  ^a^V1.0127^ea^ sudi.t.tha.m  hoti, so ca a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m  adhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; atha kho so anaava.t.tii kaamesu  hoti.
text.548: [03] ``mayhampi kho, mahaanaama ^a^P1.0092^ea^, pubbeva  sambodhaa, anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato, `appassaadaa kaamaa  bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m  yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m hoti, so ca a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra  akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naajjhagama.m, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m;  atha khvaaha.m neva taava anaava.t.tii kaamesu pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca kho  me, mahaanaama, `appassaadaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo  ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m ahosi,  so ca {sova (ka0)} a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m  ajjhagama.m, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; athaaha.m anaava.t.tii kaamesu  pacca~n~naasi.m.
text.549: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m assaado?  pa~ncime, mahaanaama, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa  i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa; sotavi~n~neyyaa  saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...  kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa  rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, mahaanaama, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho,  mahaanaama, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m --  aya.m kaamaana.m assaado.
text.55: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0012^ea^ ^a^V1.0010^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sabbaasavasa.mvarapariyaaya.m  vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha ^a^M1.0009^ea^ ^a^P1.0007^ea^, saadhuka.m  manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te  bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.550: [03] ``ko ca, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo? idha, mahaanaama,  kulaputto yena sippa.t.thaanena jiivika.m kappeti -- yadi muddaaya yadi  ga.nanaaya yadi sa"nkhaanena yadi kasiyaa yadi va.nijjaaya yadi  gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi raajaporisena yadi sippa~n~natarena,  siitassa purakkhato u.nhassa purakkhato  .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassehi rissamaano khuppipaasaaya  miiyamaano; ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko  dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m ^a^T1.0182^ea^ kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.551: [03] ``tassa ^a^M1.0128^ea^ ce mahaanaama kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato  te bhogaa naabhinipphajjanti, so socati kilamati paridevati  urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati `mogha.m ^a^V1.0128^ea^ vata me u.t.thaana.m, aphalo  vata me vaayaamo'ti. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo  sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu.
text.552: [03] ``tassa ce, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato  te bhogaa abhinipphajjanti. so tesa.m bhogaana.m aarakkhaadhikara.na.m dukkha.m  domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti -- `kinti me bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na  coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya, na appiyaa vaa  daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. tassa eva.m aarakkhato gopayato te bhoge  raajaano vaa haranti, coraa vaa haranti, aggi vaa dahati, udaka.m vaa  vahati, appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. so socati kilamati  paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati -- `yampi me ahosi  tampi no natthii'ti. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo  sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu.
text.553: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti, khattiyaapi khattiyehi  vivadanti, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti, gahapatiipi gahapatiihi  vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati,  pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa  vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati,  sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati. te tattha kalahaviggahavivaadaapannaa  a~n~nama~n~na.m paa.niihipi upakkamanti, le.d.duuhipi upakkamanti, da.n.dehipi  upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti,  mara.namattampi dukkha.m ^a^T1.0183^ea^. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo  sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu.
text.554: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, ubhatobyuu.lha.m  sa"ngaama.m pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu,  asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi  vijjhanti, asinaapi siisa.m ^a^M1.0129^ea^ chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi  nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m  aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.555: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m ^a^V1.0129^ea^ gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, addaavalepanaa  upakaariyo pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu, sattiisupi  khippamaanaasu, asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi  vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti, chaka.nakaayapi osi~ncanti,  abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha  mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, mahaanaama,  kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m  kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.556: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti, nillopampi haranti,  ekaagaarikampi ^a^T1.0184^ea^ karonti, paripanthepi ti.t.thanti, paradaarampi gacchanti.  tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarenti -- kasaahipi  taa.lenti, vettehipi taa.lenti, a.d.dhada.n.dakehipi taa.lenti; hatthampi  chindanti, paadampi chindanti, hatthapaadampi chindanti, ka.n.nampi  chindanti, naasampi chindanti, ka.n.nanaasampi chindanti;  bila"ngathaalikampi karonti, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi karonti, raahumukhampi  karonti, jotimaalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti,  erakavattikampi karonti, ciirakavaasikampi karonti, e.neyyakampi  karonti, ba.lisama.msikampi karonti, kahaapa.nikampi karonti,  khaaraapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti,  palaalapii.thakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osi~ncanti, sunakhehipi  khaadaapenti, jiivantampi suule uttaasenti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti.  te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi,  mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu  kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.557: [03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m  kaamaanameva hetu kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti,  manasaa duccarita.m caranti. te kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya  duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa, apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. ayampi,  mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo samparaayiko ^a^M1.0130^ea^, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu  kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
text.558: [03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, mahaanaama, samaya.m raajagahe  viharaami gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa  niga.n.thaa {niganthaa (syaa0 ka0)} isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m ^a^T1.0185^ea^ ubbha.t.thakaa honti  aasanapa.tikkhittaa, opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa  vedayanti. atha khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito  yena isigilipasse kaa.lasilaa yena te niga.n.thaa ^a^V1.0130^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa te niga.n.the etadavoca.m -- `kinnu tumhe, aavuso,  niga.n.thaa ubbha.t.thakaa aasanapa.tikkhittaa, opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa  kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayathaa'ti? eva.m vutte, mahaanaama, te niga.n.thaa  ma.m etadavocu.m -- `niga.n.tho, aavuso, naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii  aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- ``carato ca me ti.t.thato ca  suttassa ca jaagarassa ^a^P1.0093^ea^ ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m  paccupa.t.thita''nti. so evamaaha -- ``atthi kho vo {atthi kho bho (syaa0  ka0)}, niga.n.thaa, pubbe  paapakamma.m kata.m, ta.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya nijjiiretha {nijjaretha (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}; ya.m  panettha {maya.m panettha (ka0)} etarahi kaayena sa.mvutaa vaacaaya sa.mvutaa manasaa sa.mvutaa ta.m  aayati.m paapassa kammassa akara.na.m; iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa  byantibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m  anavassavaa kammakkhayo, kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayaa  vedanaakkhayo, vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti.  ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camha attamanaa'ti.
text.559: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^T1.0186^ea^ vutte, aha.m, mahaanaama, te niga.n.the  etadavoca.m -- `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha --  ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe na naahuvamhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m  pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe  paapakamma.m na naakaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe,  aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m  akaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso  niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m  nijjiiretabba.m ^a^M1.0131^ea^, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m  bhavissatii'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso  niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.
text.56: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``jaanato aha.m, bhikkhave, passato aasavaana.m  khaya.m vadaami, no ajaanato no apassato. ki~nca, bhikkhave,  jaanato ki~nca passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami? yoniso ca  manasikaara.m ayoniso ca manasikaara.m. ayoniso, bhikkhave,  manasikaroto anuppannaa ceva aasavaa uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa  pava.d.dhanti; yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannaa ceva  aasavaa na uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa pahiiyanti.
text.560: [03] ```iti kira tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, na jaanaatha --  ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe na naahuvamhaati, na jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m  pubbe paapakamma.m na naakaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m  vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m,  ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m  dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti. na jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m. eva.m sante,  aavuso niga.n.thaa, ye loke luddaa lohitapaa.nino kuruurakammantaa  manussesu ^a^V1.0131^ea^ paccaajaataa te niga.n.thesu pabbajantii'ti? `na ^a^T1.0187^ea^ kho, aavuso  gotama, sukhena sukha.m adhigantabba.m, dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m;  sukhena caavuso ^a^P1.0094^ea^ gotama, sukha.m adhigantabba.m  abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukha.m adhigaccheyya,  raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukhavihaaritaro aayasmataa  gotamenaa'ti.
text.561: [03] ```addhaayasmantehi niga.n.thehi sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa vaacaa  bhaasitaa -- na kho, aavuso gotama, sukhena sukha.m adhigantabba.m,  dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m; sukhena caavuso gotama, sukha.m  adhigantabba.m abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukha.m  adhigaccheyya, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukhavihaaritaro  aayasmataa gotamenaa''ti. api ca ahameva tattha pa.tipucchitabbo --  ko nu kho aayasmantaana.m sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo  bimbisaaro aayasmaa vaa gotamo'ti? addhaavuso gotama, amhehi  sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa vaacaa bhaasitaa, na kho, aavuso gotama, sukhena  sukha.m adhigantabba.m, dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m; sukhena caavuso  gotama, sukha.m adhigantabba.m abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo  bimbisaaro sukha.m adhigaccheyya, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro  sukhavihaaritaro aayasmataa gotamenaati. api ca ti.t.thateta.m, idaanipi  maya.m aayasmanta.m gotama.m pucchaama -- ko nu kho aayasmantaana.m  sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmaa vaa  gotamo'ti?
text.562: [03] ```tena ^a^M1.0132^ea^ haavuso niga.n.thaa, tumheva tattha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa  vo khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaatha. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa,  pahoti raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro, ani~njamaano ^a^T1.0188^ea^ kaayena,  abhaasamaano vaaca.m, satta rattindivaani ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii  viharitu'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.
text.563: [03] ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, pahoti raajaa maagadho  seniyo bimbisaaro, ani~njamaano kaayena, abhaasamaano vaaca.m, cha  rattindivaani...pe0... pa~nca rattindivaani... cattaari  rattindivaani... tii.ni rattindivaani... dve rattindivaani... eka.m  rattindiva.m ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu'nti? `no hida.m,  aavuso'.
text.564: [03] ```aha.m ^a^V1.0132^ea^ kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pahomi ani~njamaano kaayena,  abhaasamaano vaaca.m, eka.m rattindiva.m ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu.m.  aha.m kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pahomi ani~njamaano kaayena, abhaasamaano  vaaca.m, dve rattindivaani... tii.ni rattindivaani... cattaari  rattindivaani... pa~nca rattindivaani... cha rattindivaani... satta  rattindivaani ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso  niga.n.thaa, eva.m sante ko sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo  bimbisaaro aha.m vaa'ti? `eva.m sante aayasmaava gotamo ^a^P1.0095^ea^  sukhavihaaritaro ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarenaa'''ti.
text.565: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano mahaanaamo sakko bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandiiti.
text.568: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0189^ea^ ^a^V1.0133^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhesaka.laavane migadaaye.  tatra kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``aavuso, bhikkhavo''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu  aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano  etadavoca --
text.569: [03] ``pavaareti ^a^M1.0133^ea^ cepi, aavuso, bhikkhu -- `vadantu ma.m  aayasmanto, vacaniiyomhi aayasmantehii'ti, so ca hoti dubbaco,  dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato, akkhamo appadakkhi.naggaahii  anusaasani.m, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva vattabba.m ma~n~nanti, na ca  anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nanti, na ca tasmi.m puggale vissaasa.m aapajjitabba.m  ma~n~nanti.
text.57: [03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa  pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa pa.tisevanaa  pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa  parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi  aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.570: [03] ``katame caavuso, dovacassakara.naa dhammaa? idhaavuso, bhikkhu  paapiccho hoti, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato. yampaavuso, bhikkhu  paapiccho hoti, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.571: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu attukka.msako hoti paravambhii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu attukka.msako hoti paravambhii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.572: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhaabhibhuuto.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhaabhibhuuto -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.573: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso ^a^T1.0190^ea^, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu  upanaahii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu upanaahii --  ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.574: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu  abhisa"ngii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu abhisa"ngii  -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.575: [01] ``puna ^a^V1.0134^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti  kodhasaamantaa {kodhasaamanta.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} vaaca.m nicchaaretaa. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti  kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.576: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito {cudito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} codakena codaka.m  pa.tippharati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m  pa.tippharati -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.577: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0134^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m  apasaadeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeti  -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.578: [01] ``puna capara.m ^a^P1.0096^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhu  codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu  codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeti -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.579: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.580: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane ^a^T1.0191^ea^ na  sampaayati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane na  sampaayati -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
text.581: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.582: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu issukii hoti maccharii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu issukii hoti maccharii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.583: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti maayaavii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti maayaavii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.584: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0135^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu thaddho hoti atimaanii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu thaddho hoti atimaanii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no.
text.585: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti  aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii  hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii -- ayampi dhammo  dovacassakara.no. ime vuccantaavuso, dovacassakara.naa dhammaa.
text.586: [03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``no ^a^M1.0135^ea^ cepi, aavuso, bhikkhu pavaareti --  `vadantu ma.m aayasmanto, vacaniiyomhi aayasmantehii'ti, so ca hoti  suvaco, sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato, khamo padakkhi.naggaahii  anusaasani.m, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii vattabba~nceva ma~n~nanti,  anusaasitabba~nca ma~n~nanti, tasmi~nca puggale vissaasa.m aapajjitabba.m  ma~n~nanti.
text.587: [03] ``katame caavuso, sovacassakara.naa dhammaa? idhaavuso,  bhikkhu na paapiccho hoti, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu na paapiccho hoti na ^a^T1.0192^ea^ paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m  gato -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.588: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu anattukka.msako hoti aparavambhii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu anattukka.msako hoti aparavambhii -- ayampi  dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.589: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na  kodhaabhibhuuto. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na  kodhaabhibhuuto -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.59: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0013^ea^, assutavaa puthujjano -- ariyaana.m  adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito,  sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme  aviniito -- manasikara.niiye dhamme nappajaanaati, amanasikara.niiye  dhamme nappajaanaati. so manasikara.niiye dhamme appajaananto  amanasikara.niiye dhamme appajaananto, ye dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa,  te dhamme manasi karoti, ye dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa te dhamme na  manasi karoti.
text.590: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu  upanaahii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu  upanaahii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.591: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu  abhisa"ngii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu  abhisa"ngii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.592: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na  kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa. yampaavuso ^a^V1.0136^ea^, bhikkhu na kodhano  hoti na kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.593: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m  nappa.tippharati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m  nappa.tippharati -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no ^a^T1.0193^ea^.
text.594: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0136^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m na  apasaadeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m na  apasaadeti -- ayampi dhammo ^a^P1.0097^ea^ sovacassakara.no.
text.595: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa  na paccaaropeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa na  paccaaropeti -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.596: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena na  a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca  dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito  codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na  kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.597: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane  sampaayati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane sampaayati  -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
text.598: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti apa.laasii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti apa.laasii -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.599: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu anissukii hoti amaccharii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu anissukii hoti amaccharii -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.6: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano  ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ^a^V1.0002^ea^ ariyadhamme aviniito,  sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme  aviniito -- pathavi.m {pa.thavi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pathavito sa~njaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito sa~n~natvaa  pathavi.m ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa ma~n~nati, pathavito ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti  ma~n~nati ^a^T1.0002^ea^, pathavi.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m  tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.60: [03] ``katame ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme  manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno  vaa kaamaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno  vaa bhavaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno  vaa avijjaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pava.d.dhati --  ime dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti.
text.600: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0137^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti amaayaavii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti amaayaavii -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.601: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu atthaddho hoti anatimaanii.  yampaavuso, bhikkhu atthaddho hoti anatimaanii -- ayampi dhammo  sovacassakara.no.
text.602: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti  anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu  asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti, anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii ^a^M1.0137^ea^ --  ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no. ime vuccantaavuso, sovacassakara.naa  dhammaa.
text.603: [03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso ^a^T1.0194^ea^, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  anuminitabba.m {anumaanitabba.m (sii0)} -- `yo khvaaya.m puggalo paapiccho, paapikaana.m icchaana.m  vasa.m gato, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m  paapiccho paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo  amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na paapiccho  bhavissaami, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.604: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo attukka.msako paravambhii, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m attukka.msako paravambhii,  aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa `anattukka.msako bhavissaami aparavambhii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.605: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo. aha~nceva kho panassa.m kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto,  aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhaabhibhuuto'ti citta.m  uppaadetabba.m.
text.606: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii, aya.m me  puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m kodhano kodhahetu  upanaahii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m  jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhahetu  upanaahii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.607: [03] ```yo ^a^V1.0138^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii, aya.m me  puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva ^a^T1.0195^ea^ kho panassa.m kodhano kodhahetu  abhisa"ngii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m  jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhahetu  abhisa"ngii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.608: [03] ```yo ^a^M1.0138^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m  nicchaaretaa, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho  panassa.m kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m  appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano  bhavissaami na kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaressaamii'ti citta.m  uppaadetabba.m.
text.609: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codaka.m pa.tippharati,  aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito  codakena codaka.m pa.tipphareyya.m ^a^P1.0098^ea^, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m  appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito  codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.61: [03] ``katame ^a^M1.0010^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na  manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno  vaa kaamaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pahiiyati;  anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pahiiyati;  anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo  pahiiyati -- ime dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na manasi karoti.
text.610: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeti,  aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito  codakena codaka.m apasaadeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti.  eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena codaka.m na  apasaadessaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.611: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codakassa  paccaaropeti, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana  codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo  amanaapo'ti. eva.m ^a^T1.0196^ea^ jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena  codakassa na paccaaropessaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.612: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana  codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticareyya.m, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameyya.m ^a^V1.0139^ea^,  kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukareyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo  amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena na  a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissaami, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamessaami, na  kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukarissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.613: [03] ```yo ^a^M1.0139^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena apadaane na  sampaayati, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana  codito codakena apadaane na sampaayeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo  amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena  apadaane sampaayissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.614: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo makkhii pa.laasii, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m makkhii pa.laasii, aha.mpaassa.m  paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  `amakkhii bhavissaami apa.laasii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.615: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo issukii maccharii, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m ^a^T1.0197^ea^ issukii maccharii,  aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa `anissukii bhavissaami amaccharii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.616: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo sa.tho maayaavii, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m sa.tho maayaavii, aha.mpaassa.m  paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  `asa.tho bhavissaami amaayaavii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.617: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo thaddho atimaanii, aya.m me puggalo  appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m thaddho atimaanii,  aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa `atthaddho bhavissaami anatimaanii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.618: [03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii  duppa.tinissaggii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho  panassa.m sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, aha.mpaassa.m  paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  `asandi.t.thiparaamaasii bhavissaami anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii'ti  citta.m uppaadetabba.m.
text.619: [03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso ^a^V1.0140^ea^, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi paapiccho, paapikaana.m icchaana.m  vasa.m gato'ti? sace, aavuso ^a^M1.0140^ea^, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `paapiccho khomhi, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^T1.0198^ea^ eva.m jaanaati -- `na  khomhi paapiccho, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa  kusalesu dhammesu.
text.62: [03] ``tassa amanasikara.niiyaana.m ^a^P1.0008^ea^ dhammaana.m  manasikaaraa manasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m amanasikaaraa anuppannaa ceva  aasavaa uppajjanti uppannaa ca aasavaa ^a^T1.0014^ea^ pava.d.dhanti.
text.620: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi attukka.msako paravambhii'ti? sace,  aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `attukka.msako  khomhi paravambhii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anattukka.msako ^a^P1.0099^ea^  khomhi aparavambhii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena  vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.621: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto'ti?  sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kodhano  khomhi kodhaabhibhuuto'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi kodhano  kodhaabhibhuuto'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.622: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii'ti?  sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `kodhano khomhi  kodhahetu upanaahii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva ^a^T1.0199^ea^ paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `na khomhi kodhano kodhahetu  upanaahii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.623: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0141^ea^ ^a^V1.0141^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti?  sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kodhano  khomhi kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva  paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso,  bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi kodhano  kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena  vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.624: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m  nicchaaretaa'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `kodhano khomhi kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na  khomhi kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa  kusalesu dhammesu.
text.625: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codaka.m ^a^T1.0200^ea^  pa.tippharaamii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaanaati `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m pa.tippharaamii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya  vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharaamii'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa  kusalesu dhammesu.
text.626: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codaka.m  apasaademii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m apasaademii'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito  khomhi codakena codaka.m ^a^M1.0142^ea^ na apasaademii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.627: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codakassa  paccaaropemii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^V1.0142^ea^ eva.m jaanaati  -- `codito khomhi codakena codakassa paccaaropemii'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito  khomhi codakena codakassa na paccaaropemii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  teneva piitipaamojjena ^a^T1.0201^ea^ vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
