text.628: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticaraami, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamemi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaromii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `codito khomhi codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticaraami, bahiddhaa katha.m  apanaamemi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaromii'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito  khomhi codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticaraami, na bahiddhaa katha.m  apanaamemi, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaromii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.629: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena apadaane na  sampaayaamii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `codito khomhi codakena apadaane na sampaayaamii'ti, tenaavuso,  bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito  khomhi codakena apadaane sampaayaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva  piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.63: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m ayoniso manasi karoti --  `ahosi.m nu kho aha.m atiitamaddhaana.m? na nu kho ahosi.m  atiitamaddhaana.m? ki.m nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m? katha.m nu kho  ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m? ki.m hutvaa ki.m ahosi.m nu kho aha.m  atiitamaddhaana.m? bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana.m? na nu  kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m? ki.m nu kho bhavissaami  anaagatamaddhaana.m? katha.m nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m? ki.m  hutvaa ki.m bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti? etarahi vaa  paccuppannamaddhaana.m {paccuppannamaddhaana.m aarabbha (syaa0)} ajjhatta.m katha.mkathii hoti -- `aha.m nu khosmi? no  nu khosmi? ki.m nu khosmi? katha.m nu khosmi? aya.m nu kho  satto kuto aagato? so kuhi.m gaamii bhavissatii'ti?
text.630: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0143^ea^ capara.m ^a^T1.0202^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi makkhii pa.laasii'ti? sace,  aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `makkhii khomhi  pa.laasii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `amakkhii khomhi apa.laasii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.631: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0143^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi issukii maccharii'ti? sace,  aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `issukii khomhi  maccharii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anissukii khomhi amaccharii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.632: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi sa.tho maayaavii'ti? sace, aavuso,  bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `sa.tho khomhi maayaavii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya  vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati  -- `asa.tho khomhi amaayaavii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva  piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.633: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m ^a^T1.0203^ea^ -- `ki.m nu khomhi thaddho atimaanii'ti? sace,  aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `thaddho khomhi  atimaanii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthaddho khomhi anatimaanii'ti,  tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.634: [03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii  duppa.tinissaggii'ti? sace, aavuso ^a^M1.0144^ea^, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaanaati -- `sandi.t.thiparaamaasii khomhi aadhaanaggaahii  duppa.tinissaggii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa ^a^P1.0100^ea^ tesa.myeva  paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso,  bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `asandi.t.thiparaamaasii khomhi  anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva  piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.635: [03] ``sace ^a^V1.0144^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake  akusale dhamme appahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa  sabbesa.myeva imesa.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.  sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale  dhamme pahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva  piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m, ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.
text.636: [03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii ^a^T1.0204^ea^ vaa puriso vaa, daharo yuvaa  ma.n.danajaatiko, aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate, acche vaa udakapatte,  saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano, sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m  vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati; no ce  tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, teneva attamano hoti -- `laabhaa  vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva kho, aavuso, sace bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme appahiine attani  samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sabbesa.myeva imesa.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu  paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme pahiine attani  samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m,  ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesuu''ti.
text.637: [03] idamavocaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano. attamanaa te bhikkhuu  aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.64: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``tassa eva.m ayoniso manasikaroto channa.m  di.t.thiina.m a~n~nataraa di.t.thi uppajjati. `atthi me attaa'ti vaa assa {vaassa  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `natthi me attaa'ti vaa assa  saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `attanaava attaana.m sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa  assa saccato thetato ^a^V1.0012^ea^ di.t.thi uppajjati; `attanaava anattaana.m  sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa assa saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `anattanaava  attaana.m sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa assa saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; atha  vaa panassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `yo me aya.m attaa vado vedeyyo tatra  tatra kalyaa.napaapakaana.m kammaana.m vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti so kho pana me  aya.m attaa nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo ^a^M1.0011^ea^ sassatisama.m  tatheva .thassatii'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0015^ea^, di.t.thigata.m di.t.thigahana.m  di.t.thikantaara.m di.t.thivisuuka.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m.  di.t.thisa.myojanasa.myutto, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano na parimuccati  jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi  upaayaasehi; `na parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami.
text.640: [03] 185^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0205^ea^ ^a^M1.0145^ea^ ^a^V1.0145^ea^ ^a^P1.0101^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti.  ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.641: [03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca cetokhilaa  appahiinaa, pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa {cetasovinibaddhaa (sii0), cetovinibaddhaa  (saaratthadiipanii.tiikaa)} asamucchinnaa, so vatimasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m  vijjati.
text.642: [03] ``katamaassa pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati  vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati tassa citta.m na namati  aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati  aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo  cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
text.643: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati  vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m  dutiyo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
text.644: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa"nghe ka"nkhati  vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m  tatiyo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
text.645: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaaya ka"nkhati  vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu sikkhaaya ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati ^a^T1.0206^ea^ aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m ^a^V1.0146^ea^ na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m catuttho cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
text.646: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti  anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato, tassa  citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa  citta.m na namati ^a^M1.0146^ea^ aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya,  evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo appahiino hoti. imaassa pa~nca  cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti.
text.647: [03] 186^b^.^eb^ ``katamaassa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa  asamucchinnaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaame aviitaraago {avigataraago  (katthaci)}  hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho  avigatata.nho. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaame aviitaraago hoti  avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho  avigatata.nho, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya  padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
text.648: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye aviitaraago  hoti...pe0... evamassaaya.m dutiyo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno  hoti.
text.649: [03] ``puna ^a^P1.0102^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupe  aviitaraago hoti...pe0... evamassaaya.m tatiyo cetasovinibandho  asamucchinno ^a^T1.0207^ea^ hoti.
text.65: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako --  ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito,  sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme  suviniito -- manasikara.niiye dhamme pajaanaati amanasikara.niiye dhamme  pajaanaati. so manasikara.niiye dhamme pajaananto amanasikara.niiye  dhamme pajaananto ye dhammaa na ^a^P1.0009^ea^ manasikara.niiyaa te  dhamme na manasi karoti, ye dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa te dhamme manasi  karoti.
text.650: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m  bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati. yo  so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m  passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati, tassa citta.m na namati  aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati  aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m catuttho  cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
text.651: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0147^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya  brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa  brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati --  `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa  bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya  anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya ^a^M1.0147^ea^. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya  anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho  asamucchinno hoti. imaassa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa  honti.
text.652: [03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime pa~nca cetokhilaa  appahiinaa, ime pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa, so vatimasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.
text.653: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ ``yassa ^a^T1.0208^ea^ kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca  cetokhilaa pahiinaa, pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa, so  vatimasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti --  .thaanameta.m vijjati.

text.655: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme na ka"nkhati na  vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m dutiyo  cetokhilo pahiino hoti.
text.656: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa"nghe na ka"nkhati na  vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m tatiyo  cetokhilo pahiino hoti.
text.657: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaaya na ka"nkhati na  vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m catuttho  cetokhilo pahiino hoti.
text.658: [03] ``puna ^a^V1.0148^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu na kupito  hoti na anattamano {attamano (sii0 pii0)} anaahatacitto akhilajaato. yo so,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu na kupito hoti na anattamano  anaahatacitto akhilajaato, tassa citta.m namati aatappaaya ^a^P1.0103^ea^  anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m namati  aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m ^a^T1.0209^ea^ pa~ncamo  cetokhilo pahiino hoti. imaassa pa~nca cetokhilaa pahiinaa honti.
text.659: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ ``katamaassa ^a^M1.0148^ea^ pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa  susamucchinnaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaame viitaraago hoti  vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaaso vigatapari.laaho vigatata.nho.  yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaame viitaraago hoti vigatacchando  vigatapemo vigatapipaaso vigatapari.laaho vigatata.nho, tassa citta.m  namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m  namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo  cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
text.66: [03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na  manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno  vaa kaamaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno  vaa bhavaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno  vaa avijjaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pava.d.dhati --  ime dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa, ye dhamme na manasi karoti.
text.660: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye viitaraago  hoti...pe0... ruupe viitaraago hoti...pe0... na yaavadattha.m  udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto  viharati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m  bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati, tassa  citta.m namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m  namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m catuttho  cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
text.661: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na a~n~natara.m  devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa  vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro ^a^T1.0210^ea^  vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m  pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena  vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa  citta.m namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m  namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo  cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti. imaassa pa~nca  cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa honti.
text.662: [03] ``yassa ^a^V1.0149^ea^ kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime pa~nca cetokhilaa  pahiinaa, ime pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa, so vatimasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m  vijjati.
text.663: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ ``so chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m  iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m  bhaaveti, cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^M1.0149^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  usso.lhiiyeva pa~ncamii. sa kho so, bhikkhave, eva.m  usso.lhiipannarasa"ngasamannaagato ^a^P1.0104^ea^ bhikkhu bhabbo  abhinibbidaaya, bhabbo sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa  adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa  vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani sammaa  pariseditaani sammaa paribhaavitaani. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa na  eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vatime kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya  vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m ^a^T1.0211^ea^ padaaletvaa sotthinaa  abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti. atha kho bhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa  paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa  abhinibbhijjitu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, eva.m  usso.lhipannarasa"ngasamannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidaaya, bhabbo  sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaayaa''ti.
text.664: [01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.667: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0150^ea^ ^a^T1.0212^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``vanapatthapariyaaya.m vo,  bhikkhave, desessaami, ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.668: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m vanapattha.m  upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato  anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca ^a^M1.0150^ea^ citta.m na  samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime  pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  kasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m ^a^P1.0105^ea^ -- `aha.m kho ima.m vanapattha.m  upanissaaya viharaami, tassa me ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato  anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na  samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime  pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa ^a^T1.0213^ea^ samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  kasirena samudaagacchantii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa rattibhaaga.m  vaa divasabhaaga.m vaa tamhaa vanapatthaa pakkamitabba.m, na vatthabba.m.
text.669: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m  vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya  viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na  samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime  pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  appakasirena samudaagacchanti. tena ^a^V1.0151^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharaami.  tassa me ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati  na upa.t.thaati asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca  aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa  samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  appakasirena samudaagacchanti. na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito na pi.n.dapaatahetu...pe0... na  senaasanahetu...pe0... na gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito. atha ca pana me ima.m ^a^T1.0214^ea^ vanapattha.m upanissaaya  viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na  samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naamii'ti. tena, bhikkhave,  bhikkhunaa sa"nkhaapi tamhaa vanapatthaa pakkamitabba.m, na vatthabba.m.
text.67: [03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme  manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno  vaa kaamaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pahiiyati;  anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo na uppajjati ^a^T1.0016^ea^, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pahiiyati;  anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo  pahiiyati -- ime dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti.

text.672: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m  upanissaaya viharati ^a^T1.0216^ea^ ...pe0... a~n~natara.m nigama.m upanissaaya  viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m nagara.m upanissaaya viharati...pe0...  a~n~natara.m janapada.m upanissaaya viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m puggala.m  upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato  anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na  samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti,  ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime  pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  kasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharaami.  tassa me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati  na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca  aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa  samudaanetabbaa --  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te  kasirena samudaagacchantii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa rattibhaaga.m  vaa divasabhaaga.m vaa so puggalo anaapucchaa pakkamitabba.m,  naanubandhitabbo.

text.676: [01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.679: [03] 199^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0220^ea^ ^a^V1.0155^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu  viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho bhagavaa  pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m pi.n.daaya  paavisi. kapilavatthusmi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya.  mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa beluvala.t.thikaaya muule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.  da.n.dapaa.nipi kho sakko ja"nghaavihaara.m {ja"nghavihaara.m (ka0)} anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano  yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena  beluvala.t.thikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa da.n.damolubbha  ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho da.n.dapaa.ni sakko bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``ki.mvaadii sama.no kimakkhaayii''ti? ``yathaavaadii  kho, aavuso, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa  pajaaya ^a^M1.0155^ea^ sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha ti.t.thati, yathaa ca  pana kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m braahma.na.m akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m  bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa naanusenti -- eva.mvaadii kho aha.m, aavuso,  evamakkhaayii''ti.
text.68: [03] ``tassa amanasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m amanasikaaraa  manasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m manasikaaraa anuppannaa ceva aasavaa na  uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa pahiiyanti.
text.680: [03] ``eva.m vutte da.n.dapaa.ni sakko siisa.m okampetvaa ^a^P1.0109^ea^,  jivha.m nillaa.letvaa, tivisaakha.m nalaa.tika.m ^a^T1.0221^ea^ nalaa.te vu.t.thaapetvaa  da.n.damolubbha pakkaami.
text.681: [03] 200^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa  vu.t.thito yena nigrodhaaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane  nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaaha.m,  bhikkhave, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m  pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. kapilavatthusmi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami.m divaavihaaraaya.  mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa beluvala.t.thikaaya muule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.m.  da.n.dapaa.nipi kho, bhikkhave, sakko ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano  anuvicaramaano yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa  yena beluvala.t.thikaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa da.n.damolubbha  ekamanta.m ^a^V1.0156^ea^ a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhikkhave, da.n.dapaa.ni sakko  ma.m etadavoca -- `ki.mvaadii sama.no kimakkhaayii'ti?
text.682: [03] ``eva.m vutte aha.m, bhikkhave, da.n.dapaa.ni.m sakka.m etadavoca.m --  yathaavaadii kho, aavuso, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake  sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha  ti.t.thati, yathaa ca pana kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m braahma.na.m  akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa naanusenti -- eva.mvaadii  kho aha.m, aavuso, evamakkhaayii''ti. ``eva.m vutte bhikkhave,  da.n.dapaa.ni sakko siisa.m ^a^T1.0222^ea^ okampetvaa, jivha.m nillaa.letvaa, tivisaakha.m  nalaa.tika.m nalaa.te vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkaamii''ti.
text.683: [03] 201^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``ki.mvaadii pana, bhante, bhagavaa sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake  sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha  ti.t.thati? katha~nca pana, bhante, bhagavanta.m kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m ^a^M1.0156^ea^  braahma.na.m akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa  naanusentii''ti? ``yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa  samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m  ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m, esevanto pa.tighaanusayaana.m,  esevanto di.t.thaanusayaana.m ^a^P1.0110^ea^, esevanto  vicikicchaanusayaana.m, esevanto maanaanusayaana.m, esevanto  bhavaraagaanusayaana.m, esevanto avijjaanusayaana.m, esevanto  da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaada-tuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaana.m.  etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti.  idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.
text.684: [03] 202^b^.^eb^ atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m acirapakkantassa  bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena  uddesa.m uddisitvaa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa, u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m  pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa  samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthtththi abhinanditabba.m ^a^T1.0223^ea^ abhivaditabba.m  ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti ^a^V1.0157^ea^. ko nu  kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti? atha kho tesa.m  bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva  sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa  mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena  attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa  mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m  etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa''ti.
text.685: [03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi.msu.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.  ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavocu.m  -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m  uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho  -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti.  ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m.  esevanto ^a^M1.0157^ea^ raagaanusayaana.m...pe0...  etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti. tesa.m  no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi --  `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena  attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- ``yatonidaana.m,  bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ^a^T1.0224^ea^ ce natthi  abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto  raagaanusayaana.m...pe0...  etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii''ti. ko nu  kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaati? tesa.m no, aavuso  kaccaana, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano  satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti  ^a^P1.0111^ea^ caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ^a^V1.0158^ea^   uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m  vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti.  vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano''ti.
text.686: [03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko  saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato  atikkammeva muula.m, atikkamma khandha.m, saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m  ma~n~neyya; eva.msampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute, ta.m  bhagavanta.m atisitvaa ^a^T1.0225^ea^, amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha. so  haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto  dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto, vattaa pavattaa, atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa,  dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi, ya.m  bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya  tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. ``addhaavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati,  passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto, vattaa pavattaa,  atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa, dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva  panetassa kaalo ahosi, ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama.  yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa  mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m  sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti ^a^M1.0158^ea^ caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa  sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena  attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano agaru.m katvaa''ti {agarukatvaa (sii0),  agarukaritvaa (syaa0 pii0)}.  ``tena haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti.  ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa  paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaakaccaano etadavoca --
text.687: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena  uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m  pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa  samudaacaranti ^a^T1.0226^ea^. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m  ajjhositabba.m, esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti, imassa kho aha.m,  aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami --
text.688: [03] ``cakkhu~ncaavuso, pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m,  ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa ^a^V1.0159^ea^ vedanaa, ya.m vedeti ta.m sa~njaanaati  ^a^P1.0112^ea^, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m vitakketi, ya.m vitakketi ta.m  papa~nceti, ya.m papa~nceti tatonidaana.m purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa  samudaacaranti atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu.  sota~ncaavuso, pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  ghaana~ncaavuso, pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  jivha~ncaavuso, pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...   kaaya~ncaavuso, pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  mana~ncaavuso,  pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso,  phassapaccayaa vedanaa, ya.m vedeti ta.m sa~njaanaati, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m  vitakketi, ya.m vitakketi ta.m papa~nceti, ya.m papa~nceti tatonidaana.m purisa.m  papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu  manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu.
text.689: [01] ``so vataavuso, cakkhusmi.m sati ruupe sati  cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne sati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m  vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa sati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti --  .thaanameta.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa sati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m  pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa sati ^a^M1.0159^ea^  vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.  vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa sati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m  pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. so vataavuso, sotasmi.m sati  sadde sati...pe0... ^a^V1.0160^ea^ ^a^T1.0227^ea^ ghaanasmi.m sati gandhe sati...pe0...   jivhaaya sati rase sati...pe0... kaayasmi.m sati pho.t.thabbe sati...pe0...   manasmi.m sati dhamme sati manovi~n~naa.ne sati  phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa  sati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.  vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa sati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m  vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa sati vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti --  .thaanameta.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa sati  papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m  vijjati.
text.69: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0013^ea^ `ida.m dukkha'nti yoniso manasi  karoti, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yoniso manasi karoti, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yoniso ^a^M1.0012^ea^ manasi karoti, `aya.m  dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yoniso manasi karoti. tassa  eva.m yoniso manasikaroto tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiiyanti --  sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso. ime vuccanti,  bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.690: [01] ``so vataavuso, cakkhusmi.m asati ruupe asati  cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne asati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m  vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa asati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti --  neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa asati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m  pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa asati  vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.  vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa asati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m  pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. so vataavuso, sotasmi.m ^a^T1.0229^ea^  asati sadde asati...pe0... ghaanasmi.m asati gandhe asati...pe0...  jivhaaya asati rase asati...pe0... kaayasmi.m asati pho.t.thabbe  asati...pe0... manasmi.m asati dhamme asati manovi~n~naa.ne ^a^V1.0161^ea^ asati  phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.  phassapa~n~nattiyaa asati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m  vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa asati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti --  neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa asati vitakkapa~n~natti.m  pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa asati  papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m  vijjati.
text.691: [03] ``ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ^a^P1.0113^ea^  uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m  pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa  samudaacaranti ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m  ajjhositabba.m esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa  akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti, imassa kho aha.m,  aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^M1.0160^ea^ sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. aaka"nkhamaanaa ca pana  tumhe aayasmanto bhagavanta.myeva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha.  yathaa no bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.
text.692: [03] 205^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa  bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m  -- ``ya.m kho no, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa  vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho --  `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti.  ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m.  esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0...  etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti. tesa.m  no, bhante, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m  kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- ``yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu,  purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi  abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto  raagaanusayaana.m, esevanto pa.tighaanusayaana.m, esevanto di.t.thaanusayaana.m,  esevanto vicikicchaanusayaana.m, esevanto maanaanusayaana.m, esevanto  bhavaraagaanusayaana.m ^a^V1.0162^ea^, esevanto avijjaanusayaana.m, esevanto  da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaadatuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaana.m.  etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii''ti. ko nu  kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m  avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti? tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m  etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva  sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti caayasmaa  mahaakaccaano ^a^T1.0230^ea^ imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena  attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa  mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m  etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa  mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^M1.0161^ea^ mahaakaccaana.m  ^a^P1.0114^ea^ etamattha.m pa.tipucchimha. tesa.m no, bhante,  aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi  bya~njanehi attho vibhatto''ti. ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano;  mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave,  etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ta.m evameva.m byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m  mahaakaccaanena byaakata.m. eso cevetassa attho. eva~nca {evemeva ca (ka0)} na.m  dhaarethaa''ti.
text.693: [03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``seyyathaapi, bhante, puriso jighacchaadubbalyapareto madhupi.n.dika.m  adhigaccheyya, so yato yato saayeyya, labhetheva saadurasa.m asecanaka.m.  evameva kho, bhante, cetaso bhikkhu dabbajaatiko, yato yato imassa  dhammapariyaayassa pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkheyya, labhetheva attamanata.m,  labhetheva cetaso pasaada.m. ko naamo aya.m {ko naamaaya.m (syaa0)}, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti?  ``tasmaatiha tva.m, aananda, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m madhupi.n.dikapariyaayo  tveva na.m dhaarehii''ti.
text.694: [03] idamavoca ^a^T1.0231^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.697: [03] 206^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0163^ea^ ^a^T1.0232^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.698: [03] ``pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa  bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m dvidhaa katvaa dvidhaa  katvaa vitakke vihareyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, yo caaya.m  kaamavitakko yo ca byaapaadavitakko yo ca vihi.msaavitakko -- ima.m  eka.m bhaagamakaasi.m ^a^M1.0162^ea^; yo caaya.m nekkhammavitakko yo ca  abyaapaadavitakko yo ca avihi.msaavitakko -- ima.m dutiya.m bhaagamakaasi.m.
text.699: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati ^a^P1.0115^ea^  kaamavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m  kaamavitakko. so ca kho attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'  {anibbaanasa.mvattaniko''ti (?)}.  `attabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato  abbhattha.m gacchati; `parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave,  pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi  me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; ^a^T1.0233^ea^ `pa~n~naanirodhiko  vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'tipi me, bhikkhave,  pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  uppannuppanna.m kaamavitakka.m pajahameva {atiitakaalikakiriyaapadaaniyeva} vinodameva  {atiitakaalikakiriyaapadaaniyeva} byantameva {byanteva (sii0  syaa0 pii0)} na.m akaasi.m.
text.7: [03] ``aapa.m aapato sa~njaanaati; aapa.m aapato sa~n~natvaa aapa.m  ma~n~nati, aapasmi.m ma~n~nati, aapato ma~n~nati, aapa.m meti ma~n~nati,  aapa.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti  vadaami.
text.700: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati byaapaadavitakko...pe0...  uppajjati vihi.msaavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me  aya.m vihi.msaavitakko. so ca kho attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V1.0164^ea^ sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'.  `attabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato  abbhattha.m gacchati; `parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave,  pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi  me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `pa~n~naanirodhiko  vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'tipi me, bhikkhave,  pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  uppannuppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m pajahameva vinodameva byantameva na.m akaasi.m.
text.701: [03] ``ya~n~nadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi  anuvicaareti, tathaa tathaa nati hoti cetaso. kaamavitakka.m ce,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi ^a^M1.0163^ea^ anuvicaareti, pahaasi  nekkhammavitakka.m, kaamavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa ta.m ^a^T1.0234^ea^ kaamavitakkaaya  citta.m namati. byaapaadavitakka.m ce, bhikkhave...pe0... vihi.msaavitakka.m  ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, pahaasi  avihi.msaavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa ta.m  vihi.msaavitakkaaya citta.m namati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vassaana.m  pacchime maase saradasamaye ki.t.thasambaadhe gopaalako gaavo rakkheyya.  so taa gaavo tato tato da.n.dena aako.teyya pa.tiko.teyya sannirundheyya  sannivaareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? passati hi so, bhikkhave,  gopaalako tatonidaana.m vadha.m vaa bandhana.m vaa jaani.m vaa garaha.m vaa.  evameva kho aha.m, bhikkhave, addasa.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m  okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m.
text.702: [03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^P1.0116^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave,  eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati  nekkhammavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m  nekkhammavitakko. so ca kho nevattabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na  parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, pa~n~naavuddhiko  avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko'. ratti.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave,  anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami.  divasa.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva  tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. rattindiva.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave,  anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami.  api ca kho me aticira.m anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato kaayo  kilameyya ^a^V1.0165^ea^. kaaye kilante {kilamante (ka0)} citta.m ^a^T1.0235^ea^ uuha~n~neyya. uuhate citte aaraa  citta.m samaadhimhaati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva citta.m  sa.n.thapemi sannisaademi ekodi.m karomi {ekodi karomi (pii0)} samaadahaami. ta.m kissa hetu?  `maa me citta.m uuha~n~nii'ti {ugghaa.tiiti (syaa0 ka0), uuhaniiti (pii0)}.
text.703: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati abyaapaadavitakko...pe0...  uppajjati avihi.msaavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho  me aya.m avihi.msaavitakko. so ca kho nevattabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati,  na parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ^a^M1.0164^ea^ sa.mvattati,  pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko'. ratti.m cepi na.m,  bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m  samanupassaami. divasa.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m  anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. rattindiva.m cepi  na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m  samanupassaami. api ca kho me aticira.m anuvitakkayato  anuvicaarayato kaayo kilameyya. kaaye kilante citta.m uuha~n~neyya.  uuhate citte aaraa citta.m samaadhimhaati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapemi, sannisaademi, ekodi.m karomi  samaadahaami. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me citta.m uuha~n~nii'ti.
text.704: [03] ``ya~n~nadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi  anuvicaareti, tathaa tathaa nati hoti cetaso. nekkhammavitakka~nce,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, pahaasi ^a^T1.0236^ea^  kaamavitakka.m, nekkhammavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa.m ta.m nekkhammavitakkaaya  citta.m namati. abyaapaadavitakka~nce, bhikkhave...pe0...  avihi.msaavitakka~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi  anuvicaareti, pahaasi vihi.msaavitakka.m, avihi.msaavitakka.m bahulamakaasi,  tassa ta.m avihi.msaavitakkaaya citta.m namati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave,  gimhaana.m pacchime maase sabbasassesu gaamantasambhatesu gopaalako gaavo  rakkheyya ^a^P1.0117^ea^, tassa rukkhamuulagatassa vaa  abbhokaasagatassa vaa satikara.niiyameva hoti -- `etaa {ete (ka0)} gaavo'ti.  evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, satikara.niiyameva ahosi -- `ete dhammaa'ti.
text.705: [03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``aaraddha.m kho pana me, bhikkhave, viiriya.m  ahosi asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa ^a^V1.0166^ea^, passaddho kaayo  asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m  vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  vihaasi.m. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m sato ca  sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi.m, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti  `upekkhako satimaa ^a^M1.0165^ea^ sukhavihaarii'ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  vihaasi.m. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.
text.706: [03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so  anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. seyyathida.m, ekampi  jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussaraami. aya.m kho ^a^T1.0237^ea^ me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa  vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato  aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa  viharato.
text.707: [03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami  cavamaane upapajjamaane...pe0... ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena  samannaagataa...pe0... iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. aya.m  kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa;  avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno; yathaa  ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.
text.708: [03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so  `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti  yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m  abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  abbha~n~naasi.m ^a^M1.0166^ea^. `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m  aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m ^a^V1.0167^ea^ aasavanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m ^a^T1.0238^ea^ aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti  yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato  kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha,  avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m  ahosi -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m,  naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa  pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa  uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato.
text.709: [03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ara~n~ne pavane mahanta.m  ninna.m pallala.m. tamena.m mahaamigasa"ngho upanissaaya vihareyya. tassa  kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakaamo ahitakaamo  ayogakkhemakaamo. so yvaassa maggo khemo sovatthiko  piitigamaniiyo ta.m magga.m pidaheyya, vivareyya kummagga.m, odaheyya  okacara.m, .thapeyya okacaarika.m. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave,  mahaamigasa"ngho aparena samayena ^a^T1.0239^ea^ anayabyasana.m {anayabyasana.m tanutta.m (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} aapajjeyya. tasseva  kho pana, bhikkhave, mahato migasa"nghassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya  atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamo. so yvaassa maggo khemo  sovatthiko piitigamaniiyo ta.m magga.m vivareyya, pidaheyya kummagga.m,  uuhaneyya okacara.m, naaseyya okacaarika.m. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave,  mahaamigasa"ngho aparena samayena vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyya.
text.71: [03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso  cakkhundriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. ya~nhissa, bhikkhave,  cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa  vighaatapari.laahaa, cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te  aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso  sotindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... ghaanindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto  viharati...pe0... jivhindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0...  kaayindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... manindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto  viharati. ya~nhissa, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0017^ea^, manindriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato  uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, manindriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato  eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti.
text.710: [03] ``upamaa kho me aya.m, bhikkhave, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya  ^a^P1.0118^ea^. aya.m cevettha attho -- mahanta.m ninna.m pallalanti  kho, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. mahaamigasa"nghoti kho,  bhikkhave, sattaanameta.m adhivacana.m. puriso anatthakaamo ahitakaamo  ayogakkhemakaamoti kho, bhikkhave, maarasseta.m paapimato adhivacana.m.  kummaggoti kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngikasseta.m micchaamaggassa adhivacana.m,  seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thiyaa micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacaaya  micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamassa micchaasatiyaa  micchaasamaadhissa. okacaroti kho, bhikkhave, nandiiraagasseta.m  adhivacana.m. okacaarikaati ^a^M1.0167^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m.  puriso atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamoti kho, bhikkhave,  tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. khemo maggo  sovatthiko piitigamaniiyoti kho ^a^V1.0168^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasseta.m a.t.tha"ngikassa  maggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thiyaa sammaasa"nkappassa  sammaavaacaaya sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamassa  sammaasatiyaa sammaasamaadhissa.
text.711: [03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, viva.to mayaa khemo maggo sovatthiko  piitigamaniiyo, pihito kummaggo, uuhato okacaro, naasitaa  okacaarikaa. ya.m, bhikkhave, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa  anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani,  bhikkhave ^a^T1.0240^ea^, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani; jhaayatha, bhikkhave,  maa pamaadattha; maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m  anusaasanii''ti.
text.712: [01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.715: [03] 216^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0241^ea^ ^a^V1.0169^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti ^a^P1.0119^ea^  te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.716: [03] ``adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa pa~nca nimittaani  kaalena kaala.m manasi kaatabbaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto  uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi  mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m  nimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m. tassa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m  nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m ye paapakaa akusalaa ^a^M1.0168^ea^ vitakkaa  chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te  abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati  sannisiidati ekodi hoti {ekodibhoti (syaa0 ka0)} samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave,  dakkho palaga.n.do vaa palaga.n.dantevaasii vaa sukhumaaya aa.niyaa  o.laarika.m aa.ni.m abhinihaneyya abhiniihareyya abhinivatteyya {abhinivajjeyya  (sii0 pii0)}; evameva  kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m  manasikaroto uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^T1.0242^ea^ mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tamhaa  nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m. tassa tamhaa  nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m ye paapakaa  akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te  pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m  santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.
text.717: [03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tamhaa  nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m uppajjanteva  paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi  mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinavo  upaparikkhitabbo -- `itipime vitakkaa akusalaa, itipime vitakkaa  saavajjaa, itipime vitakkaa ^a^V1.0170^ea^ dukkhavipaakaa'ti. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m  aadiinava.m upaparikkhato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo  yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko ahiku.napena vaa kukkuraku.napena vaa  manussaku.napena ^a^P1.0120^ea^ vaa ka.n.the aasattena a.t.tiyeyya  haraayeyya jiguccheyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno  tamhaapi nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m ^a^T1.0243^ea^ manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m  uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi  mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinavo  upaparikkhitabbo -- `itipime vitakkaa akusalaa, itipime ^a^M1.0169^ea^ vitakkaa  saavajjaa, itipime vitakkaa dukkhavipaakaa'ti. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m  aadiinava.m upaparikkhato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati.
text.718: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi  vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m upaparikkhato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa  vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena,  bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaaro aapajjitabbo.  tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m aapajjato ye paapakaa  akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te  pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m  santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi,  bhikkhave, cakkhumaa puriso aapaathagataana.m ruupaana.m adassanakaamo  assa; so nimiileyya vaa a~n~nena vaa apalokeyya. evameva kho,  bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m  upaparikkhato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati.
text.719: [03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0244^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi  vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m aapajjato ^a^V1.0171^ea^ uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa  vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena,  bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m  manasikaatabba.m. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m  manasikaroto ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso siigha.m gaccheyya. tassa  evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m siigha.m gacchaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m sa.nika.m  gaccheyya'nti. so sa.nika.m gaccheyya. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu  kho aha.m sa.nika.m gacchaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m ti.t.theyya'nti. so ti.t.theyya ^a^M1.0170^ea^.  tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m .thito? ya.mnuunaaha.m  nisiideyya'nti. so nisiideyya. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho  aha.m nisinno? ya.mnuunaaha.m nipajjeyya'nti. so nipajjeyya. eva~nhi  so, bhikkhave, puriso o.laarika.m o.laarika.m iriyaapatha.m  abhinivajjetvaa {abhinissajjetvaa (syaa0)} sukhuma.m sukhuma.m iriyaapatha.m kappeyya. evameva kho,  bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m  aapajjato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati.
text.72: [03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, sa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m  aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa ^a^P1.0010^ea^, sa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato  eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti,  bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa.
text.720: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0245^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi  vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaroto uppajjanteva paapakaa  akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi.  tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa dantebhidantamaadhaaya {dante + abhidanta.m + aadhaayaati  .tiikaaya.m padacchedo, dantebhiiti panettha kara.nattho yutto viya dissati} jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca  cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhitabba.m abhinippii.letabba.m abhisantaapetabba.m  ^a^P1.0121^ea^. tassa dantebhidantamaadhaaya jivhaaya taalu.m  aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato  abhisantaapayato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi  dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti.  tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti  samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, balavaa puriso dubbalatara.m purisa.m  siise vaa gale vaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa abhinigga.nheyya abhinippii.leyya  abhisantaapeyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi  vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaroto uppajjanteva paapakaa  akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi.  tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa dantebhidantamaadhaaya ^a^V1.0172^ea^ jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca  cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhitabba.m abhinippii.letabba.m abhisantaapetabba.m.  tassa dantebhidantamaadhaaya jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m  abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato abhisantaapayato ye paapakaa  akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^T1.0246^ea^ mohuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^M1.0171^ea^ te  pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m  santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.

text.722: [01] idamavoca ^a^M1.0172^ea^ ^a^V1.0173^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
text.730: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0248^ea^ ^a^M1.0173^ea^ ^a^V1.0174^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati.  eva.m sa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati  -- sace koci bhikkhu aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa sammukhaa taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno kupito  anattamano adhikara.nampi karoti. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m sammukhaa aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati,  tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti.  eva.m sa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati.  atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante,  mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati. eva.m  sa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati  -- sace koci bhikkhu aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa sammukhaa taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno kupito  anattamano ^a^T1.0249^ea^ adhikara.nampi karoti. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m sammukhaa aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati,  tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti.  eva.m sa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m  viharatii''ti.
text.731: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi  -- ``ehi tva.m ^a^P1.0123^ea^, bhikkhu, mama vacanena  mo.liyaphagguna.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso phagguna,  aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^V1.0175^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato  pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  aayasmanta.m mo.liyaphagguna.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso  phagguna, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa  mo.liyaphagguno tassa ^a^M1.0174^ea^ bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mo.liyaphagguna.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.732: [03] ``sacca.m kira tva.m, phagguna, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m  sa.msa.t.tho viharasi? eva.m sa.msa.t.tho kira tva.m, phagguna, bhikkhuniihi  saddhi.m viharasi -- sace koci bhikkhu tuyha.m sammukhaa taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena tva.m kupito anattamano  adhikara.nampi karosi. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m  sammukhaa tuyha.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa  anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho kira tva.m, phagguna,  bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``nanu tva.m,  phagguna, kulaputto saddhaa ^a^T1.0250^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti?  ``eva.m, bhante''ti.
text.733: [03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``na kho te eta.m, phagguna, patiruupa.m  kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa, ya.m tva.m  bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho vihareyyaasi. tasmaatiha,  phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaaseyya,  tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye gehasitaa {gehassitaa (?)} chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te  pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva me  citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami,  hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi  te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.
text.734: [03] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa taasa.m  bhikkhuniina.m paa.ninaa pahaara.m dadeyya, le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dadeyya, da.n.dena  pahaara.m dadeyya, satthena pahaara.m dadeyya. tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye  gehasitaa chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te,  phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati,  na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami  mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.
text.735: [03] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa ava.n.na.m  bhaaseyya, tatraapi tva.m, phagguna ^a^V1.0176^ea^, ye gehasitaa chandaa ye gehasitaa  vitakkaa te ^a^M1.0175^ea^ pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m `na  ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m  nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na  dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi ^a^T1.0251^ea^ te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.
text.736: [01] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci paa.ninaa pahaara.m  dadeyya, le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dadeyya, da.n.dena pahaara.m dadeyya, satthena pahaara.m  ^a^P1.0124^ea^ dadeyya, tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye gehasitaa chandaa  ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m  sikkhitabba.m `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m  vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na  dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi te, phagguna, sikkhitabba''nti.
text.737: [03] 225^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``aaraadhayi.msu vata me, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu eka.m samaya.m citta.m.  idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu aamantesi.m -- aha.m kho, bhikkhave,  ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njaami. ekaasanabhojana.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  bhu~njamaano appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~nca. etha tumhepi, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njatha.  ekaasanabhojana.m kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca  sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaati.  na me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhuusu anusaasanii kara.niiyaa ahosi;  satuppaadakara.niiyameva me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhuusu ahosi.
text.738: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe aaja~n~naratho  yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo. tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo  assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa, vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa,  dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa, yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m ^a^T1.0252^ea^ saareyyapi  paccaasaareyyapi. evameva kho, bhikkhave, na me tesu bhikkhuusu  anusaasanii kara.niiyaa ahosi, satuppaadakara.niiyameva me, bhikkhave,  tesu bhikkhuusu ahosi. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusala.m  pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu aayoga.m karotha. eva~nhi tumhepi imasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatha.
text.739: [01] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0176^ea^ ^a^V1.0177^ea^, bhikkhave, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa  aviduure mahanta.m saalavana.m. ta~ncassa e.la.n.dehi sa~nchanna.m. tassa  kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamo.  so yaa taa saalala.t.thiyo ku.tilaa ojaapahara.niyo {ojahara.niyo (ka0)} taa chetvaa  {tacchetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bahiddhaa  niihareyya, antovana.m suvisodhita.m visodheyya. yaa pana taa  saalala.t.thiyo ujukaa sujaataa taa sammaa parihareyya. eva~nheta.m,  bhikkhave, saalavana.m aparena samayena vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyya.  evameva kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusala.m pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu  aayoga.m karotha. eva~nhi ^a^P1.0125^ea^ tumhepi imasmi.m  dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatha.
text.74: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ciivara.m  pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya,  .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapa- {siri.msapa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} samphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva  hirikopiinappa.ticchaadanattha.m'.
text.740: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, imissaayeva saavatthiyaa  vedehikaa naama gahapataanii ahosi. vedehikaaya, bhikkhave,  gahapataaniyaa eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sorataa  vedehikaa gahapataanii, nivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, upasantaa vedehikaa  gahapataanii'ti. vedehikaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, gahapataaniyaa kaa.lii  naama daasii ahosi dakkhaa analasaa ^a^T1.0253^ea^ susa.mvihitakammantaa.
text.741: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.liyaa daasiyaa etadahosi --  `mayha.m kho ayyaaya eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- ``sorataa  vedehikaa gahapataanii, nivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, upasantaa vedehikaa  gahapataanii''ti. ki.m nu kho me ayyaa santa.myeva nu kho ajjhatta.m  kopa.m na paatukaroti udaahu asanta.m udaahu mayhamevete {mayhevete (sii0 pii0)} kammantaa  susa.mvihitaa yena me ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti,  no asanta.m? ya.mnuunaaha.m ayya.m viima.mseyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave,  kaa.lii daasii divaa u.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa  gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m etadavoca -- `he je kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m,  ayye'ti? `ki.m, je, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye {na kho ayye (sii0  pii0)}, ki~ncii'ti.  `no vata re ki~nci, paapi daasi {paapadaasi (syaa0 ka0)}, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa  anattamanaa bhaaku.ti.m {bhuuku.ti.m (sii0 pii0), bhaku.tii.m (syaa0)} akaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave,   kaa.liyaa daasiyaa ^a^M1.0177^ea^  etadahosi -- `santa.myeva kho me ayyaa ajjhatta.m kopa.m na  paatukaroti, no asanta.m; mayhamevete kammantaa susa.mvihitaa, yena me  ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m  bhiyyosomattaaya ayya.m viima.mseyya'''nti.
text.742: [01] ``atha ^a^V1.0178^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii divaatara.myeva  u.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m  etadavoca -- `he je, kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m, ayye'ti? `ki.m, je,  divaatara.m u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye, ki~ncii'ti. `no vata re  ki~nci, paapi daasi, divaatara.m ^a^T1.0254^ea^ u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa anattamanaa  anattamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi. atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.liyaa daasiyaa  etadahosi -- `santa.myeva kho me ayyaa ajjhatta.m kopa.m na  paatukaroti, no asanta.m. mayhamevete kammantaa susa.mvihitaa, yena me  ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m  bhiyyosomattaaya ayya.m viima.mseyya'nti.
text.743: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii divaatara.myeva u.t.thaasi.  atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m etadavoca  ^a^P1.0126^ea^ -- `he je, kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m, ayye'ti? `ki.m,  je, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye, ki~ncii'ti. `no vata re  ki~nci, paapi daasi, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa anattamanaa  agga.lasuuci.m gahetvaa siise pahaara.m adaasi, siisa.m vobhindi {vi + ava +  bhindi = vobhindi}. atha  kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii bhinnena siisena lohitena galantena  pa.tivissakaana.m ujjhaapesi -- `passathayye, sorataaya kamma.m;  passathayye, nivaataaya kamma.m, passathayye, upasantaaya kamma.m! katha~nhi  naama ekadaasikaaya divaa u.t.thaasiiti kupitaa anattamanaa agga.lasuuci.m  gahetvaa siise pahaara.m dassati, siisa.m vobhindissatii'ti.
text.744: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaaya gahapataaniyaa aparena  samayena eva.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchi -- `ca.n.dii vedehikaa  gahapataanii, anivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, anupasantaa vedehikaa  gahapataanii'ti.
text.745: [03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu taavadeva  soratasorato hoti nivaatanivaato ^a^T1.0255^ea^ hoti upasantuupasanto hoti yaava  na amanaapaa vacanapathaa phusanti. yato ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ^a^M1.0178^ea^  amanaapaa vacanapathaa phusanti, atha bhikkhu `sorato'ti veditabbo,  `nivaato'ti veditabbo, `upasanto'ti veditabbo. naaha.m ta.m,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m `suvaco'ti vadaami yo  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu suvaco  hoti, sovacassata.m aapajjati. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m ^a^V1.0179^ea^ alabhamaano na  suvaco hoti, na sovacassata.m aapajjati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave,  bhikkhu dhamma.myeva sakkaronto, dhamma.m garu.m karonto, dhamma.m maanento,  dhamma.m puujento, dhamma.m apacaayamaano {dhamma.m yeva sakkaronto dhamma.m garukaronto dhamma.m  apacaayamaano (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} suvaco hoti, sovacassata.m  aapajjati, tamaha.m `suvaco'ti vadaami. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave,  `dhamma.myeva sakkarontaa, dhamma.m garu.m karontaa, dhamma.m maanentaa, dhamma.m  puujentaa, dhamma.m apacaayamaanaa suvacaa bhavissaama, sovacassata.m  aapajjissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.746: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, vacanapathaa yehi vo pare  vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m -- kaalena vaa akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa;  sa.nhena vaa pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa;  mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa. kaalena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa  vadeyyu.m akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m  abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa;  atthasa.mhitena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena   ^a^P1.0127^ea^ vaa ^a^T1.0256^ea^; mettacittaa vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m  dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na  ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m  nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa, na dosantaraa.  ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama,  tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cittena vipulena  mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena {abyaapajjhena (sii0 syaa0 pii0),  abyaapajjena (ka0) a"nguttaratikanipaata.tiikaa oloketabbaa} pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti.  eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.747: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya  kudaalapi.taka.m {kuddaalapi.taka.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m ima.m mahaapathavi.m  apathavi.m karissaamii'ti ^a^M1.0179^ea^. so tatra tatra vikha.neyya {kha.neyya (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}, tatra tatra  vikireyya, tatra tatra o.t.thubheyya, tatra tatra omutteyya -- `apathavii  bhavasi, apathavii bhavasii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu  so puriso ima.m mahaapathavi.m apathavi.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m,  bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``aya~nhi, bhante, mahaapathavii  gambhiiraa appameyyaa. saa na sukaraa apathavii kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana  so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva  kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m --  kaalena vaa akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa pharusena  vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa.  kaalena vaa ^a^V1.0180^ea^, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m akaalena ^a^T1.0257^ea^ vaa; bhuutena  vaa bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa,  bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa,  bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa,  bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo,  bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m  bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca  viharissaama mettacittaa na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena  cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama, tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m  pathavisamena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena  abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave,  sikkhitabba.m.
text.748: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya  laakha.m vaa haliddi.m vaa niila.m vaa ma~nji.t.tha.m vaa aadaaya. so eva.m  vadeyya -- `aha.m imasmi.m aakaase ruupa.m likhissaami, ruupapaatubhaava.m  karissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso  imasmi.m aakaase ruupa.m likheyya, ruupapaatubhaava.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no  heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``aya~nhi, bhante, aakaaso  aruupii anidassano. tattha na sukara.m ruupa.m likhitu.m, ruupapaatubhaava.m  kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana ^a^P1.0128^ea^ so puriso kilamathassa  vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime  vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa akaalena  vaa ^a^T1.0258^ea^ ...pe0... `na ceva... tadaaramma.na~nca ^a^M1.0180^ea^ sabbaavanta.m loka.m aakaasasamena cetasaa  vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa  viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.749: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya  aaditta.m ti.nukka.m aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m imaaya  aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya ga"nga.m nadi.m santaapessaami sa.mparitaapessaamii'ti.  ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya  ga"nga.m nadi.m santaapeyya sa.mparitaapeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``ga"ngaa hi, bhante, nadii gambhiiraa appameyyaa.  saa na sukaraa aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya santaapetu.m sa.mparitaapetu.m; yaavadeva  ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti.  ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa  vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa akaalena ^a^V1.0181^ea^ vaa...pe0... `na ceva... tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m  loka.m ga"ngaasamena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena  abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa''ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave,  sikkhitabba.m.
