text.75: [03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevati -- `neva davaaya,  na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na ^a^V1.0014^ea^ vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa  .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa, brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti  puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami nava~nca ^a^M1.0013^ea^ vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa  ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro ca' {caati (sii0)}.
text.750: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, bi.laarabhastaa madditaa  sumadditaa suparimadditaa, mudukaa tuulinii chinnasassaraa chinnabhabbharaa.  atha puriso aagaccheyya ka.t.tha.m vaa kathala.m {ka.thala.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaa aadaaya. so eva.m  vadeyya -- `aha.m ima.m bi.laarabhasta.m maddita.m sumaddita.m suparimaddita.m,  muduka.m tuulini.m, chinnasassara.m chinnabhabbhara.m ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa  sarasara.m karissaami bharabhara.m karissaamii'ti ^a^T1.0259^ea^. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha,  bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amu.m bi.laarabhasta.m maddita.m sumaddita.m  suparimaddita.m, muduka.m tuulini.m, chinnasassara.m chinnabhabbhara.m ka.t.thena vaa  kathalena vaa sarasara.m kareyya, bharabhara.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m,  bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, bi.laarabhastaa  madditaa sumadditaa suparimadditaa, mudukaa tuulinii, chinnasassaraa  chinnabhabbharaa. saa na sukaraa ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sarasara.m kaatu.m  bharabhara.m kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa  bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa  yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa ^a^P1.0129^ea^  akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena ^a^M1.0181^ea^ vaa pharusena vaa;  atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa.  kaalena vaa bhikkhave pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa,  bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa, bhikkhave,  pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa, bhikkhave, pare  vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa, bhikkhave, pare  vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave, eva.m  sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca  paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa  na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa  viharissaama, tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m bi.laarabhastaasamena  cetasaa ^a^T1.0260^ea^ vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa  viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.751: [03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena  coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m, tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya,  na me so tena saasanakaro. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0182^ea^, eva.m  sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca  paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa  na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa  viharissaama tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa  vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa  viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.
text.752: [03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``ima~nca {ima~nce (?)} tumhe, bhikkhave, kakacuupama.m ovaada.m  abhikkha.na.m manasi kareyyaatha. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m  vacanapatha.m, a.nu.m vaa thuula.m vaa, ya.m tumhe naadhivaaseyyaathaa''ti? ``no  heta.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ima.m kakacuupama.m ovaada.m  abhikkha.na.m manasikarotha. ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya  sukhaayaa''ti.
text.753: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.756: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0261^ea^ ^a^M1.0182^ea^ ^a^V1.0183^ea^ ^a^P1.0130^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame.  tena kho pana samayena ari.t.thassa naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa  {gandhabaadhipubbassa (ka0)}  evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m  desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te  pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu  -- ``ari.t.thassa kira naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m  paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami  yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m  antaraayaayaa'''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu  gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m  gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha,  evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m  aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato  naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. ``eva.mbyaakho {eva.m kho (?) bhagavato sammukhaayevassa  ``eva.mbyaakho''ti} aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m  desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa  te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.
text.757: [01] atha kho tepi bhikkhuu ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m  etasmaa ^a^T1.0262^ea^ paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa samanuyu~njanti samanugaahanti  {samanuggaahanti (syaa0)}  samanubhaasanti -- ``maa heva.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m  abbhaacikkhi; na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m {abbhaacikkhana.m (ka0)}, na hi bhagavaa eva.m  vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa  antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya.  appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,aadiinavo ettha  bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa  vuttaa bhagavataa... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa  kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... yaacitakuupamaa  kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...  asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...  sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa ^a^M1.0183^ea^ bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,  aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti. evampi kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu  gaddhabaadhipubbo ^a^V1.0184^ea^ tehi bhikkhuuhi samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano  {samanuggaahiyamaano (syaa0 vinayepi)}  samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva {tatheva ta.m (vinaye)} paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa  abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m  desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te  pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.
text.758: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ yato kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu ari.t.tha.m  bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m ^a^T1.0263^ea^ ^a^P1.0131^ea^ etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa  vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``ari.t.thassa naama,  bhante, bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m --  `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa  dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. assumha  kho maya.m, bhante -- `ari.t.thassa kira naama bhikkhuno  gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa  dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa  bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. atha kho maya.m,  bhante, yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkamimha;  upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocumha -- `sacca.m  kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m  bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa  vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti?
text.759: [03] ``eva.m vutte, bhante, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo amhe  etadavoca -- `eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m  aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te  pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, ari.t.tha.m  bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa  samanuyu~njimha samanugaahimha samanubhaasimha ^a^T1.0264^ea^ -- `maa heva.m, aavuso  ari.t.tha, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi; na hi saadhu bhagavato  abbhakkhaana.m ^a^M1.0184^ea^, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso  ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, ala~nca pana  te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa  bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa  kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa  bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evampi kho,  bhante, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo amhehi samanuyu~njiyamaano  samanugaahiyamaano ^a^V1.0185^ea^ samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa  paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- `eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso,  bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa  vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. yato kho maya.m,  bhante, naasakkhimha ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa  di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha maya.m etamattha.m bhagavato aarocemaa''ti.
text.76: [03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso senaasana.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva  siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya,  .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva  utuparissayavinodanapa.tisallaanaaraamattha.m'.
text.760: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi  -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m  aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m  ^a^P1.0132^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa,  yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m  bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ^a^T1.0265^ea^ ta.m, aavuso ari.t.tha,  aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu  gaddhabaadhipubbo tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m bhagavaa etadavoca --  ``sacca.m kira te, ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m  bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa  bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti?
text.761: [03] ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami  -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m  antaraayaayaa'''ti. ``kassa kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m  dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena  antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa? ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato  antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,  aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...  ma.msapesuupamaa ^a^M1.0185^ea^ kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...  a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...  yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...  asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...  sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo  ettha bhiyyo. atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena ^a^T1.0266^ea^  amhe ceva abbhaacikkhasi, attaana~nca khanasi, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m  pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya  dukkhaayaa''ti.
text.762: [03] atha ^a^V1.0186^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha,  bhikkhave, api naaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo usmiikatopi  imasmi.m dhammavinaye''ti? ``ki~nhi {ki.mti (ka0)} siyaa, bhante; no heta.m,  bhante''ti. eva.m vutte, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tu.nhiibhuuto  ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi.  atha kho bhagavaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m  pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m  gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavoca -- ``pa~n~naayissasi kho tva.m, moghapurisa,  etena sakena paapakena di.t.thigatena. idhaaha.m bhikkhuu  pa.tipucchissaamii''ti.
text.763: [03] 237^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``tumhepi me, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0133^ea^, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m  aajaanaatha yathaaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo attanaa duggahitena  amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca khanati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m  pasavatii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. anekapariyaayena hi no, bhante,  antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa; ala~nca pana te  pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa  bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa  bhagavataa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa  bahupaayaasaa ^a^T1.0267^ea^, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave,  saadhu, kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha.  anekapariyaayena hi kho, bhikkhave, antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa mayaa,  ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa  mayaa ^a^M1.0186^ea^, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo.  a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa  mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca  panaaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva  abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca khanati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. ta~nhi  tassa moghapurisassa bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. so  vata, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra kaamasa~n~naaya a~n~natra  kaamavitakkehi kaame pa.tisevissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati''.
text.764: [03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m  pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m,  jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m  dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya  attha.m anupaparikkhata.m ^a^V1.0187^ea^ na nijjhaana.m khamanti. te upaarambhaanisa.msaa  ceva dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa  catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m ^a^T1.0268^ea^ naanubhonti. tesa.m te  dhammaa duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa  hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m.
text.765: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii  alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano. so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m. tamena.m  bhoge vaa na"ngu.t.the vaa ga.nheyya. tassa so alagaddo pa.tiparivattitvaa  {pa.tinivattitvaa (syaa0 ka0)}  hatthe vaa baahaaya vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a"ngapacca"nge .da.mseyya {.daseyya (sii0 pii0)}. so  tatonidaana.m ^a^P1.0134^ea^ mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa  dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, alagaddassa.  evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti --  sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m,  abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m  pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m  anupaparikkhata.m na nijjhaana.m khamanti. te upaarambhaanisa.msaa ceva  dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa catthaaya  dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa  duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu?  duggahitattaa bhikkhave dhammaana.m.
text.766: [03] 239^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M1.0187^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacce kulaputtaa dhamma.m  pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m,  jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m  dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m  upaparikkhata.m nijjhaana.m ^a^T1.0269^ea^ khamanti. te na ceva upaarambhaanisa.msaa dhamma.m  pariyaapu.nanti na itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca {na ca itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa  (?)}. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m  pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m anubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa suggahitaa  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa  bhikkhave dhammaana.m.
text.767: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii  alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano. so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m. tamena.m  ajapadena da.n.dena suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya. ajapadena da.n.dena  suniggahita.m niggahitvaa, giivaaya suggahita.m ga.nheyya. ki~ncaapi so,  bhikkhave ^a^V1.0188^ea^, alagaddo tassa purisassa hattha.m vaa baaha.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa  a"ngapacca"nga.m bhogehi palive.theyya, atha kho so neva tatonidaana.m mara.na.m  vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa,  bhikkhave, alagaddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce kulaputtaa  dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m,  itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa  tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya  attha.m upaparikkhata.m nijjhaana.m khamanti. te na ceva upaarambhaanisa.msaa  dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, na itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa  catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, ta~ncassa attha.m anubhonti. tesa.m te  dhammaa suggahitaa diigharatta.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m  kissa hetu? suggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m. tasmaatiha,  bhikkhave, yassa ^a^T1.0270^ea^ me bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyyaatha, tathaa na.m  dhaareyyaatha. yassa ca pana me bhaasitassa attha.m na aajaaneyyaatha, aha.m  vo tattha pa.tipucchitabbo, ye vaa panaassu viyattaa bhikkhuu.
text.768: [03] 240^b^.^eb^ ``kulluupama.m vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desessaami  nitthara.natthaaya, no gaha.natthaaya. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0188^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso  addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. so passeyya mahanta.m udaka.n.nava.m, orima.m tiira.m  saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m; na cassa naavaa  santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. tassa evamassa  ^a^P1.0135^ea^ -- `aya.m kho mahaaudaka.n.navo, orima.m tiira.m  saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m; natthi ca naavaa  santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. ya.mnuunaaha.m  ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa, kulla.m bandhitvaa, ta.m kulla.m nissaaya  hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m uttareyya'nti. atha  kho so, bhikkhave, puriso ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa, kulla.m  bandhitvaa ta.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano  sotthinaa paara.m uttareyya. tassa purisassa utti.n.nassa {ti.n.nassa (pii0 ka0)} paara"ngatassa  evamassa -- `bahukaaro kho me aya.m kullo; imaaha.m kulla.m nissaaya  hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m utti.n.no. ya.mnuunaaha.m  ima.m kulla.m siise vaa aaropetvaa khandhe ^a^T1.0271^ea^ vaa uccaaretvaa {uccopetvaa (ka0)} yena kaama.m  pakkameyya'nti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso  eva.mkaarii tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii assaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``katha.mkaarii ca so, bhikkhave, puriso tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii assa?  idha, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa utti.n.nassa paara"ngatassa evamassa  -- `bahukaaro kho me aya.m kullo; imaaha.m kulla.m nissaaya ^a^V1.0189^ea^ hatthehi ca  paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m utti.n.no. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m kulla.m  thale vaa ussaadetvaa {ussaaretvaa (ka0)} udake vaa opilaapetvaa yena kaama.m pakkameyya'nti.  eva.mkaarii kho so, bhikkhave, puriso tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii  assa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, kulluupamo mayaa dhammo desito  nitthara.natthaaya, no gaha.natthaaya. kulluupama.m vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m  desita.m, aajaanantehi dhammaapi vo pahaatabbaa pageva adhammaa.
text.769: [03] 241^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, di.t.thi.t.thaanaani.  katamaani cha? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m  adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito,  sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme  aviniito, ruupa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti ^a^M1.0189^ea^   samanupassati; vedana.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti  samanupassati; sa~n~na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti  samanupassati; sa"nkhaare `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^T1.0272^ea^ me attaa'ti  samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m,  anuvicarita.m manasaa tampi `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me  attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- so loko so attaa,  so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo  ^a^P1.0136^ea^, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamiiti -- tampi `eta.m  mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. sutavaa ca  kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa  kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii  sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, ruupa.m `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; vedana.m `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; sa~n~na.m `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; sa"nkhaare `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m  muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m, anuvicarita.m manasaa, tampi `neta.m  mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m  di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo  sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamiiti -- tampi  `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. so eva.m  samanupassanto asati na paritassatii''ti.
text.77: [03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m  pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva uppannaana.m veyyaabaadhikaana.m vedanaana.m  pa.tighaataaya, abyaabajjhaparamataaya' {abyaapajjhaparamataaya (sii0 syaa0 pii0),  abyaapajjaparamataaya (ka0)}.
text.770: [03] 242^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, bahiddhaa asati paritassanaa''ti?  ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa ^a^T1.0273^ea^ avoca. ``idha bhikkhu ekaccassa ^a^V1.0190^ea^   eva.m hoti -- `ahu vata me, ta.m vata me natthi; siyaa vata me, ta.m  vataaha.m na labhaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m  kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bahiddhaa asati  paritassanaa hotii''ti.
text.771: [03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, bahiddhaa asati aparitassanaa''ti?  ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa avoca. ``idha bhikkhu ekaccassa  na eva.m hoti -- `ahu vata me, ta.m vata me natthi; siyaa vata me, ta.m  vataaha.m na labhaamii'ti. so na socati ^a^M1.0190^ea^ na kilamati na paridevati  na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu,  bahiddhaa asati aparitassanaa hotii''ti.
text.772: [03] ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, ajjhatta.m asati paritassanaa''ti?  ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa avoca. ``idha, bhikkhu,  ekaccassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `so loko so attaa, so pecca  bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m  tatheva .thassaamii'ti. so su.naati tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa  vaa sabbesa.m di.t.thi.t.thaanaadhi.t.thaanapariyu.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaana.m  samugghaataaya sabbasa"nkhaarasamathaaya sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggaaya  ta.nhaakkhayaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhamma.m desentassa.  tassa eva.m hoti ^a^P1.0137^ea^ -- `ucchijjissaami naamassu,  vinassissaami naamassu, nassu naama bhavissaamii'ti. so socati  kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m  kho, bhikkhu, ajjhatta.m asati paritassanaa hotii''ti.
text.773: [03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, ajjhatta.m asati aparitassanaa''ti?  ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti ^a^T1.0274^ea^ bhagavaa avoca. ``idha, bhikkhu, ekaccassa  na eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami  nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva  .thassaamii'ti. so su.naati tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa  sabbesa.m di.t.thi.t.thaanaadhi.t.thaanapariyu.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaana.m samugghaataaya  sabbasa"nkhaarasamathaaya sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggaaya ta.nhaakkhayaaya  viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhamma.m desentassa. tassa na eva.m  hoti -- `ucchijjissaami naamassu, vinassissaami naamassu, nassu  naama bhavissaamii'ti. so na socati ^a^V1.0191^ea^ na kilamati na paridevati  na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu,  ajjhatta.m asati aparitassanaa hoti''.
text.774: [03] 243^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m {ta~nca (ka0)}, bhikkhave, pariggaha.m parigga.nheyyaatha,  yvaassa {yvaassu (ka0)} pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo,  sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyya. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m  pariggaha.m yvaassa pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo,  sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu,  bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave, pariggaha.m na samanupassaami ^a^M1.0191^ea^   yvaassa pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo  sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyya.
text.775: [03] ``ta.m, bhikkhave, attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyetha, ya.msa {yassa (syaa0 ka0)}  attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m  attavaadupaadaana.m ^a^T1.0275^ea^ ya.msa attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``saadhu, bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave, attavaadupaadaana.m na  samanupassaami ya.msa attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.
text.776: [03] ``ta.m, bhikkhave, di.t.thinissaya.m nissayetha ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m  nissayato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. passatha  no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m di.t.thinissaya.m ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m nissayato  na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``no heta.m,  bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave,  di.t.thinissaya.m na samanupassaami ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m nissayato  ^a^P1.0138^ea^ na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''.
text.777: [03] 244^b^.^eb^ ``attani vaa, bhikkhave, sati attaniya.m me  ti assaa''ti?
text.779: [03] ``attaniye vaa, bhikkhave, sati attaa me ti assaa''ti?  ``eva.m, bhante''.
text.78: [03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, appa.tisevato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa ^a^T1.0018^ea^  vighaatapari.laahaa, pa.tisevato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na  honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.780: [03] ``attani ^a^V1.0192^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, attaniye ca saccato thetato  anupalabbhamaane, yampi ta.m di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- `so loko so attaa, so  pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo,  sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamii'ti -- nanaaya.m {na ca khoya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, kevalo  paripuuro baaladhammo'''ti?
text.781: [03] ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante, kevalo hi, bhante, paripuuro {kevalo paripuuro (sii0  pii0)} baaladhammo''ti.
text.782: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
text.784: [03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
text.786: [03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m  samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti?
text.788: [03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...  sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
text.790: [03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m ^a^M1.0192^ea^ vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
text.792: [03] ``ya.m ^a^V1.0193^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m  samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti?
text.794: [03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m,  ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa ^a^P1.0139^ea^, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m  vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya  da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci  sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m, ajjhatta.m vaa  bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure  santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso  attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m''.
text.795: [03] 245^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako  ruupasmi.m nibbindati, vedanaaya nibbindati, sa~n~naaya nibbindati,  sa"nkhaaresu nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m nibbindati, nibbidaa  virajjati {nibbinda.m virajjati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, viraagaa vimuccati  ^a^T1.0277^ea^, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti.  `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m  itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  ukkhittapaligho itipi, sa.mki.n.naparikkho itipi, abbuu.lhesiko  itipi, niragga.lo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto  itipi.
text.796: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti, ucchinnamuulaa  taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa, aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.
text.797: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikkho hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobbhaviko ^a^V1.0194^ea^ jaatisa.msaaro pahiino hoti,  ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato, aayati.m anuppaadadhammo.  eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikkho hoti.
text.798: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa pahiinaa hoti, ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa  anabhaava.mkataa, aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  abbuu.lhesiko hoti.
text.799: [03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti? idha,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani  honti, ucchinnamuulaani taalaavatthukataani anabhaava.mkataani, aayati.m  anuppaadadhammaani ^a^M1.0193^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti.
text.8: [03] ``teja.m ^a^M1.0002^ea^ tejato sa~njaanaati; teja.m tejato sa~n~natvaa teja.m  ma~n~nati, tejasmi.m ma~n~nati, tejato ma~n~nati, teja.m meti ma~n~nati, teja.m  abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
text.80: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso khamo  hoti siitassa u.nhassa, jighacchaaya pipaasaaya.  .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassaana.m, duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m,  uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m {tippaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m  asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti.
text.800: [01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo  pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano  pahiino hoti, ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato ^a^T1.0278^ea^, aayati.m  anuppaadadhammo ^a^P1.0140^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti.
text.801: [03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vimuttacitta.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m  saindaa devaa sabrahmakaa sapajaapatikaa anvesa.m naadhigacchanti -- `ida.m  nissita.m tathaagatassa vi~n~naa.na'nti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thevaaha.m,  bhikkhave, dhamme tathaagata.m ananuvijjoti vadaami. eva.mvaadi.m kho ma.m,  bhikkhave, evamakkhaayi.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa asataa tucchaa musaa  abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, sato  sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~naapetii'ti. yathaa caaha.m na,  bhikkhave {bhikkhave na (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, yathaa caaha.m na vadaami, tathaa ma.m te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `venayiko sama.no  gotamo, sato sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~naapetii'ti. pubbe  caaha.m bhikkhave, etarahi ca dukkha~nceva pa~n~naapemi, dukkhassa ca  nirodha.m. tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m akkosanti paribhaasanti  rosenti vihesenti, tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa na hoti aaghaato na  appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi.
text.802: [03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m sakkaronti garu.m karonti  maanenti puujenti, tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa na hoti aanando na  somanassa.m na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m. tatra ce, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0195^ea^, pare  ^a^T1.0279^ea^ vaa tathaagata.m sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, tatra, bhikkhave,  tathaagatassa eva.m hoti -- `ya.m kho ida.m pubbe pari~n~naata.m tattha me  evaruupaa kaaraa {sakkaaraa (ka0)} kariiyantii'ti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi  pare akkoseyyu.m paribhaaseyyu.m roseyyu.m viheseyyu.m, tatra tumhe hi na  aaghaato na appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi kara.niiyaa.  tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi pare sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m,  tatra tumhehi na aanando na somanassa.m na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m  kara.niiya.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi pare sakkareyyu.m garu.m ^a^M1.0194^ea^  kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, tatra tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `ya.m kho ida.m pubbe  pari~n~naata.m, tattha me {tattha no (ka0) tattha + imeti padacchedo} evaruupaa kaaraa kariiyantii'ti.
text.803: [03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ya.m na tumhaaka.m ta.m  pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca,  bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m  vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa, bhikkhave,  na tumhaaka.m, ta.m ^a^P1.0141^ea^ pajahatha; saa vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m  hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sa~n~naa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m  pajahatha; saa vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati.  sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, te pajahatha; te vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m  hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m  pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ta.m ki.m  ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ya.m ^a^T1.0280^ea^ imasmi.m jetavane ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m, ta.m jano  hareyya vaa daheyya vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya. api nu tumhaaka.m  evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vaa dahati vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa  karotii'ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``na  hi no eta.m, bhante, attaa vaa attaniya.m vaa''ti. ``evameva kho,  bhikkhave, ya.m na tumhaaka.m ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya  sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m,  bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya  sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa, bhikkhave...pe0... sa~n~naa, bhikkhave...  sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave,  na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya  bhavissati.
text.804: [03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^V1.0196^ea^ svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo  uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate,  bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike ye te  bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa  anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, va.t.ta.m tesa.m  natthi pa~n~naapanaaya. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano  viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa  dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m  pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ^a^M1.0195^ea^ pahiinaani, sabbe te opapaatikaa,  tattha ^a^T1.0281^ea^ parinibbaayino, anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. eva.m  svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito  chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane  viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m tii.ni sa.myojanaani  pahiinaani, raagadosamohaa tanubhuutaa, sabbe te sakadaagaamino, sakideva  ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. eva.m svaakkhaato,  bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko.  eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite  chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, sabbe te  sotaapannaa, avinipaatadhammaa ^a^P1.0142^ea^, niyataa  sambodhiparaayanaa. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano  viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa  dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike ye te bhikkhuu  dhammaanusaarino saddhaanusaarino sabbe te sambodhiparaayanaa. eva.m  svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito  chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane  viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m mayi saddhaamatta.m pemamatta.m sabbe  te saggaparaayanaa''ti.
text.805: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.808: [03] 249^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0282^ea^ ^a^V1.0197^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  aayasmaa kumaarakassapo andhavane viharati. atha kho a~n~nataraa  devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m andhavana.m  obhaasetvaa yenaayasmaa kumaarakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa aayasmanta.m  kumaarakassapa.m etadavoca --
text.809: [01] ``bhikkhu ^a^M1.0196^ea^ bhikkhu, aya.m vammiko {vammiiko (katthaci)  sakkataanuruupa.m} ratti.m dhuumaayati,  divaa pajjalati. braahma.no evamaaha -- `abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa la"ngi.m  `la"ngii, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa la"ngi.m;  abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m  aadaaya addasa uddhumaayika.m. `uddhumaayikaa, bhadante'ti. braahma.no  evamaaha -- `ukkhipa uddhumaayika.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa dvidhaapatha.m.  `dvidhaapatho, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa  dvidhaapatha.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto  sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa ca"ngavaara.m {pa"nkavaara.m (syaa0), ca"nkavaara.m (ka0)}. `ca"ngavaaro, bhadante'ti.  braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa ^a^P1.0143^ea^ ca"ngavaara.m;  abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m  aadaaya addasa kumma.m. `kummo ^a^T1.0283^ea^, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha --  `ukkhipa kumma.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti.  abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa asisuuna.m. `asisuunaa,  bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa asisuuna.m; abhikkha.na,  sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya  addasa ma.msapesi.m. `ma.msapesi, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha --  `ukkhipa ma.msapesi.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti.  abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa naaga.m. `naago,  bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ti.t.thatu naago, maa naaga.m gha.t.tesi;  namo karohi naagassaa'''ti.
text.81: [03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, anadhivaasayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa  vighaatapari.laahaa, adhivaasayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na  honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.810: [03] ``ime ^a^V1.0198^ea^ kho tva.m, bhikkhu, pa~nhe bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa  puccheyyaasi, yathaa ca te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasi.  naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhu, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake  sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m  veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa, tathaagatasaavakena  vaa, ito vaa pana sutvaa''ti -- idamavoca saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa  tatthevantaradhaayi.
text.811: [03] 250^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa kumaarakassapo tassaa  rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  kumaarakassapo bhagavanta.m ^a^M1.0197^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ima.m, bhante, ratti.m a~n~nataraa  devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m andhavana.m  obhaasetvaa ^a^T1.0284^ea^ yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.  ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhante, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `bhikkhu  bhikkhu, aya.m vammiko ratti.m dhuumaayati, divaa pajjalati'. braahma.no  evamaaha -- `abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto  sumedho sattha.m aadaaya...pe0... ito vaa pana sutvaati. idamavoca,  bhante, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. `ko nu kho,  bhante, vammiko, kaa ratti.m dhuumaayanaa, kaa divaa pajjalanaa, ko  braahma.no, ko sumedho, ki.m sattha.m, ki.m abhikkha.na.m, kaa la"ngii, kaa  uddhumaayikaa, ko dvidhaapatho, ki.m ca"ngavaara.m, ko kummo, kaa  asisuunaa ^a^T1.0285^ea^, kaa ma.msapesi, ko naago'''ti?
text.812: [03] 251^b^.^eb^ ```vammiko'ti ^a^P1.0144^ea^ kho,  bhikkhu, imasseta.m caatumahaabhuutikassa {caatummahaabhuutikassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kaayassa adhivacana.m,  maataapettikasambhavassa odanakummaasuupacayassa  aniccucchaadana-parimaddanabhedana-viddha.msana-dhammassa.
text.813: [03] ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, divaa kammante {kammanta.m (ka0)} aarabbha ratti.m anuvitakketi  anuvicaareti -- aya.m ratti.m dhuumaayanaa. ya.m kho, bhikkhu, ratti.m  anuvitakketvaa anuvicaaretvaa divaa kammante payojeti kaayena vaacaaya  `manasaa' {( ) natthi (sii0 syaa0)} -- aya.m divaa pajjalanaa.
text.814: [03] ```braahma.no'ti ^a^V1.0199^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. `sumedho'ti kho bhikkhu sekkhasseta.m bhikkhuno  adhivacana.m.
text.815: [03] ```sattha'nti kho, bhikkhu, ariyaayeta.m pa~n~naaya adhivacana.m.  `abhikkha.na'nti kho, bhikkhu, viiriyaarambhasseta.m adhivacana.m.
text.816: [03] ```la"ngii'ti kho, bhikkhu, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m. ukkhipa  la"ngi.m, pajaha avijja.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati  ayametassa attho.
text.817: [03] ```uddhumaayikaa'ti kho, bhikkhu, kodhuupaayaasasseta.m adhivacana.m.  ukkhipa uddhumaayika.m, pajaha kodhuupaayaasa.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
text.818: [03] ```dvidhaapatho'ti ^a^M1.0198^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, vicikicchaayeta.m adhivacana.m.  ukkhipa dvidhaapatha.m, pajaha vicikiccha.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
text.819: [03] ```ca"ngavaara'nti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m niivara.naana.m adhivacana.m,  seyyathida.m -- kaamacchandaniivara.nassa, byaapaadaniivara.nassa,  thiinamiddhaniivara.nassa, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.nassa, vicikicchaaniivara.nassa.  ukkhipa ca"ngavaara.m, pajaha pa~nca niivara.ne ^a^T1.0286^ea^; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
text.820: [03] ```kummo'ti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m  adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandhassa, vedanupaadaanakkhandhassa,  sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhassa, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhassa,  vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhassa. ukkhipa kumma.m, pajaha pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe;  abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
text.821: [03] ```asisuunaa'ti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m  -- cakkhuvi~n~neyyaana.m ruupaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m piyaruupaana.m  kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, sotavi~n~neyyaana.m saddaana.m...pe0...  ghaanavi~n~neyyaana.m gandhaana.m...pe0... jivhaavi~n~neyyaana.m rasaana.m...pe0...  kaayavi~n~neyyaana.m ^a^V1.0200^ea^ pho.t.thabbaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m piyaruupaana.m  kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m ^a^P1.0145^ea^ rajaniiyaana.m. ukkhipa asisuuna.m,  pajaha pa~nca kaamagu.ne; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati  ayametassa attho.
text.822: [03] ```ma.msapesii'ti kho, bhikkhu, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m.  ukkhipa ma.msapesi.m, pajaha nandiiraaga.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m  aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
text.823: [03] ```naago'ti kho, bhikkhu, khii.naasavasseta.m bhikkhuno adhivacana.m.  ti.t.thatu naago, maa naaga.m gha.t.tesi; namo karohi naagassaati  ayametassa attho''ti.
text.824: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa kumaarakassapo bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
text.827: [03] 252^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0287^ea^ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho sambahulaa jaatibhuumakaa  bhikkhuu jaatibhuumiya.m vassa.mvu.t.thaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.828: [03] ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jaatibhuumiya.m jaatibhuumakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  sabrahmacaariina.m eva.m sambhaavito -- `attanaa ca appiccho  appicchakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca santu.t.tho santu.t.thikatha~nca  bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca pavivitto pavivekakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa,  attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho asa.msaggakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  aaraddhaviiriyo viiriyaarambhakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  siilasampanno siilasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  samaadhisampanno samaadhisampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  pa~n~naasampanno pa~n~naasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca  vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m  kattaa, ovaadako vi~n~naapako sandassako samaadapako samuttejako  ^a^P1.0146^ea^ sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina'''nti? ``pu.n.no  naama, bhante, aayasmaa mantaa.niputto ^a^T1.0288^ea^ jaatibhuumiya.m jaatibhuumakaana.m  bhikkhuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m eva.m sambhaavito -- `attanaa ca appiccho  appicchakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca santu.t.tho...pe0...  ovaadako vi~n~naapako sandassako samaadapako samuttejako sampaha.msako  sabrahmacaariina'''nti.
text.829: [03] 253^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto  bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa  etadahosi -- ``laabhaa aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa,  suladdhalaabhaa aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa, yassa vi~n~nuu  sabrahmacaarii satthu sammukhaa anumassa anumassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, ta~nca  satthaa abbhanumodati. appeva naama mayampi kadaaci ^a^V1.0202^ea^ karahaci  aayasmataa pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama {samaagama.m gaccheyya  (ka0)}, appeva naama  siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti.
text.83: [03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^V1.0015^ea^ pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ca.n.da.m hatthi.m  parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m assa.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m go.na.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m  kukkura.m parivajjeti, ahi.m khaa.nu.m ka.n.taka.t.thaana.m ^a^P1.0011^ea^ sobbha.m  papaata.m candanika.m o.ligalla.m. yathaaruupe anaasane nisinna.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^ yathaaruupe  agocare caranta.m yathaaruupe paapake mitte bhajanta.m vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii  paapakesu .thaanesu okappeyyu.m, so ta~nca anaasana.m ta~nca agocara.m te ca ^a^T1.0019^ea^  paapake mitte pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso parivajjeti.
text.830: [03] 254^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0200^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m  viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^T1.0289^ea^ aaraame. assosi kho aayasmaa  pu.n.no mantaa.niputto -- ``bhagavaa kira saavatthi.m anuppatto;  saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame''ti.
text.831: [03] 255^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto  senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saavatthi tena caarika.m  pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi jetavana.m  anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi  samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no  mantaa.niputto bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito  samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa  u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena andhavana.m  tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya.
text.832: [03] 256^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yenaayasmaa  saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca  -- ``yassa kho tva.m, aavuso saariputta, pu.n.nassa naama bhikkhuno  mantaa.niputtassa abhi.nha.m kittayamaano ahosi, so bhagavataa ^a^P1.0147^ea^  dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito  sampaha.msito bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena andhavana.m tena pakkanto  divaavihaaraayaa''ti.
text.833: [03] atha ^a^T1.0290^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto taramaanaruupo nisiidana.m aadaaya  aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi  siisaanulokii. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto andhavana.m  ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.  aayasmaapi ^a^V1.0203^ea^ kho saariputto andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m  rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.
text.834: [03] atha ^a^M1.0201^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito  yenaayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa  pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  saariputto aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m etadavoca --
text.837: [03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m  vussatii''ti?
text.84: [03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, aparivajjayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa  vighaatapari.laahaa, parivajjayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na  honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.841: [03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, di.t.thivisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m  vussatii''ti?
text.845: [03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m  bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti?
text.849: [03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m ^a^T1.0291^ea^ bhagavati  brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti?
text.851: [03] ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m  vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m  panaavuso, cittavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho  samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, aavuso,  di.t.thivisuddhattha.m...pe0... ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhattha.m...pe0...  maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m...pe0...  pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m...pe0... ki.m nu kho, aavuso,  ~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho  samaano `no hida.m aavuso'ti vadesi. kimattha.m carahaavuso,  bhagavati brahmacariya.m ^a^P1.0148^ea^ vussatii''ti?  ``anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m  vussatii''ti.
text.86: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa  pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso uppanna.m  kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m  gameti, uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0...  uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti  byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti.
text.868: [03] ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhi  anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti  vadesi. `ki.m panaavuso, cittavisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti  pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho,  aavuso, di.t.thivisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti...pe0...  ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi... maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi...  pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi... `ki.m nu kho, aavuso,  ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no  hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m panaavuso, a~n~natra imehi dhammehi  anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti  vadesi. yathaakatha.m panaavuso, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti?
text.869: [03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``siilavisuddhi.m ^a^V1.0206^ea^ ce, aavuso, bhagavaa  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya {pa~n~naapessa (sii0 syaa0) evama~n~natthapi}. cittavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. di.t.thivisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi.m ce, aavuso,  bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya ^a^T1.0293^ea^. maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce,  aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce,  aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso,  bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva ^a^M1.0203^ea^ samaana.m  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. a~n~natra ce, aavuso, imehi dhammehi  anupaadaaparinibbaana.m abhavissa, puthujjano parinibbaayeyya. puthujjano  hi, aavuso, a~n~natra imehi dhammehi. tena haavuso, upama.m te  karissaami; upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m  aajaananti.
text.87: [03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, avinodayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa  vighaatapari.laahaa, vinodayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na  honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.870: [03] 259^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ra~n~no pasenadissa  kosalassa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasantassa ^a^P1.0149^ea^ saakete  ki~ncideva accaayika.m kara.niiya.m uppajjeyya. tassa antaraa ca  saavatthi.m antaraa ca saaketa.m satta rathaviniitaani upa.t.thapeyyu.m. atha  kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo saavatthiyaa nikkhamitvaa  antepuradvaaraa pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya, pa.thamena rathaviniitena  dutiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya dutiya.m  rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. dutiyena rathaviniitena tatiya.m rathaviniita.m  paapu.neyya, dutiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m ^a^T1.0294^ea^  abhiruheyya. tatiyena rathaviniitena catuttha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya,  tatiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya.  catutthena rathaviniitena pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m  vissajjeyya, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. pa~ncamena rathaviniitena  cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, cha.t.tha.m  rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. cha.t.thena rathaviniitena sattama.m rathaviniita.m  paapu.neyya, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, sattama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya.  sattamena rathaviniitena saaketa.m anupaapu.neyya antepuradvaara.m. tamena.m  antepuradvaaragata.m samaana.m mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa eva.m puccheyyu.m --  `iminaa tva.m, mahaaraaja, rathaviniitena saavatthiyaa saaketa.m anuppatto  antepuradvaara'nti ^a^V1.0207^ea^? katha.m byaakaramaano nu kho, aavuso, raajaa  pasenadi kosalo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti?
text.871: [03] ``eva.m byaakaramaano kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo  sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya -- `idha me saavatthiya.m pa.tivasantassa  saakete ki~ncideva accaayika.m kara.niiya.m uppajji {uppajjati (ka0)}. tassa me antaraa  ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca saaketa.m satta rathaviniitaani upa.t.thapesu.m. atha  khvaaha.m saavatthiyaa ^a^M1.0204^ea^ nikkhamitvaa antepuradvaaraa pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m  abhiruhi.m. pa.thamena rathaviniitena dutiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, pa.thama.m  rathaviniita.m vissajji.m dutiya.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. dutiyena  rathaviniitena tatiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, dutiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m,  tatiya.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. tatiyena rathaviniitena catuttha.m  rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m  abhiruhi.m. catutthena rathaviniitena pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, catuttha.m  rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, pa~ncama.m ^a^T1.0295^ea^ rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. pa~ncamena  rathaviniitena cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m,  cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. cha.t.thena rathaviniitena sattama.m rathaviniita.m  paapu.ni.m, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, sattama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m.  sattamena rathaviniitena saaketa.m anuppatto antepuradvaara'nti. eva.m  byaakaramaano kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammaa  byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti.
text.872: [03] ``evameva kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhi yaavadeva  cittavisuddhatthaa, cittavisuddhi yaavadeva di.t.thivisuddhatthaa, di.t.thivisuddhi  yaavadeva ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhatthaa, ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi ^a^P1.0150^ea^  yaavadeva maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa,  maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva   pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa, pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva  ~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva  anupaadaaparinibbaanatthaa. anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m kho, aavuso,  bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti.
text.873: [03] 260^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m  mantaa.niputta.m etadavoca -- ``konaamo aayasmaa, katha~nca panaayasmanta.m  sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti? ``pu.n.noti kho me, aavuso, naama.m;  mantaa.niputtoti ca pana ma.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti. ``acchariya.m,  aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yathaa ta.m sutavataa saavakena sammadeva  satthusaasana.m aajaanantena, evameva aayasmataa ^a^V1.0208^ea^ pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena  gambhiiraa ^a^T1.0296^ea^ gambhiirapa~nhaa anumassa anumassa byaakataa. laabhaa  sabrahmacaariina.m, suladdhalaabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m, ye aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m  mantaa.niputta.m labhanti dassanaaya, labhanti payiruupaasanaaya.  cela.n.dukena {cela.n.dakena (ka0), cela.n.dupekena (?)} cepi sabrahmacaarii aayasmanta.m   pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m ^a^M1.0205^ea^ muddhanaa  pariharantaa labheyyu.m dassanaaya, labheyyu.m payiruupaasanaaya, tesampi laabhaa  tesampi suladdha.m, amhaakampi laabhaa amhaakampi suladdha.m, ye maya.m  aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m labhaama dassanaaya, labhaama  payiruupaasanaayaa''ti.
text.874: [01] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ko naamo aayasmaa, katha~nca panaayasmanta.m  sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti? ``upatissoti kho me, aavuso, naama.m;  saariputtoti ca pana ma.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti. ``satthukappena  vata kira, bho {kho (ka0)}, saavakena saddhi.m mantayamaanaa na jaanimha --  `aayasmaa saariputto'ti. sace hi maya.m jaaneyyaama `aayasmaa  saariputto'ti, ettakampi no nappa.tibhaaseyya {nappa.tibheyya (?)}. acchariya.m, aavuso,  abbhuta.m, aavuso! yathaa ta.m sutavataa saavakena sammadeva satthusaasana.m  aajaanantena, evameva aayasmataa saariputtena gambhiiraa gambhiirapa~nhaa  anumassa anumassa pucchitaa. laabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m suladdhalaabhaa  sabrahmacaariina.m, ye aayasmanta.m saariputta.m labhanti dassanaaya, labhanti  payiruupaasanaaya. cela.n.dukena cepi sabrahmacaarii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  muddhanaa pariharantaa ^a^T1.0297^ea^ labheyyu.m dassanaaya, labheyyu.m payiruupaasanaaya,  tesampi ^a^P1.0151^ea^ laabhaa tesampi suladdha.m, amhaakampi laabhaa  amhaakampi suladdha.m, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m labhaama dassanaaya,  labhaama payiruupaasanaayaa''ti.
text.875: [03] itiha te ubhopi mahaanaagaa a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m  samanumodi.msuuti.
text.878: [03] 261^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0298^ea^ ^a^V1.0209^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.879: [03] ``na ^a^M1.0206^ea^, bhikkhave, nevaapiko nivaapa.m nivapati migajaataana.m --  `ima.m me nivaapa.m nivutta.m migajaataa paribhu~njantaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto  cira.m diighamaddhaana.m yaapentuu'ti. eva~nca kho, bhikkhave, nevaapiko  nivaapa.m nivapati migajaataana.m -- `ima.m me nivaapa.m nivutta.m migajaataa  anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njissanti, anupakhajja mucchitaa  bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajjissanti, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m  aapajjissanti, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa bhavissanti  imasmi.m nivaape'ti.
text.880: [03] 262^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m  nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu,  te tattha anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu,  mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa  ahesu.m nevaapikassa amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa  migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa.
text.881: [03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, dutiyaa migajaataa eva.m  samacintesu.m -- `ye kho ^a^T1.0299^ea^ te pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m  nevaapikassa anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha  anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu, mattaa  samaanaa pamaada.m aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa  ^a^P1.0152^ea^ ahesu.m nevaapikassa amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te  pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna  maya.m sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirameyyaama, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa  ara~n~naayatanaani ajjhogaahetvaa vihareyyaamaa'ti. te sabbaso  nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirami.msu, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa ara~n~naayatanaani ^a^V1.0210^ea^   ajjhogaahetvaa vihari.msu. tesa.m gimhaana.m pacchime maase,  ti.nodakasa"nkhaye, adhimattakasimaana.m patto kaayo hoti. tesa.m  adhimattakasimaana.m pattakaayaana.m balaviiriya.m parihaayi. balaviiriye  parihiine tameva nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa paccaagami.msu. te tattha  anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha anupakhajja  mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m  aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m nevaapikassa  amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, dutiyaapi migajaataa na  parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa.
text.882: [03] 264^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^M1.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, tatiyaa migajaataa eva.m  samacintesu.m -- `ye kho te pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m  nevaapikassa...pe0... eva~nhi te pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu  nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. yepi te dutiyaa migajaataa eva.m  samacintesu.m -- ye kho te pa.thamaa migajaataa ^a^T1.0300^ea^ amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m  nevaapikassa...pe0... eva~nhi te pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu  nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa  pa.tivirameyyaama, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa text.892: [03] ``te amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani  upanissaaya aasaya.m kappayi.msu. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m nivaapa.m  nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja amucchitaa  bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani  bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajji.msu, amattaa samaanaa na pamaada.m aapajji.msu,  appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m maarassa amusmi.m  nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamise ^a^T1.0308^ea^. api ca kho eva.mdi.t.thikaa ahesu.m --  sassato loko itipi, asassato loko itipi; antavaa loko  itipi, anantavaa loko itipi; ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m itipi, a~n~na.m  jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m itipi; hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa itipi, na  hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa itipi, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato  para.m mara.naa itipi, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa  itipi ^a^P1.0158^ea^. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, tatiyaapi  sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^M1.0213^ea^ na parimucci.msu maarassa iddhaanubhaavaa. seyyathaapi te,  bhikkhave, tatiyaa migajaataa tathuupame aha.m ime tatiye sama.nabraahma.ne  vadaami.
