text.894: [01] ``te amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca  lokaamisaani upanissaaya aasaya.m kappayi.msu. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m  nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja  amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha ananupakhajja amucchitaa  bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajji.msu. amattaa samaanaa ^a^M1.0214^ea^ na pamaada.m  aapajji.msu. appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m maarassa  amusmi.m nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamise. api ca kho eva.mdi.t.thikaa  ahesu.m sassato loko itipi...pe0... neva hoti na na hoti  tathaagato para.m mara.naa itipi. eva~nhi te tatiyaapi sama.nabraahma.naa na  parimucci.msu maarassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m yattha agati maarassa  ca maaraparisaaya ca tatraasaya.m kappeyaama. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m  nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ^a^T1.0310^ea^ ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja  amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njissaama, ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani  bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajjissaama, amattaa samaanaa na pamaada.m  aapajjissaama, appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa bhavissaama  maarassa amusmi.m nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamiseti.
text.895: [03] ``te ^a^V1.0217^ea^ yattha agati maarassa ca maaraparisaaya ca tatraasaya.m  kappayi.msu. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m nivaapa.m ^a^P1.0159^ea^  nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja amucchitaa  bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu, te tattha ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani  bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajji.msu, amattaa samaanaa na pamaada.m aapajji.msu,  appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m maarassa amusmi.m  nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamise. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, catutthaa  sama.nabraahma.naa parimucci.msu maarassa iddhaanubhaavaa. seyyathaapi te,  bhikkhave, catutthaa migajaataa tathuupame aha.m ime catutthe sama.nabraahma.ne  vadaami.
text.896: [03] 271^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, agati maarassa ca  maaraparisaaya ca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca  akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi  maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato.
text.897: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa  ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m  piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.898: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa  upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena  pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti ^a^M1.0215^ea^ `upekkhako satimaa  sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.899: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^T1.0311^ea^ upasampajja viharati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.9: [03] ``vaaya.m vaayato sa~njaanaati; vaaya.m vaayato sa~n~natvaa vaaya.m  ma~n~nati, vaayasmi.m ma~n~nati, vaayato ma~n~nati, vaaya.m meti ma~n~nati,  vaaya.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti  ^a^P1.0002^ea^ vadaami.
text.90: [01] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0020^ea^, abhaavayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa  vighaatapari.laahaa, bhaavayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na  honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa.
text.900: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m  samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa ^a^V1.0218^ea^ naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.901: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja  viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.902: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma ^a^P1.0160^ea^ `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.903: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.904: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja  viharati. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa  maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato ti.n.no loke visattika''nti.
text.905: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.908: [03] 272^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0216^ea^ ^a^V1.0219^ea^ ^a^T1.0312^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa  pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.  atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m -- ``cirassutaa no,  aavuso aananda, bhagavato sammukhaa dhammii kathaa. saadhu maya.m,  aavuso aananda, labheyyaama bhagavato sammukhaa dhammi.m katha.m  savanaayaa''ti. ``tena haayasmanto yena rammakassa braahma.nassa  assamo tenupasa"nkamatha; appeva naama labheyyaatha bhagavato sammukhaa  dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu  aayasmato aanandassa paccassosu.m.
text.909: [03] atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda,  yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado tenupasa"nkamissaama  divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando  bhagavato paccassosi. atha ^a^P1.0161^ea^ kho bhagavaa  aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado  tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m  pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi --  ``aayaamaananda, yena ^a^T1.0313^ea^ pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkamissaama gattaani  parisi~ncitu''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando  bhagavato paccassosi.
text.91: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye aasavaa  dassanaa pahaatabbaa te dassanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa sa.mvaraa  pahaatabbaa ^a^M1.0015^ea^ te sa.mvaraa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa  te pa.tisevanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa te  adhivaasanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa ^a^P1.0012^ea^  te parivajjanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa vinodanaa  pahaatabbaa te vinodanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa  te bhaavanaa pahiinaa honti; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave -- `bhikkhu  sabbaasavasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati, acchecchi {acchejji (ka0)} ta.nha.m,   vivattayi {vaavattayi (sii0 pii0)} sa.myojana.m,  sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa'''ti.
text.910: [03] 273^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m  yena pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. pubbako.t.thake  gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani  pubbaapayamaano. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``aya.m, bhante, rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo aviduure. rama.niiyo,  bhante, rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo; paasaadiko, bhante, rammakassa  braahma.nassa assamo. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa yena rammakassa braahma.nassa  assamo tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa  tu.nhiibhaavena.
text.911: [03] atha ^a^M1.0217^ea^ ^a^V1.0220^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo  tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu rammakassa  braahma.nassa assame dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisinnaa honti. atha kho  bhagavaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.thaasi kathaapariyosaana.m aagamayamaano. atha  kho bhagavaa kathaapariyosaana.m viditvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi.  vivari.msu kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato dvaara.m. atha kho bhagavaa  rammakassa braahma.nassa assama.m pavisitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.  nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaayanuttha, bhikkhave,  etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa? kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa  vippakataa''ti ^a^T1.0314^ea^? ``bhagavantameva kho no, bhante, aarabbha dhammii kathaa  vippakataa, atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! eta.m  kho, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m ya.m tumhe dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisiideyyaatha.  sannipatitaana.m vo, bhikkhave, dvaya.m kara.niiya.m -- dhammii vaa kathaa,  ariyo vaa tu.nhiibhaavo''.
text.912: [03] 274^b^.^eb^ ``dvemaa, bhikkhave, pariyesanaa -- ariyaa ca  pariyesanaa, anariyaa ca pariyesanaa.
text.913: [03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, anariyaa pariyesanaa? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva  pariyesati, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva ^a^P1.0162^ea^  pariyesati, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva  pariyesati, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesati,  attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesati, attanaa  sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesati.
text.914: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaatidhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m,  bhikkhave, jaatidhamma.m, daasidaasa.m jaatidhamma.m, aje.laka.m jaatidhamma.m,  kukku.tasuukara.m jaatidhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m jaatidhamma.m, jaataruuparajata.m  jaatidhamma.m. jaatidhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito {gadhiito  (syaa0 ka0)}  mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva  pariyesati.
text.915: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaraadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave,  jaraadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m jaraadhamma.m, aje.laka.m jaraadhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m ^a^T1.0315^ea^  jaraadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m jaraadhamma.m ^a^M1.0218^ea^, jaataruuparajata.m ^a^V1.0221^ea^ jaraadhamma.m.  jaraadhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito  ajjhaapanno attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva pariyesati.
text.916: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, byaadhidhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m,  bhikkhave, byaadhidhamma.m, daasidaasa.m byaadhidhamma.m, aje.laka.m byaadhidhamma.m,  kukku.tasuukara.m byaadhidhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m byaadhidhamma.m.  byaadhidhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito  ajjhaapanno attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesati.
text.917: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, mara.nadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m,  bhikkhave, mara.nadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m mara.nadhamma.m, aje.laka.m mara.nadhamma.m,  kukku.tasuukara.m mara.nadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m mara.nadhamma.m. mara.nadhammaa  hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno  attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesati.
text.918: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, sokadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave,  sokadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m sokadhamma.m, aje.laka.m sokadhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m  sokadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m sokadhamma.m. sokadhammaa hete, bhikkhave,  upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa sokadhammo  samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesati.
text.919: [03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mkilesadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m,  bhikkhave, sa.mkilesadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m, aje.laka.m  sa.mkilesadhamma.m ^a^T1.0316^ea^, kukku.tasuukara.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m  sa.mkilesadhamma.m, jaataruuparajata.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m. sa.mkilesadhammaa hete,  bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa  sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesati. aya.m,  bhikkhave, anariyaa pariyesanaa.
text.92: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.920: [03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, ariyaa pariyesanaa?  idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamme  aadiinava.m viditvaa ^a^P1.0163^ea^ ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m  viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa  byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m ^a^V1.0222^ea^   yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano  mara.nadhamme ^a^M1.0219^ea^ aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m  pariyesati, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa  asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa  sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati. aya.m, bhikkhave, ariyaa  pariyesanaa.
text.921: [03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``ahampi suda.m, bhikkhave, pubbeva sambodhaa  anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano attanaa jaatidhammo samaano  jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva  pariyesaami, attanaa ^a^T1.0317^ea^ byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesaami,  attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa  sokadhammo samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo  samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesaami. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave,  etadahosi -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m attanaa jaatidhammo samaano  jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano...pe0... byaadhidhammo  samaano... mara.nadhammo samaano... sokadhammo samaano... attanaa  sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m  attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano  jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m  pariyeseyya.m, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m  viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa  mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m  yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa sokadhammo samaano  sokadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m  pariyeseyya.m, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m  viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya'nti.
text.922: [03] 277^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, aparena samayena  daharova samaano susukaa.lakeso ^a^T1.0318^ea^, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena  vayasaa akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani ^a^M1.0220^ea^ vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbaji.m. so eva.m pabbajito samaano ki.m kusalagavesii {ki.mkusala.mgavesii  (ka0)} anuttara.m  santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m.  upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso  kaalaama, imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^V1.0223^ea^ brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte,  bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa;  taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso ^a^P1.0164^ea^  nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m  dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, taavatakeneva  o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena ~naa.navaada~nca vadaami theravaada~nca,  `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa  mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m  kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharaamiiti pavedeti; addhaa aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m  viharatii'ti.
text.923: [01] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo  tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m --  `kittaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti {upasampajja pavedesiiti (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}? eva.m vutte,  bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^T1.0319^ea^ pavedesi. tassa  mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa  atthi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi  viiriya.m, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi  sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi  samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi samaadhi; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi  pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m aa.laaro kaalaamo saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti, tassa dhammassa  sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva  khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.
text.924: [03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m --
text.925: [03] `ettaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti?
text.926: [03] `ettaavataa ^a^M1.0221^ea^ kho aha.m, aavuso, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemii'ti.
text.927: [03] `ahampi ^a^V1.0224^ea^ kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti.
text.928: [01] `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m  aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi. ya.m tva.m ^a^P1.0165^ea^ dhamma.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi tamaha.m dhamma.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa ^a^T1.0320^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami  ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi tamaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami.  iti yaadiso aha.m taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso aha.m. ehi  daani, aavuso, ubhova santaa ima.m ga.na.m pariharaamaa'ti. iti kho,  bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano (attano) {( ) natthi  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa {attano (sii0 pii0)} samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya  puujesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo  nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na  sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva  aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ta.m dhamma.m  anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.
text.929: [03] 278^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ki.m kusalagavesii  anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena udako {uddako (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso {aavuso raama  (sii0 syaa0 ka0) mahaasatto raamaputtameva avoca, na raama.m, raamo hi  tattha ga.naacariyo bhaveyya, tadaa ca kaala"nkato asanto. tenevettha  raamaayattaani kriyapadaani atiitakaalavasena aagataani, udako ca  raamaputto mahaasattassa sabrahmacaariitveva vutto, na aacariyoti.  .tiikaaya.m ca ``paa.liya.m raamasseva samaapattilaabhitaa aagataa na  udakassaa''ti aadi pacchaabhaage pakaasitaa},  imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave,  udako raamaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa; taadiso aya.m  dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m,  bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho ^a^M1.0222^ea^  aha.m, bhikkhave, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena  ~naa.navaada~nca vadaami ^a^T1.0321^ea^ theravaada~nca, `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca  pa.tijaanaami aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi  -- `na kho raamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi; addhaa raamo ima.m dhamma.m  jaana.m passa.m vihaasii'ti.
text.930: [03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso,  raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^V1.0225^ea^ viharaamiiti  pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, udako raamaputto  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi  -- `na kho raamasseva ahosi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho  raamasseva ahosi viiriya.m ^a^P1.0166^ea^, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m;  na kho raamasseva ahosi sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho raamasseva  ahosi samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi samaadhi, na kho raamasseva ahosi  pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi, tassa dhammassa  sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva  khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.
text.931: [03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m --
text.932: [03] `ettaavataa no, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti?
text.933: [03] `ettaavataa kho, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti.
text.934: [03] `ahampi kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m ^a^T1.0322^ea^ dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti.
text.935: [03] `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m  taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi, ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi. ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi, ta.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi  ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ta.m dhamma.m raamo  abhi~n~naasi. iti yaadiso raamo ahosi taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso  tuva.m taadiso raamo ahosi. ehi daani, aavuso, tuva.m ima.m ga.na.m  pariharaa'ti ^a^M1.0223^ea^. iti kho, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0226^ea^, udako raamaputto sabrahmacaarii me  samaano aacariya.t.thaane ma.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi.  tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na  viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti.  so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa  nibbijja apakkami.m.
text.936: [03] 279^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ki.m kusalagavesii  anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano magadhesu anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano yena uruvelaa senaanigamo tadavasari.m. tatthaddasa.m ^a^P1.0167^ea^  rama.niiya.m bhuumibhaaga.m, paasaadika~nca vanasa.n.da.m, nadi~nca  sandanti.m setaka.m supatittha.m rama.niiya.m, samantaa {saamantaa (?)} ca gocaragaama.m  ^a^T1.0323^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `rama.niiyo vata, bho, bhuumibhaago,  paasaadiko ca vanasa.n.do, nadii ca sandati setakaa supatitthaa  rama.niiyaa, samantaa ca gocaragaamo. ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa  padhaanatthikassa padhaanaayaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, tattheva  nisiidi.m -- alamida.m padhaanaayaati.
text.937: [03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, attanaa jaatidhammo  samaano jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  nibbaana.m pariyesamaano ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m,  attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme  aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m  pariyesamaano abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa  mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m  yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamme  aadiinava.m viditvaa asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m,  attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa  asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano asa.mkili.t.tha.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m  udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani  punabbhavo'ti.
text.938: [03] 281^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M1.0224^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi --  `adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo  pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho  panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m ^a^V1.0227^ea^   pajaa aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m --  idappaccayataa pa.ticcasamuppaado. idampi kho .thaana.m duddasa.m yadida.m --  sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo ^a^T1.0324^ea^ viraago  nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva ^a^P1.0168^ea^ kho pana dhamma.m  deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m, so mamassa kilamatho, saa  mamassa vihesaa'ti. apissu ma.m, bhikkhave, imaa anacchariyaa  gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
text.942: [22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa'''ti {aava.taati (sii0),  aavutaa (syaa0)}..
text.943: [03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``itiha me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato  appossukkataaya citta.m namati, no dhammadesanaaya. atha kho,  bhikkhave, brahmuno sahampatissa mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya  etadahosi -- `nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko,  yatra hi naama tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa appossukkataaya  citta.m namati {namissati (?)}, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa  sahampati -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m  pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- brahmaloke  antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa  sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yenaaha.m tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ma.m  etadavoca -- `desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu ^a^T1.0325^ea^ sugato dhamma.m.  santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti.  bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmaa  sahampati. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
text.95: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^a^T1.0021^ea^ ^a^V1.0017^ea^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
text.958: [03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho aha.m, bhikkhave, brahmuno ca  ajjhesana.m viditvaa sattesu ca kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca buddhacakkhunaa loka.m  volokesi.m. addasa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunaa loka.m  volokento satte apparajakkhe ^a^T1.0326^ea^ mahaarajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye,  svaakaare dvaakaare, suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce  paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante, appekacce na  paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m  vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa  padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani  udakaanuggataani antonimuggaposiini, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa  padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani  udakaanuggataani samodaka.m .thitaani, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa  padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udaka.m  accuggamma .thitaani {ti.t.thanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} anupalittaani udakena; evameva kho aha.m,  bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunaa ^a^M1.0226^ea^ loka.m volokento addasa.m satte apparajakkhe  mahaarajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svaakaare dvaakaare, suvi~n~naapaye  duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce  na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave,  brahmaana.m sahampati.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi.m --
text.96: [03] ``dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa.  atthi me tumhesu anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa  bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti. tumhe ca me, bhikkhave,  aamisadaayaadaa bhaveyyaatha no dhammadaayaadaa, tumhepi tena aadiyaa {aadissaa  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  bhaveyyaatha -- `aamisadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no  dhammadaayaadaa'ti; ahampi tena aadiyo bhaveyya.m -- `aamisadaayaadaa  satthusaavakaa viharanti, no dhammadaayaadaa'ti. tumhe ca me, bhikkhave,  dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyaatha, no aamisadaayaadaa, tumhepi tena na aadiyaa  bhaveyyaatha -- `dhammadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no  aamisadaayaadaa'ti; ahampi tena na aadiyo bhaveyya.m -- `dhammadaayaadaa  satthusaavakaa viharanti, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti. tasmaatiha me,  bhikkhave, dhammadaayaadaa bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me ^a^M1.0016^ea^ tumhesu  anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no  aamisadaayaadaa'ti.
text.963: [03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati `kataavakaaso khomhi  bhagavataa dhammadesanaayaa'ti ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa  tatthevantaradhaayi.
text.964: [03] 284^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0327^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi --  `kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva  aajaanissatii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `aya.m kho  aa.laaro kaalaamo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii diigharatta.m  apparajakkhajaatiko. ya.mnuunaaha.m aa.laarassa kaalaamassa ^a^P1.0170^ea^  pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m. so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva  aajaanissatii'ti. atha kho ma.m, bhikkhave, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa  etadavoca -- `sattaahakaala"nkato, bhante, aa.laaro kaalaamo'ti.  ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `sattaahakaala"nkato aa.laaro  kaalaamo'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `mahaajaaniyo  kho aa.laaro kaalaamo. sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya, khippameva  aajaaneyyaa'ti.
text.965: [03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kassa nu kho aha.m  pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti?  tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `aya.m kho udako raamaputto  pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatiko. ya.mnuunaaha.m  udakassa raamaputtassa pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m. so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva  aajaanissatii'ti. atha kho ma.m, bhikkhave, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa  etadavoca -- `abhidosakaala"nkato, bhante, udako raamaputto'ti.  ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `abhidosakaala"nkato udako  raamaputto'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `mahaajaaniyo  kho udako raamaputto. sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya ^a^M1.0227^ea^,  khippameva aajaaneyyaa'ti.
text.966: [01] ``tassa mayha.m ^a^T1.0328^ea^, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kassa nu  kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva  aajaanissatii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `bahukaaraa ^a^V1.0230^ea^   kho me pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu, ye ma.m padhaanapahitatta.m upa.t.thahi.msu.  ya.mnuunaaha.m pa~ncavaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya'nti. tassa  mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho etarahi pa~ncavaggiyaa  bhikkhuu viharantii'ti? addasa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu baaraa.nasiya.m  viharante isipatane migadaaye. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, uruvelaaya.m  yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkami.m {pakkaami.m (syaa0 pii0  ka0)}.
text.967: [03] 285^b^.^eb^ ``addasaa kho ma.m, bhikkhave, upako aajiivako  antaraa {aajiiviko (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ca gaya.m antaraa ca bodhi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanna.m. disvaana ma.m  etadavoca -- `vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho  chaviva.n.no pariyodaato! ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito,  ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii'ti ^a^P1.0171^ea^?  eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, upaka.m aajiivaka.m gaathaahi  ajjhabhaasi.m --
text.969: [22] sabba~njaho ta.nhaakkhaye vimutto, saya.m abhi~n~naaya  kamuddiseyya.m..
text.97: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhuttaavii assa.m pavaarito  paripu.n.no pariyosito ^a^T1.0022^ea^ suhito yaavadattho; siyaa ca me pi.n.dapaato  atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo {cha.d.diyadhammo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. atha dve bhikkhuu aagaccheyyu.m  jighacchaadubbalya- {jighacchaadubballa (sii0 pii0)} paretaa ^a^P1.0013^ea^. tyaaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m --  `aha.m khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttaavii pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito  suhito yaavadattho; atthi ca me aya.m pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo  cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace aaka"nkhatha, bhu~njatha, no ce tumhe bhu~njissatha {sace tumhe  na bhu~njissatha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)},  idaanaaha.m appaharite vaa cha.d.dessaami, appaa.nake vaa udake  opilaapessaamii'ti. tatrekassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `bhagavaa kho  bhuttaavii pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito suhito yaavadattho; atthi  caaya.m bhagavato pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace maya.m  na bhu~njissaama, idaani bhagavaa appaharite vaa cha.d.dessati, appaa.nake  vaa udake opilaapessati' ^a^V1.0018^ea^. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa --  `dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa'ti.  aamisa~n~natara.m kho paneta.m, yadida.m pi.n.dapaato. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m  pi.n.dapaata.m abhu~njitvaa iminaava jighacchaadubbalyena eva.m ima.m rattindiva.m {rattidiva.m  (ka0)}  viitinaameyya''nti. so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m abhu~njitvaa teneva  jighacchaadubbalyena eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya. atha  dutiyassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `bhagavaa kho bhuttaavii pavaarito  paripu.n.no pariyosito suhito yaavadattho; atthi caaya.m bhagavato  pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace maya.m na bhu~njissaama,  idaani bhagavaa appaharite vaa cha.d.dessati, appaa.nake ^a^T1.0023^ea^ vaa udake  opilaapessati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m  pa.tivinodetvaa {pa.tivinetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} eva.m ima.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya'nti. so ta.m  pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivinodetvaa eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m  viitinaameyya. ki~ncaapi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m  bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivinodetvaa eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m  viitinaameyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca  paasa.msataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno  diigharatta.m ^a^M1.0017^ea^ appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya subharataaya viiriyaarambhaaya  sa.mvattissati. tasmaatiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadaayaadaa bhavatha, maa  aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me tumhesu anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa  dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa'''ti.
text.970: [21] `na ^a^T1.0329^ea^ me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
text.975: [22] andhiibhuutasmi.m {andhabhuutasmi.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} lokasmi.m, aaha~ncha.m amatadundubhi'nti..
text.976: [03] `yathaa kho tva.m, aavuso, pa.tijaanaasi, arahasi  anantajino'ti!
text.977: [21] `maadisaa ^a^V1.0231^ea^ ve jinaa honti, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya.m.
text.978: [22] jitaa me paapakaa dhammaa, tasmaahamupaka jino'ti..
text.979: [03] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0228^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, upako aajiivako `hupeyyapaavuso'ti  {huveyyapaavuso (sii0 pii0), huveyyaavuso (syaa0)}  vatvaa siisa.m okampetvaa ummagga.m gahetvaa pakkaami.
text.98: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m  paavisi.
text.980: [03] 286^b^.^eb^ ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano yena baaraa.nasii isipatana.m migadaayo yena pa~ncavaggiyaa  bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.m. addasa.msu kho ma.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa  bhikkhuu duurato aagacchanta.m. disvaana a~n~nama~n~na.m sa.n.thapesu.m {a~n~nama~n~na.m katika.m  sa.n.thapesu.m (vinayapi.take mahaavagge)} -- `aya.m  kho, aavuso, sama.no gotamo aagacchati baahulliko {baahuliko (sii0 pii0)  saaratthadiipanii.tiikaaya sameti} padhaanavibbhanto  aavatto baahullaaya. so neva abhivaadetabbo, na paccu.t.thaatabbo; naassa  pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. api ca kho aasana.m .thapetabba.m, sace  aaka"nkhissati nisiidissatii'ti. yathaa yathaa kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  upasa"nkami.m tathaa ^a^T1.0330^ea^ tathaa pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu sakaaya  katikaaya sa.n.thaatu.m. appekacce ma.m paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesu.m,  appekacce aasana.m pa~n~napesu.m, appekacce paadodaka.m upa.t.thapesu.m. api ca  kho ma.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca samudaacaranti.
text.981: [03] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m  -- `maa, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca samudaacaratha  {samudaacarittha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.  araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho ^a^P1.0172^ea^.  odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m  desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya  kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m --  brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa  bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- `taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya  taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi baahulliko  padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti? eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave,  pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `na, bhikkhave, tathaagato  baahulliko, na padhaanavibbhanto, na aavatto baahullaaya ^a^M1.0229^ea^ ^a^V1.0232^ea^. araha.m,  bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m,  amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m  tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa ^a^T1.0331^ea^ sammadeva  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti.  dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m --  `taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya  dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi baahulliko  padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti? dutiyampi kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `na, bhikkhave, tathaagato  baahulliko...pe0... upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. tatiyampi kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- `taayapi kho tva.m,  aavuso gotama, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya  naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana  tva.m etarahi baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya  adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti?
text.982: [03] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m  -- `abhijaanaatha me no tumhe, bhikkhave, ito pubbe evaruupa.m  pabhaavitameta'nti {bhaasitametanti (sii0 syaa0 vinayepi)}? `no heta.m, bhante'.   `araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato  sammaasambuddho. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m,  ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa  nacirasseva ^a^T1.0332^ea^ -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa ^a^P1.0173^ea^ upasampajja viharissathaa'ti.
text.983: [03] ``asakkhi.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu  sa~n~naapetu.m. dvepi suda.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ovadaami, tayo bhikkhuu  pi.n.daaya caranti. ya.m tayo bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa aaharanti tena  chabbaggiyaa {chabbaggaa (sii0 syaa0)} yaapema. tayopi suda.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ovadaami,  dve bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caranti. ya.m dve bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa  aaharanti tena chabbaggiyaa yaapema. atha kho, bhikkhave,  pa~ncavaggiyaa ^a^M1.0230^ea^ bhikkhuu mayaa eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa  attanaa jaatidhammaa samaanaa jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa ajaata.m anuttara.m ^a^V1.0233^ea^ yogakkhema.m  nibbaana.m ajjhagama.msu, attanaa jaraadhammaa samaanaa jaraadhamme aadiinava.m  viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa ajara.m  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.msu, attanaa byaadhidhammaa  samaanaa...pe0... attanaa mara.nadhammaa samaanaa... attanaa sokadhammaa  samaanaa... attanaa sa.mkilesadhammaa samaanaa  sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m  nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m  ajjhagama.msu. ~naa.na~nca pana nesa.m dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa no ^a^T1.0333^ea^  vimutti {akuppaa nesa.m vimutti (ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'ti.
text.984: [03] 287^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame  pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa  kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa  gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa  manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca  kaamagu.naa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime  pa~nca kaamagu.ne gathitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino  anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa --  `anayamaapannaa byasanamaapannaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato' {paapimato''ti (?)}.  `seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago baddho paasaraasi.m adhisayeyya.  so evamassa veditabbo -- anayamaapanno byasanamaapanno  yathaakaamakara.niiyo luddassa. aagacchante ca pana ludde yena kaama.m na  pakkamissatii'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa  braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne gathitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa  anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te evamassu  veditabbaa -- `anayamaapannaa byasanamaapannaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa  paapimato'. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa  ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne agathitaa amucchitaa anajjhopannaa  aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa ^a^P1.0174^ea^  paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa -- `na anayamaapannaa na  byasanamaapannaa na ^a^M1.0231^ea^ yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato'.
text.985: [03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0234^ea^, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago abaddho paasaraasi.m  adhisayeyya. so evamassa veditabbo -- `na anayamaapanno na  byasanamaapanno na yathaakaamakara.niiyo luddassa. aagacchante ca pana  ludde yena kaama.m pakkamissatii'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi  keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne agathitaa amucchitaa  anajjhopannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te  evamassu veditabbaa -- `na anayamaapannaa na byasanamaapannaa na ^a^T1.0334^ea^  yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato'.
text.986: [03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago ara~n~ne pavane  caramaano vissattho gacchati, vissattho ti.t.thati, vissattho  nisiidati, vissattho seyya.m kappeti. ta.m kissa hetu?  anaapaathagato, bhikkhave, luddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu  vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m  vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m apada.m, vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m  adassana.m gato paapimato.
text.987: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa  ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m  piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.988: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa  upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena  pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa  sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.989: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.99: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto acirapakkantassa  bhagavato bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti.  ``aavuso''ti kho te ^a^P1.0014^ea^ bhikkhuu aayasmato  saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --
text.990: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m  samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa ^a^T1.0335^ea^ naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.991: [03] ``puna ^a^M1.0232^ea^ ^a^V1.0235^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja  viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.992: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.993: [03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma ^a^P1.0175^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja  viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
text.994: [01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja  viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m apada.m, vadhitvaa  maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato. ti.n.no loke visattika.m  vissattho gacchati, vissattho ti.t.thati, vissattho nisiidati,  vissattho seyya.m kappeti. ta.m kissa hetu? anaapaathagato, bhikkhave,  paapimato''ti.
text.995: [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
text.998: [03] 288^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0336^ea^ ^a^V1.0236^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetena va.lavaabhirathena {va.labhiirathena (sii0 pii0)} saavatthiyaa niyyaati  divaadivassa. addasaa kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no pilotika.m  paribbaajaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana pilotika.m paribbaajaka.m  etadavoca --
text.999: [03] ``handa, kuto nu bhava.m vacchaayano aagacchati  divaadivassaa''ti?
